mchog thams cad dang/ dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ shin tu bde ba thams cad dang/ yid bde ba dang/ dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa ste/ ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyi rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o// bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i g.yon pa'i mig dgod cing stod pa ni bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang// phyag byed du bcug pa dang// rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang/ ji srid mchog thams cad grub cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang/ 'dzum pa dang gsong zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la rgyas btab pas 'dud par gyur nas dngos grub mchog thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs kyi mchog gi dam pa'i dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod dga' bas brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog dang po'i glu ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin kun rgyal po ste// mi 'gyur mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams grub par byed do// sarba ku ru ya thA su kha~M zhes bya ba brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad (12)

kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyer rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjes su chags pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ gar dang/ glu dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang/ bden ngag thams cad dang/ grol ba dang phra dbab pa thams cad bsgrub pa rang sgyu ma thams cad dang rmad du byung ba thams cad so sor ston pa dang sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang/ thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang/ gnon pa dang/ 'dul ba dang/ gsad pa dang/ thams cad phyir 'dren pa dang/ thams cad sgrub pa dang/ mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs// sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la// rab 'jug mchod pa byin gyis brlab// rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/ thams cad rnam par spyod pa dang/ srung ba dang/ yongs su spyod pa dang/ rims thams cad dang/ dug dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ gdon dang/ nad dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang/ shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang/ dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i don grub pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o// nam mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyis rjes su chags par bya ste// 'di la bcom ldam 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags shing dgyes pa dang/ brtan par rjes su chags nas nam mkha' thams cad kyi bdag nyid kun gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ mchog gi dngos grub la sogs

pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du// gsang ba dam pa gsungs pa yin// mig sogs phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje kun 'dzin slob dpon gyi// tsum pa na dang 'khyud sogs kyis// thams cad rnal 'byor rjes bsgrub ste// myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// grub pa med pa rnams la yang// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// gang la dngos grub med gyur dang// bsod nams phun tshogs med pa yang// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// rgyas btab myur du 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po la sogs nye snying pos// bsgrub bya grub par ma gyur na// tsum pa sogs kyis rgyas gdab bya// gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni// dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog/ de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// mchog gi bdag nyid dam pa ste// mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya// phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di 'ba' zhig gi// bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// mi thub pa dang sod mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba// thams cad mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen// thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzogs so//// de nas mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi lang zhing rab tu khyab pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad pa'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad skyed par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o// sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang kha T+wA~M ga'i phyag rgya bcings nas g.yon pa dril bu dang bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed pa ste// sgeg pa dang

bcas pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa bkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma bstod pa ste thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba ste/ des rdo rje bsnyems ma yongs su btang bar byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyur ro// rdo rje bsnyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go/ mda' gsor bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjes su chags par byed na bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rdo rje ki li ki las rgyas btab na lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad kyi bud med thams cad rol par byed cing ma grub na yang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yin no// chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang gsod pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongs su dgod cing phreng ba dor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyu?g thob pa'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ci lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi mchod pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa mi zad pa'o// rdo rje stod pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad skyod pa dang dbang du byed pa'o// rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang rkang pas lha'i gzugs brnyan mnan cing rgyas btab nas sdigs mdzub byas te/ lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mi thogs par rgyas btab pas bka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// stan mthon po la skyil krung phyed pas 'dug ste/ rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong na lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing/ yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol par byed pa'am sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshigs las byung ba ni bcu ste snying gar sen mo 'drud pa'o// lcags kyu brdeg pa'o// g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la g.yas pa de gzhug pa'o// lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o// phan tshun sems brud pa'i snying gar

byas pa'o// lce mnyam par byin pa'o// snying gar rdo rje brtan par rab tu bzhag pa'o// rdo rjes byab ba'o// rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo// 'di rnams kyis dngos grub dang/ phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bde ba dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ chos dang/ ye shes dang/ las dang/ bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i las bcu nidabus ma'i lcags kyus so// kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so// mthe bong rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su brud pa'o// mdzub mo rdo rje'o// de nyid kyi lcags kyu gnyis so// dbus ma'i rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o// srin lag gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o// mthe'u chung gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo btsir ba'o// 'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang/ rjes su chags pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ rol pa dang/ chags pas bcing pa dang/ thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang/ gar byed du gzhug pa dang/ dgod du gzhug pa dang/ gsod pa'o// de nas las gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang/ bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjes su chags pa ni rdo rje lta bas so// rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo bar byed pas myang ba dang btung ba'o// chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so// de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung pa gnyis pa stod pas so// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying gar gzhug pas so// yod pa thams cad rnyed pa ni mig dgug pas so// 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i dman pa'i gdong gis blta bas so// thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams kyis so// 'dod pa'i chags pa gsad pa ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid ldang bar byed pas so// 'dod pa thams cad kyi rjes su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka' bsgo bas so// de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yau ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar sbyor na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje bsnyems ma'i phyag rgyas thams cad bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje

mtshon cha mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang rjes su chags pa'o// rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang dngos grub thams cad bde bar grub pa'o// rgyal mtshan sgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do// dus kyi mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do// rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o// rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang/ thams cad 'phrog pa'o// g.yon pa bsnyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi las rnams kyis sgyu ma dang/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang/ so sor ston pa dang/ rmugs pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang/ bskor ba dang/ bskrad pa dang/ 'bru dang/ btung ba 'pho ba dang/ dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o// rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad do// mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe bo'i rdo rjes bkab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad bsrung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su chags pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ dbang du byed pa bsgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par bzung bas mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal dbraug pa'o// de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su bts-ir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang/ dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol du gzhug pa'o// de yang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so// rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so// mdzub mo dang/ dbus ma dang/ srin lag gi 'khor lo bsgreng bar byas la mthe bo dang/ mthe'u chung mnyam la dral bar bya ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing bsgrub par 'gyur ro// btsir bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba

dgug pa'o// mdzub mos phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o// rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas bsgrub pa'o// skye gnas g.yo bas bud med dang skyes pa dag gis rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o// kha sbyor btsir bas ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo// rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba dang yid bde ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// skye gnas su sen mo brud pas skyes bu rnams so// de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste// de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs pas bde ba ster du gzhug/ bsgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyis rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta sta~M zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad bsgrub pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gsang bar reg na thams cad bsgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o// smin ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong ba'o// rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po bsgrub pa'o// rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyi bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o// rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur ba yin no// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgom pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wA~M gis so// dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do// thams cad gsodapa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so// nor thams cad 'bog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa'i kha T+wA~M ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad gzhug cing don yod par bsgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu

tshur gyis so// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang/ gling bu dang/ rdza rnga dang/ mu kuN+Da dang/ cha lang dang/ rnga bo che dang/ rnga zlum dang/ rnga pa Ta ha dang/ guny+dza dang/ ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ rims dang/ dug dang/ sbyar dug dang/ gdon las grol ba dang/ gsod pa dang/ 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so// 'dod chags chen po rnams dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin// phyag rgya'i rtog pa rab tu brtags// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang las// rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis// don yod kun grub bde bar gsol// zhes bya'o// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so//// de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po 'di dag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas// sgeg bcas 'dzum sogs bkrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po brgya// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste// mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyi// las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje las kyi mchod pa che'i// thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na// dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing// sgeg bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol bas// de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing/ phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas// thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya// mchog dang po'i las chen po'i phyag rgya mchog gzhan yin no zhes bya ba rgyal

mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya// mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgyu// rab tu dga' mchog ma bkrol bar// bde ba nyid du mngon par sbyar// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas// las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya// mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wA~M ga/ lus kun gyis ni gar bya zhing// rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing// dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o// ci ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa// rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa// phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs// dam pa mchog tu grub par byed// mchog gi dam pa brgyud chen po// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni// bstan par bya ste gzhan la min// de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi// mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan// dpal mchog dang po'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo// mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o// dpal mchog dang po las dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so//// de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni// mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol// kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa// gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la// dang po'i gnas mchog ci ltar lags// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid// rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji ltar lags// sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sangs rgyas ji

ltar lags// rdo rje gtum po mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags// ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang// 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags// ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang// khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid// dang po'i snying po ji ltar byung// de ci nye snying ji ltar lags// bde chen rdo rje chen po yi// don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs// de yi rnam smin ji lta bu// thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis// dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags// gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba// ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni// rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang// phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang// thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che// bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che// de ni de nyid gsang ba dang// don yod pa ni mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir// thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mdo gsungs so// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni// the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su// 'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin// de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ci ltar yin zhe na/ rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las// sems can don ni yongs brtags pas// des ni rtog par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung// de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang// phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog/ bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i// grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so// de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na// nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa// de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun kyi

mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog/ de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rdo rje dbang phyug cher bstod pas// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod// dngos grub kun gyi 'byor ba rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba// zab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cing dri ma med// byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa// de nas 'di'i las kyi khyad par ni// sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag/ rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo rje las ni 'dzin 'gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na// sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni// bdag la byin brlabs mchog bsgrub pa// nyin re sgrub par byed na des// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang// gang phyir sems can don gyur pas// de phyir nga ni kun tu bzang// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas y-in zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de phy-ir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid// bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na// mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnan// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste// byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/ kun tu bzang po'i lag tu na// mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin// brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// des na phyag na rdo rje des// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol

phyin pa yum// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul byi'i phyir// rig rnams rab tu byung ba'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang thar pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir// 'jig rten gsum nga khams gsum nga// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na// nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde// bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir// sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan gsungs// de nas de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ gsang ba'i phyir ni snying por brjod// yi ge hU~M ni mi 'gyur mchog/ de nas nye ba'i snying po yi// de kho na nyid shes pa ni// de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang// snying po rab tu brjod par bya// snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub/ nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod// de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje de nyid don yod grub// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na// ji ltar gnas dang 'khor lo dang// ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba dang// 'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul// de nas rnam par shes pa ni// rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no// de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar// ka ba brgyad gyis nyer mdzes shing// sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang// dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan// der bdag po'i don shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe

na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin// dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa// thams cad dag pa bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug nyid// de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni/ rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir// sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// ting 'dzin yi shes kun nas bsdus// zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na/ nam mkha'i snying po yin zhe na/ thams cad nam mkha' bcom ldan 'das// sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che// nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang/ de nas nor bu rigs kyi ni// dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che// nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o// zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na ny-id chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la// spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku// nor bu nor bu'i smin pa'o// de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid shes pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos// nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o// zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na// rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug ste de nas rjes bsgrub pa// dril bu nyid kyis bya ba yin// ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na// rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis// rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni// glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul bas// mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis// phyag rgyas kun gyis legs byin brlabs// dam

tshigs chen po 'di nyid kyis// rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang// rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya gang// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje dril bu rab sad cing// rtog pa thams cad rjes bsgrubs pas// mchog dang las sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na// bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yis// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing// thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'// yang pa'am ni 'dug pa'am// gang dang de ru 'chag pa'am// dgod pa dang ni smra pa'am// gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog/ de ni sdig kun dang bral bas// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla ma gsal// mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol// rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa// bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' ltar thugs med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni// rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so// bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjes su chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni// kun mchog 'byor ba'i dbang phyug 'di ni gso ba yin// mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thugs med pa ni// mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol// de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min// sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'// dad

pa med cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa// rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu bsgrub pa'am// yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed// so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs// des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed// rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hU~M las bris nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur// rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min// 'dir ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub thob dang byin gyis brlabs pa yin// nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni bstan par mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa/ de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed// dngos grub chen po la thams cad rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang/ shin tu brtan pa dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po snying po sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs// sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs// rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs// dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlab pa// rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che// ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsung nas ni// sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so//// thugs dam sa'i snying po tho lding du/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+t+ra kA la sha dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te

gtan la phab pa//// lo tsA chen po rin chen bzang po yis// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la// bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas// bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur//// 'di snga 'gyur gyi 'gyur byang gsal ba mi 'dug rung rtsa rgyud rtog pa bcu pa dang// lo paN gcig yin nam snyam mo// slar yang rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'grel ba slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa bsdus 'grel dang rgyas 'grel gnyis ka la gtugs te dag par bgyis pa'o//// rgya gar skad du// tan+t+ra rA dza ma hA karma mA la nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan phrin las ma lus pa'i bdag nyid/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod chen po'i bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen de ni/ 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid can de/ 'di ltar rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnam par dag pa bde stong chen po'i ngang na snyoms par zhugs shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rdul snyed dang bcas pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dam tshig rdo rje dang/ lus rdo rje dang/ ngag rdo rje dang/ sems rdo rje dang/ ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang/ rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang/ sa rdo rje dang/ chu rdo rje dang/ me rdo rje dang/ rlung rdo rje dang/ nam mkha' rdo rje dang/ gzugs rdo rje dang/ sgra rdo rje dang/ dri rdo rje dang/ ro rdo rje dang/ reg bya rdo rje dang/ chos rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rdul snyed dang bcas pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa dang dkon mchog dpal dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid/ 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas spyan dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma dang bcas pa la bde ba dang mchog tu bde ba dang/ bde bral gyi bde ba dang/ lhan cig tu skyes pa'i bde bas 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i khams thams cad la khyab par mdzad do// khyab par mdzad nas yum gyi b+ha gar 'dus par gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skur shar ba ni 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang/ (13)

mthing ga dang/ dmar po'i zhal dang/ rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rin chen dang/ dril bu dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri phyag drug na 'dzin pa/ zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba las gyur pa'i khro bo ak+Sho b+h+ya'i skur shar ba ni 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang/ mthing nag dang/ dmar ba'i zhal dang/ rdo rje dang/ kha T+wA~M ga dang/ rnge'u chung dang/ dung dmar dang/ rgyu zhags dang/ khyung gi khra phyag drug na 'dzin pa/ zhabs rkyang bskum du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsang ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ badzra d+h+r-ika/ badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hUM shrIHbadzra d+h+r-ika/ ces brjod pas khro bo ak+Sho b+h+ya dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la thim par gyur pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor kyi bdag po/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje'i skur yongs su rdzogs pa ni 'di lta ste dkar po dang/ mthing shun dang/ dmar po'i zhal can/ g.yas na rdo rje dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ g.yon na b+han d+ha dang/ dgra s+t+wa dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa zhi khro 'dres pa'i skur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rdo rje dbyings phyug ma yang ston pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje dang gnyis su med par sku la 'khril to// de nas yum rdo rje dbyings phyug mas 'di skad ces gsol to// chos dang gang zag bdag med mkhyen// gzung 'dzin sgrib pa gnyis spangs shing// byams pas 'gro la thugs rtag rje// gdod nas don mdzad mthar byin pa// pad ltar 'dam skyes skyon mi gos// mi gnas dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// stong gsum 'jig rten kun gnas pa'i// sems can nyon mongs snang ba dang/ theg pa'i rim pa lam zhugs pa'i// rnal 'byor nyams kyi snang ba dang/ bde gshegs snang ba sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor shar// snang ba gsum po dbyer med tu// zung 'jug bsgrub pa'i zhi khro yi// mchod pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi// karma mA le'i rgyud chen gsungs// zhes gsol to// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// tshogs kyi mchod pas dam skong sgrib sbyangs shing// de nyid lha yang 'dug lnga 'go bgegs gnyis 'jil ba'i rgyu// sku gsum mthar phyin 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don phyir rim par bshad par bya// de la dkyil 'khor 'di dus su// dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug dang ni// las rnams

bsdus pa'i phyi ma dang// bdud kyi mchod pa bshad par bya// de yang dkyil 'khor drug ces pa// dus su tshogs dang gsal bkra rnon po bskyed// 'bar ba'i phrin las tshogs te mchod pas thim// dus kyi dus nyul tshogs kyi bskos nyul dang/ ting 'dzin drod nyul ti ra'i gnas 'phrog dang// dung khrod gnas nyul mchod pa'i phud nyul drug/ de drug dkyil 'khor drug tu shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// karma ma le'i rgyud las/ rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi dang/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po las dus kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de la dus kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dus chen byin gyis brlabs pa ste// dus chen drug la mi g.yo bar// tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul ba'o// khyad par lo'am zla ba'am// rgyun nam yang na dus drug la// dus dang khyad par shes par bya// de la dus kyi rtags nyul mas// gza' skar dus tshigs bzang po la// 'dus ma 'dus dang yon tan skyon// de phyir dus 'dir rab tu gces// rgyun du'am yang na zla gcig gam// de bzhin lo gcig khyud skor ram// bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang// brgyad rnams su ni khyad par sbyin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'jig rten rnams ni dge sdig gnyis la spyod// legs nyes zhal lce gcod pa'i kha zin gnyis// dus 'dir mkha' la dge sdig khram gyis len// dge spyod rnams la dus 'dir gcig tu gces// phyi yi dus 'dir mkhas pas tshogs 'khor bya// kun gzhi rgyu yi rgyud du shes pa'i dus// de la 'khor 'das tshang bas rtsa ba'i rgyud// lus ni thabs kyi rgyud du shes pa'i dus// phung po khams dang skye mched dkyil 'khor lha// sangs rgyas rig ma byang chub lcam dral dang// sprul pa sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs rnams sam// lus la brten nas dbang lam thun bzhir bsgom// sgrib 'gag sangs rgyas gsal bar bshad pa'i rgyud// phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud nyid la// rigs 'dzin sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i dus// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i dus shes rnal 'byor pas// rgyun tu tshogs kyi 'khor los sangs rgyas mchod// bla ma'i dus dang ldan pa rab yin te// 'di ldan dus rnams kun las khyad par 'phags// phyi yi bla mas sgro 'dogs yongs su gcod// nang gi bla mas rang byung ye shes ston// gsang ba'i bla mas lhan skyes yongs su ston// mtha' thug bla mas chos rnams de nyid ston// bla ma'i khyad par bzhi dang ma ldan na// dus kyi rgyal po nyams par shes par bya// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas ma chen po la// khams kyi 'du lugs rnam pa gsum rtogs pas// rnal 'byor rang lus tshogs 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus// rtsa dang yi

ge thig le lung gi dus// las dang skal bar ldan pas rtogs par bya// dus rnams 'di ltar shes pa'i gang zag rnams// rgyud sde bco brgyad tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub// ces gsungs so// karma mA le'i rgyud las/ dus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag 'gro ba'i don du sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung nas ched du brjod do// skal ldan mi dang 'byor ldan dang// dga' ldan lha yi tshogs te rnam gsum mo// skal ldan mi yi tshogs la brgyad// mi chud pa yi skyon dgu bsal// 'du ba'i yon tan drug ldan bsdu// de yi spyod pa bstan pa dang// 'dus la brtag bzhis skyon rnams gsal// bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang// cho ga phun sum tshogs par bya// shes pa phun sum tshogs pa dang// mi 'grub pa yi gegs bsal yin// de nas skyon dgu+u gsal bar gsungs// sngags pas bsgrims te bsal ba ni// sdom la gnas pa'i dka' thub can// zas dang spyod lam mi mthun dang// lta spyod mthun yang nang mi mthun// phyi nang can dang gnod sbyor can// 'dod pas mos dang zas la brkam// dad med bsgom bsgrub mi nus pas// 'di dag bsal bar gsungs pa'o// yang 'di dag gsungs so// nyon mongs tshi chad ting 'dzin g.yel mi 'grub// dam du len dang spyod pa'i dam nyams dang// gnyis phyi mi 'grub ma spyad grol mi 'gyur// shes dang spyod pa'i dam tshig cir gyur yang// rtsa ba'i dam nyams mi 'grub gegs su che// phyi chos kha gsags khong dug bar chad 'byung// 'dod mos don nor sgrar 'jug sngags spyod log/ zas skom tshogs kyi skos nor phud lhag nyams// ma dad le los rgyu 'bras 'bras bu med// de phyir skyon rnams bsal bar rgyal bas gsungs// phyi rabs rgyud 'di shes pas tshogs 'khor bya// de nas 'du ba'i yon tan drug ldan bsdu// dad pa che la blo dang brtson 'grus ldan// dpa' brtul che la yid ring rgyud la mkhas// gtong phod thos 'dzin me gsod pa ltar 'bad// thogs med 'jug nus ma grub mi gtong dang// brda' dang lan shes las la zhum pa med// rdzogs dang byang shes sum char bstan pa dang// yon tan ldan pa de dag bsdu bar bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// de yi spyod pa mthun pa ni// gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod dang// lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod 'dug/ sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs mnyam sbyor// mkha' 'gro 'khor lo mchog tu 'bar// de yang brtag pa rnam bzhi ni// slob dpon ma brtags grogs ma brtags// gzungs ma ma brtag gnas ma brtags// dngos grub mi thob las mi 'grub// dam tshig nyams dang bar

chad 'byung// rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan la// gsang sngags rgyud kyis dbang bskur zhing// lung dang man ngag yongs shes pa// de nyid bcu dang ldan pa'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// las dang las kyi phyag rgya shes// spyod pa brda yi tshul rig cing// brnag par bya ba'i gzungs thub pa'o// ngan sems grogs dang 'brel pa med/ mos ldan dang ba'i tshig la bab// dogs pa'i 'du shes spangs pa yi// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung khar lci// dben pa'i ri bo'i ri sul nags// zhabs kyis bcags shing yid dang 'thad// lha mis btul ba gang yin pa// de ni bsgrub pa'i gnas su 'thad// de yang bdud bzhi gzhom bya ba// mchod mkhan las mkhan sbyor dang sgrol// snod dang mi ldan gnas nor la// shes rab snying rjes ma zin na// nyams pa'i bdud dang las kyi bdud// lha dang srin po bdud rnams so// de yang 'di ltar rab tu shes par bya ba ni// 'chad mkhan snod mi rtog pa nyams pa'i bdud// karmas bab col byed pa las kyi bdud// sbyor ba shes rab ma zin lha bu'i bdud// sgrol ba snying rjes ma zin srin po'i bdud// bdud bzhi'i skyon bsal bdud bzhi bcom pa yin// bdud bzhi bcom pas tshogs kyi mkhan po rnams// bla ma slob ma mthar phyin khyad par 'phags// de la cho ga khyad par 'phags pa ni// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs shing// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// srid zhu gus pas sgyu med slob dpon mnyes// dam mnos mi dpya mi 'phel mi gcod spangs// dkyil 'khor lha rgyud phyag rgya bzhir shes zhugs// sgrub la dbang mnos lung dang man ngag thob// dbang thob brtul zhugs rigs pa bsgom zhing bsgrub// kha tshig ma yin rigs pa'i gting du gyur// gnas mchog rab tu dben zhing yid 'thad dang// glang chen khyu mchog la sogs zhi khro'i gdan// phyag mtshan 'phan med ma yo rdzogs pa dang// gso ba'i zas dang rkyen bzlog sman rnams so// don dam gnyis su med par byang chub pa'i// rtags su zla dkyil rdo rje yig 'brus mtshan// skur gyur phyag rgya gsum 'phro 'od zer las// lnga ste rigs lnga'i mtshan rtags bdun du bgrang// de la shes pa phun sum tshogs pa ni// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor ba'i sku// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtogs pa rnam pa

bzhi// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen no// gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// chos sku mi shigs srog 'dzin la// phyi rol 'byung ba lnga po yum// rtsa ba phung po'i rlung lnga dang// yan lag rnam shes rlung lngar smin// lhag mar bcas pa'i lus nyid kyi// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob// rgyal sras de ni 'dod nas 'chi// rig par bcas pa'i tshe de ni// de yi tshe ni bcu drug las// brgya brgya dag tu bsgyur nas ni// bla med byang chub thob par bshad// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba'o// ye shes chen po mdun nas kyang// de ltar mthong bar gyur na yang// rgyab nas 'byung ba'i ye shes ni// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// mi 'grub pa yi gegs bsal te// ma dad pa dang le lo dang// byang chub sems ni ma skyes dang// the tshom yod pa can nyid ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i gegs su 'gyur// 'grub pa'i dus ni rab bshad na// zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam// bcu bzhi bco lnga bcu drug gis// dbang bskur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bco lnga tshun chad kyi// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa'o// de nas bde gshegs sangs rgyas kyis// 'byor ldan yo byad tshogs bshad pa// sgrub pa'i yo byad gsungs pa yi// brgyad dam bzhi yi bdag nyid can// sgrub pa'i yo byad rnam brgyad de// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar sogs kyi sprin phung la// hU~M dang shes pas rab spyad nas// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// bgo ba sna tshogs bshad pa ni// dbang phyug rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// tshe yi dam pa 'grub pa ste// gos lnga dag tu bshad pa ni// yo byad phyi ma thams cad dang// gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o// dbu rgyan dang ni phyag gdub dang// dpung rgyan snyan cha do shal dang// se mo do dang me tog rgyan// byang chub yan lag bdun du bshad// bdag 'dzin gzhan rtog btang snyoms las// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa rtogs// sgrib gnyis nyes skyon spangs pas na// ye shes gos ni dkar por bstan// chags bya chags med spangs nas ni// thugs rje thams cad chags med pas// dbang du gyur yang ma chags te// tshul khrims gos ni dmar po yin// bdag tu mi 'dzin byams pa yis// yon tan yid bzhin gter chen 'phro// kun gyi re 'dod skong ba'i phyir// sbyin pa'i gos ni ser por bstan// gnyis med las kyi sprul pa yis// ji ltar sprul zhing mdzes mdzad pas// 'gro kun dge la dgod pa'i

phyir// brtson 'gru?s gos ni ljang gu yin// chos nyid ngang la bcos su med// kha dog mthing ga bsgyur du med// mi 'gyur mi shigs rang bzhin pas// shes rab gos ni mthing ga yin// de yi kha dog gos lngar bgos// de nas rgyan gyi chos lngar brgyan// thugs kyi shes bya ze'u ldir cod pan dang// yon tan gzi mdangs stod g.yogs dang// sku brjid tshul gyi chos gos dang// gsung thugs rjes chags smad dkris dang// mdzad pa gar gyi gtsang gos phu dung ste// 'di rnams rgyan chas dam pa'o// las rnams rigs bzhi mthun pa'i chas// de bas yang dag mdzes pa'i me tog phreng// dam chos rnam 'byed dbu rgyan rin chen phreng// phyag gdub sna tshogs las mdzad brtson 'grus ldan// rin chen tshogs spras dbu rgyan dran pa'i ngang// snyan cha lus sems bsil byed shin tu spyad// do shal ting 'dzin dbus mchog phreng ba'i rgyan// bdag 'dzin btang snyoms sprul pa'i se mo do// byang chub 'od 'phro shes bya'i cod pan 'phur// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang// srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// byas pa'am ni blugs pa'am// brdungs pa dang ni bris pa'ang rung// sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya btag par bya// dbu rgyan rigs bdag rnam snang mdzad// snyan cha mgur chu snang mtha' yas// phyag gdub phreng ba rdo rje sems// sku+u yi ska rags rin chen 'byung// rkang gdub don yod gdon mi za// byang chub lcam dral rigs lngas spras// bdud 'dul stobs mchog theg pa mchog gi rgyan// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug 'khril pa yum gyi rgyan// dpa' brtul za byed ye shes thugs rje'i rgyan// mi 'khor byang chub sems kyi rgyan du bstan// sku gsum theg gsum dug gsum dbang 'ched sgrol// don dam bcud nyid chags tshul thugs rje'i rgyan// 'dul byed phrin las rgyan te rnam pa brgyad// 'jigs byed lags pa'i rtags su bstan pa yin// rnal 'byor bza' ba'i rnam pa mang po ni// a mra smin pa grol bar bshad// 'bras bu chen po pa na se// rgun 'bru khu ba khu ba'i mchog/ na li ke ra dngos grub mchog/ dam chos 'bras bu a ru ka/ a mra rgun 'brum pa na sa// na li ke ra a ru ka/ 'bras bu chen po khyad par dag/ bdud rtsi 'bras bu yin par bshad// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod chu dam pa'o// rtsa ba 'bras bu ldong bu dang// bzang ba bca' ba spyad par bya// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i btung ba ni// rnal 'byor pa yis btung zhing mchod// chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad// rab tu rmongs pa sbrang rtsi'o// bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs// rgun chang dag ni bdud rtsi yin// glu ni tshig tu brjod par bya// dar dir dag ni sil snyan

yin// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// glu dang sil snyan gar byed pa// brda' yi dam par bshad pa ni// hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang ngo// rab tu zhi ba sil snyan glu// oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar blang// gar ni shin tu rnam sprul lo// mi yi dbang po'i sil snyan glu// ti zhes bya ba glu yi rgya// thams cad dga' bas rab bsgrubs pa// gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// dur khrod glu dang sil snyan glu// rdo rje drag po sgeg mo'i glu// 'khur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin zhing// 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// chags sam glu gar sil snyan glu// hriHzhes bya ba glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// gar ni shin tu rnam 'phrul pa'o// rab tu dpa' bo sil snyan glu// rta mchog rnam par rol par byed// he zhes bya ba glu yi rgya// gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o// skad kyi gsangs ni mtho dman dang// gre 'gyur bcas shing bzla' pa dang// ka ka la dang rdo rje'i dbyangs// de ni rab tu dbyangs snyan dang// ka ka la yi glu yi dbyangs// dus su rab zhi blang bar bya// tshig drug rnga thabs drug dang sbyar// tshig drug dpa' bo dpa' bo'i tshig/ rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis// thal mo lan gsum rnam par brda'// thabs ni g.yas su sbyar bya ste// de bzhin g.yon du shes rab sbyar// ho hi oM hri hUM lnga dang// haM hUM hri tri taM lnga rnams// haM oM haM kun de ltar bya// oM hris gzir ba'i tshul du bya// de nas lag pa zhi ba yis// thal mo gsum gyis bsdu bar bya// de nas sor mo thams cad kyang// bar bar bsnol te bcing bar bya// rdo rje thal mo zhes bshad de// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu bsgrub// oM su ra te badzra any+dza li hUM// thal mo 'di nyid mnyam gzhag ste// shin tu bskul nas bcing bar bya// rdo rje bcings pa bsdus pa yis// bcing pa'i sbyor ba nyid du bya// oM su ra ta badzra ban d+ha hUM// de nyid du ni sbom po gzhug/ khro bo'i rtse mo shin tu dgug/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgrub// oM su ra ta badzra hUM// phyag rgya dang ni sgrub pa dang// sngags gsum rigs lnga so sor bca'// rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste// sbom po khrau bo rtse mor sbyar// g.yas kyi rdo rje sbom po ni// de yi dbus su gzhug par bya// oM su ra ta s+t+waM/ ho b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho hUM/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis gnyis reg/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcing// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// bsnyems 'dzin chen mor byas bcangs pas// sbyor ba de ni bteg nas su// mgrin pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas// spyi bo'i

mtshams su gzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pa// gar byas de ni phab nas su// skal bzang hU~M zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar nas su// de ni g.yon du bsgyur bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bteg nas su// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya// skal bzang hUM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje'i thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod cha lugs gar byed pa// cha byad 'di yis gar byed cing// skal bzang rdo rje drag por bkod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur zhing// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdab pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// gar gyi dbang phyug go/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar te// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje rin chen te// las dang thun mong ste/ mchod pa thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pas ni// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing// srid pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// skal bzang dpal khyod bdag la sogs// sgrub la rtog par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ hUM 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// bde bar gshegs pa'i 'byor pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH// kye bde mchog bde bas brung la rnam par sprul// hUM gnang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ShaSh+Tha dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba ta yi glu blang ngo// 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs med khyab par 'phros pa yi// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i grangs kyi rdul snyed pa// sprul pa'i sku rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa'i bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam sprul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sprul par mdzod// ho rnam par snang mdzad dpal 'byor pa// a la la ho// de rang bdag la grub par mdzod// de nas phyag rgya shes pa ni// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu// las

rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ston kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas bsnams su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde la bzhugs// hUM a la la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa rnams bsnams su gsol// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// pad+ma'i rgyal po dpal kyi glu// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// sems dpa' pad+ma dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la ho// kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dpal// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags a la la ho// dpa' mo sgyu ma dpal ni pad+ma rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dga' ba'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa// pad+ma'i dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad rnam par sbyong// pad+ma 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/ de nas phyag rgya shes pa ni// pad+ma sgyu ma mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// khams gsum kun gyi nang na rgyal srid mchog gi nor ldan pas// 'jam 'dus g.yul 'gyed sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nyi ma bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog gi sbyin pa sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag nyid re ba kun grub myur du ston a la la ho// mi zad gter gyi dbang phyug khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par 'di dag bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir// rin chen kun gyi nang na bud med rin chen gcig tu mchog/ bud med rin chen shin tu r-in chen thams cad 'gro// rat+na a la la ho// de nas phyag rgya shes pa ni// rta mchog dpal ldan gnas pa'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// myos byed stong las lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong las rab tu 'jigs par ston// zhi ba'i sku yang tshangs pa stong bas lhag par rab tu ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun

'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam dag mos pa'i ngo ston gan rkyal stobs kyi gnon pas non// hi he he he he dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyi ngo ston dbang phyug gnon// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum po la gsum grub drongs// rab kyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo ston mthu chen non// mnyam sbyor ru dra ma tra snying las dpa' mos drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo stod tshangs pa non// sbyor chen tshangs las grol ma drongs shig smra ra Ta// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo ston dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag las dga' drongs a la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gdug pa'i sems can bsgral ba yis// bsgral ba'i phyir na sgrub zhugs a la la ho// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT phaT/ mdza' bo mi la bya'am mi bya de dag yongs su rtog pa med kyang bla// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer// rgol ba gang la bya'am mi bya de dag yongs su brtag pa med kyang bla// de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer zhes gsungs so// de nas rnga thabs bstan pa ni// glu drug dang ni tshig drug dang// rnga thabs drug gi sa nas ni// smon lam rnam pa gsum po yang// so sor bkar te las bya'o// de de byed pa'i dus su yang// ye shes zhal gyi phyag rgya dang// 'dzum byed ye shes phyag rgya dang// lta byed ye shes phyag rgya dang// chos kyi ye shes phyag rgya dang// phyag rgya bzhi sprugs ldan par bya// gar gyi ye shes phyag rgya yi// tshul dgu'i rol ba'i tsham rngams chas// glu yi ye shes phyag rgya dang// rol mo ye shes phyag rgya'o// de nas glu yi ye shes kyi// phyag rgya bya ste rab bshad pa// de yang hUM gi glu dang ni// oM gyi glu la sogs pa yi// glu drug gis ni mgo drangs pa'i// phyag rgya drug dang ldan byas la// glu tshig drug dang glu dbyangs blang// tshul dgu las ni me mnyam zhing// zhi ba'i rdo rje brjid gnon 'gros// he ru ka yi tsham rngams dang// khro bo rnams kyi stangs stabs dang// ma mo 'byon tshul chas byas nas// smon lam rnams gsum rnga brdung ngo// de dus zhi ba'i thal mo dang// khro bo chen po'i thal mo dang// ma mo'i gdang ngar rkan sgra dang// smang ra'i dbyungs/ spyug pa yin nam dbyug pa yang 'jug sa blang ba dang// zhabs kyang 'phen zhing sdud pa dang// 'dor zhing brkyang dang bskum pa dang// 'degs shing gnon pa la sogs pas// rnga brdung dus der rol mo yis// thabs ni sna tshogs gzhan yang bya'o// de nas tshigs bcad 'dis bskul lo// la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang// la lar 'jigs

pa nyi ma brgya phrag dgu yi 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs bzang gzi chen bde dang zhi bar ldan pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang// la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog mnyam par ston// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub phyir 'dul mkhas ma lus sprul sku bde ba'i mchog rnams la// A ra li thams cad mnyam sbyor grub mdzod ru ti ma ti a la la ho// rnam pa mang pos 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis gar mkhan gar mdzad pa// dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/ a la la ho// rnam pa mang po bde mchog rab tu gar mdzod thar pa'i bde ba yang dag thos par mdzod// rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog rab sprul rnam par sprul// te na te te hUM/ rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog rab sprul rnam par sprul/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM bi sha bi sha hUM/ de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// rnam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rang byung rnams kyi glu yi rgya// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pa// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang// rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ru T+Ta maT+Ta/ sma rA ra Ta/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+h+ya/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ kI ni d+hu ni hU~M druM/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ hu lu hu lu/ a la la la ho/ spyi'i rnga rdung ba'o/ shud+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ da ri ShA ya sar+b+pa na Ta g+hai g+hai/ Ta Ta g+hai g+hai g+hai/ Ta g+hai Ta ke gai gai gai// T+Ta ta g+hai// Ta ge// hoM To Na/ Ta k+ki hUM dzaH/ ge te ge d+to na/ Ta ki hUM tuM/ a la la la ho// ru T+Ta maT+Ta/ thal mo brdab pa'i rtog pa ste// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnga stabs so// Ta g+he Ta g+he/ Ta g+he g+he/ Ta ke na Ta/ g+heM g+heM g+heM/ Ta g+heM g+heM Ta g+heM/ rgyun gyi rnga'o// rnam par snang mdzad do// A+o~M AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM/ pAM pAMpAM/ d+haM d+haM d+haM/ dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o// d+ha k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/ d+he badzra badzra

N+yang/ kong kong kong/ hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo d+heM/ k+hong k+hong k+hong/ d+heM/ k+hauM k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/ DeMNakau+oM kau+oM kau+oM/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rnga'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma pad+ma hri/ pad+ma pad+ma shI/ pad+ma pad+ma hrir/ dad la bdo brda' pa'i rnga'o// snang ba mtha' yas gyi brdung ba'o// trAM trAM trAM/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ ta Ta tA TA TA TA TA TA/ tAM tA tA tA/ trA trA trA trA trA/ traM Ti ke tang+ku da tra/ tuT+Ta t+t+ra/ rgyal po'i rnga'o// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi brdung pa'o// Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ Ta k+ki hUM dzaH/ snyems pa'i 'gros so// trA T+Ta trA trA trA trA trA/ myur zhing rab tu myur ba'i rnga'o// ta Ta b+ha ta/ ba tru na/ ta thA ga te/ ba hUM/ ta TA b+ha ta ta b+ha hi na dpal rta mchog rnam par rol pa'o// ta tA b+ha Ta Ta b+ha ta da t+t+ra/ shin tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya ste/ sil snyan gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/[]/ sangs rgyas brda' yi phyag rgya yis// gar gyi rnam par rol par bshad// rnal 'byor rig mar dang ldan pas// bro dang gar gyi bskyod byas te// 'od kyi 'du 'phros byin brlabs te// dngos grub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad thams cad ci 'dod pa// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// spos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang phyi mo bran mo yi// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 'bad cing gtang bar bya ba ni// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// gos dang rgyan dang bza' ba dang// btung ba glu dang tshig tu bcas// bro dang gar gyis mnyes par bya// tshul khrims gos chen zhing btsugs rgyal mtshan la// ye shes lnga ldan dbang po gzi byin tog/ tshar gsum sgeg pa'i lcang lo sprul pa'i rgyan// yan lag lcug phran shes bya'i cod pan 'phur// sor phran rin chen sbyin pa'i sna tshar can// bcings 'doms rdo rje sham gyi gzi bag can// brtson 'grus yan lag sbubs kyi rgyal mtshan la// rnam shes ye shes mkhyen pa'i mi ti'i togs/ rab chen lce'u sprad shes bya'i cod pan can// gzi mdangs chu ris shu ken sprul pa'i sham// ras ras chen bzhi gnas zla 'dra'i blang la ni yang 'dug chen zhig nas zla 'dra'i blang la ni// lhag

mthong nyi 'od shu ken lce'u 'bar// ye shes lnga ldan bdud rtsi tog gi mtshon// rtse gcig ting 'dzin rkan phran 'dung dang sbyin// tshul khrims ras chen sku tshan 'phen la ni// dpa' brtul za byed gzi brjid stag gi zhabs// sprul pa'i phyag gnyis gzig gi dpa' brjid can// stag ga dbu rgyan drag tshul rus chen gdan// zhing gi bla re snod kyi chos dbyings la// phyogs med kun la khyab pa'i thugs rje'i ngang/ chu ris gzim mdangs sprul pa'i 'khor yug sham// phrin las khre'u sor phran sna tshar 'phrul// dpal chen yab yum khro chen ma tshogs dang// dbang phyug rdo rje 'khor tshogs lha grangs bzhin// med na dmar po'i dar las bsab pa'o// gos dang rgyan gyi phyag rgya shes par bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa'i mchog rnams ni// phyag rgyar sbyar ba'i tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas btab dbul bar bya// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga dang// bzlas pa kun gyi bye brag ni// rang gi khyad par shes bya ste// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// brda' yi dngos po bstan pa ni// mkha' 'gro la sogs thar pa'i mchog/ ro la sogs pa dpa' bo mchog/ zla tshogs la sogs yang dag ldan// tshe ni mchog tu 'dzin pa'o// snying po tshims byed mchog yin te// dri zhim dmar po nyid du 'dod// 'jam po thal bar yang dag bshad// gzi brjid dri zhim nyid du 'dod// dbyangs ni snyan par bya ba dang// thar pa chen po shin tu mdzes// btsun mo la sogs reg 'byung bas// rgun chang sbrang rtsi mchog tu dpal// tshwa ni 'dod chags sra ba yin// kaM b+hi la ni bran mor bshad// chur ba zla ba nya ba yin// sha ni sman gyi mchog yin te// chang ni ra sa ya na yin// zan ni tshe zhes bya bar bshad// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni// sha dang chang du ldan pa dag/ dga' ba'i longs spyod skal bzang pos// tshe yi dam pa 'grub par bshad// sgeg mo dang ni na chung mchog/ myos byed dang ni bdud rtsi dang/ gcig pu pa dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te// lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang// kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid kun gyi 'grub pa ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs// tsan+dan dkar pos bskus pa dang// bag phye'i zan las byas pa'i sha// rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o// me tog dkar dang dmar po'o// mthing ga ser po kun bsdus pa// me tog phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las byung// rgya skyegs mthing ga ljang gu'i mdog/ tshos sna bzhi yis bcos pa dang// dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par bsgrub// khams las byung ba thams

cad dang// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par bsgrub// tsan+dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dag/ ga pur nA ga sa la ki// bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan dar dri dang gu gul dang// sardza ga pur gla rtsi dag/ btsos pa'i bdug pa rdzas 'di las// mar me byas na snang ba bskyed// tsan+Dan gur gum spri ka dang// ga pur dang ni gla rtsi dang// bcas pa 'dug pa grub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur// ka sko la dang sug smel dang// gla sgang ga pur gla rtsi dag/ 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar// shing tsha pa twa lo drA dang// na le sham dang ga pur sbyar// sa ha ka ra'i shing mar gyis// kha dri zhim por bya phyir spos// kha ra sbrang rtsis byugs pa yis// a mra la sogs tshig gus byug/ sa ta ka ra'i mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya// yung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis mthun par kha sgyur te// shun pa gro ba la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// 'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// bza' btung phyag rgya shes pa'o// de nas glu tshig dbyangs rnams blang// rtag gnyis kyi bar 'di dpyad// par ha sa d+hir rka sor sna rta// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// sha d+ha ba dang gar+d+ha ma// bad ka de'u dang lcang ka de'u// glu drug dbyangs su blang bar bya// sna yi dbugs ring 'gro ba las// g.yas par me byung dmar la 'tsher// gyen du 'bar bar 'gro ba ste// pad+ma rigs kyi gsung dbyangs kyis// snang ba mtha' yas dges rol// g.yon par rlung byung gnag la dang// gsegs la 'gro zhing rgyu ba nyid// las kyi rigs kyi glu yin pas// don yod grub pa dges par rol// gnyis kar dal rgyu chu klung dkar// thur du 'bab cing rgyu ba ni// rin chen rigs kyi glu yin pas// rin chen 'byung ldan dges par rol// gnyis ka thur du rngub pa'i rlung// thad kar 'gro zhing rgyu ba nyid// bde gshegs rigs kyi glu blangs pas// rnam par snang mdzad dges par rol// rtsol ba glu yi dam tshig gis// mchod pa dam par bzhes su gsol// khong na gnas pa srog yin te// nam mkha'i rlung ni kun gyi gnas// rgyu ba med cing 'pho dus 'byung// rdo rje sems dpa' dgyes par rol// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// bro gar 'du 'phro bya ba yang// sil snyan phyag rgyar bshad pa rnams// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang// de bzhin rgyud lnga rgyud drug dang// las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'o// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pa// ma rungs pa yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mngon du 'gyur// brdungs pas dpal gyi gzhir 'gyur 'grub// gling bu len pa'i tshul

ston pa// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed pa// pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// cang te'u'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pas// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// rims gdon dug sel sdug bsngal sel// gnas gsum dag ni skad cig 'bebs// dpal rdo rje gling bu gar byed dang// dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs byed dang// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal sel// dpal rdo rje rdza rnga myos byed do// khe ning 'jam pa 'khar sil te// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// gu dgung dril ba'i sil snyan phreng// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// ting zhes snyigs ma'i sil snyan glu// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// ma gan sil snyan gar gyi gnas/ ji ltar byed pa'i gar byed dang// di ra dar dir sil snyan spros// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// pa ti sil snyan me tog rnga// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// ti li sil snyan me mar gnas// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// da dri sil snyan dri yi gnas// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed dang// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// ji ltar sil snyan phyag rgya dang// lha mo rnams kyi gnas nas mchod par bya'o// ye shes lnga ldan b+han da bcud kyi rnga// tshul khrims gos chen yum gyur snod kyis g.yogs// gnyis med thugs rje'i ba su'i rgyun gyis bsdams// sku gsum dbyer med sgrub pa'i rnga la ni// gsung sgra gsang sngags zhing gi rak+tas bris// rkang phran shes rab tshul khrims po bu yi// tog btags brdungs pas sprul pa'i las la 'jug/ kha cig ting 'dzin dri zhim byung la sbyar// so so'i gsung sgra zhing gi rak+tas bris// snod kyi zhing lpags yum gyur dbyings kyis g.yogs// yan lag zhing lpags so sor bsgrems la bsdam// gnyis med phyag rgya bzhi yi g.yang gzhis bsdam// phrin las thabs mchog rin chen rkang gis brdung// rnga yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// spyir ni rdzas mchod rnam bzhir 'dus// ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa dang// rang gi sbyor ba rjes mthun pa// 'di dag gsal bar bshad bya ba// de la 'os par gyur pa ni// mi 'gyur 'gron gza' las spags so// de yang rigs par bya ba yang// mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i// sems can chen po lnga po de// mchod pa'i rkyen du 'byung ba ni// tshogs dang mchod pa'i don du'o// srog gcod nyen dang ma 'brel pa'o// 'byor pa phyug po dbul po dang// bdog dang drod zla ji ltar bya// rjes su mthun par bya ba yang// 'dris phyogs gnyen du 'brel pa'i phan lan gang// phangs pa'i (14)

longs spyod gtong bar byed gyur na// 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'don pa'i bka' drin lan// lus srog bye bas mchod kyang lan mi lon// mkha' la sogs pa'i sems can lnga// sgrub pa'i rdzas su gsungs pa yang// sgrub byed nyen dang ma 'dres par// sdig med sha khrag mchod bstod bya// bdog pa che chung 'byor tshad mchod byed pa// dag sems mchod pa byed pa'i phul byung bas// ma dag stong gi phyi mchod stong gi char mi phod// bsam dag sngon gyi sprang mo phyug mo bzhin// mchod byar gyur pa rnams la mchod pa ni// spyi bo bde chen dkyil 'khor du// sum cu rtsa gnyis yi ge haM// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro snang mdzad sku// bde ba chen po'i thig les mchod// mgrin pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug la// gsung dbyangs AHlas byung ba yi// snang mtha' mkha' 'gro tshe dpag med// longs spyod rdzas kyi rnams pas mchod// snying ga'i dkyil 'khor brgyad dkyil hUM// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro mi bskyod pa// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// yid la thim pas mchod par bya// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor drug cu bzhi// rin 'byung mkha' 'gro dkon mchog dpal// aM las ma bu sprul byed pa// 'byung ba'i mchod pa dbul bar bya// gsang ba me rlung dkyil 'khor du// raM yaM 'bar ba'i bde ba yis// don grub mkha' 'gro gdon mi za// bde ba tsaN+Da'i me yis mchod// de la rjes mthun mchod pa lnga// khrag ni me tog yin par bshad// mdangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad// sha chen dag ni mar me ste// thal ba dag ni spos su bshad// chang dang sbrang rtsi bu ram chang// rgun chang gsang ba'i yum bzhin rnams// bdud rtsi lam gyi yan lag brgyad// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// mchod pa so sor dbul ba ni// rigs rnams kun gyi me tog ni// me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar// ser po mkha' la byung ba'o// rigs ni de rnams bdug pa ni// tsan+dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du ru ska// spyan ras gzigs la ka pi ta// lce pog rdo rje nyi ma la'o// rigs ni de rnams mar me la// mar me'i phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya// stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la'o// de rnams rigs kyi bdug spos ni// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan+dan spos// rdo rje can la gur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan+dan dmar// ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la'o// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang// spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rdo rje rta la dbul du rung// de rnams rigs kyi lha bshos ni// sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul bar// sha dang chang ni rnam par spang// glu

dang sil snyan grub pa dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dung// sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phyug chen skal bzang pos// rdo rje las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang// pad+ma'i me tog ldan pa ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul na dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po'i kha zas sna tshogs pa// sha dang chang du bcas pa dang// glu dang sil snyan ldan pa dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul// kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang// sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang// sha yi sbyor dang ba'i sha skam dag/ rdo rje rta la dbul bar bya'o// phul na sku dbyings gsal ba dang// khams kyi rnam pa bde ba dang// yig 'bru rang bzhin gsal ba dang// ngo bo zung du 'jug pa de// rtsa dang bdud rtsi yig 'bru dang// klu rnams gdan du bsnun pa'o// de nas dga' ldan lha yi tshogs// rnam pa bdun gyis rab bshad bya// rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi// phung po lnga la sangs rgyas gdan// 'byung ba lnga la yum gyi gdan// phyi nang dbang po rnam shes dang// yul dang dus la sogs pa la// byang chub lcam dral bcu drug gdan// nyon mongs drug la thub pa'i gdan// yid chos kun bzang yab yum gdan// reg sogs sgo ba yab yum gdan// de ni slob ma'i lus nyid la// gdan rnams tshang bar bkod pa'o// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor gdan rnams tshang// gsang ba'i khams ni bdud rtsi'i gdan// shes rab ye shes ye ge'i gdan// bde ba chen po rlung gi gdan// de kun thams cad gdan gsum ste// sangs rgyas longs sprul yab yum gdan// byang chub sems dpa' yab yum gdan// sgo ba khro bo khro mo'i gdan// gdan shes phrin las rdzogs mdzad las// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de yang ji lta bu zhig na// mi bskyod ral gri 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu rin chen pad+ma g.yon// snang mdzad 'khor lau ral gri rdo rje g.yas// dril bu pad+ma rin chen g.yon// rin 'byung rin chen 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// mtha' yas pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// don grub ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas// dril bu rin chen
