pad+ma g.yon// rgyal mo g.yas pa dr-il bu ut+pal g.yon// de gnas bsgyur ba khrag 'thung chen po ni// bud+d+ha dkar smug dmar ba'i phyag drug na/ g.yas pa ti ra rdo rje khyung// rdo rje dkar mthing dmar ba'i phyag drug na// rdo rje kha T+wA~M rnga chung g.yas// rin chen mthing ser dmar ba'i phyag drug na// rin chen rdo rje dgra sta g.yas// de gsum g.yon pa mthun par snang ba ni// dril bu dung dmar rgyu zhags bsnams// pad+ma mthing dang dmar dkar

phyag drug na// be con rdo rje dgra sta g.yas// las ni dkar ljang dmar ba'i phyag drug na// ral gri rdo rje dgra s+t+wa g.yas// de gnyis mthun par g.yon na bsnams pa ni// dril bu dung dmar thong gshol bsnams// lcags kyu se gol bcings nas ni// sha myag rta la btags pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// sgo kun lcags kyus spyan drangs sogs// las chen mchog gis gzhug pa dang// dam tshig mchog gis brtan par bya// 'jam pa'i phyag na phyag dang mchod dang bstod// rnam pa bdun gyi las byas la// 'khor tshogs 'khor los tshogs bcas la// t-il gyi 'bru bzhin gang nas ni// dga' bas tshogs rnams dges par rol// tshogs kyi bskos nyul chen mo yin// mchod pa'i phud ni nyams ma nyams// nyul bas legs par bstan par bya// ma byas bar chad byed par 'gyur// lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na// skye bo dam pa kun tshogs pas// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// yo byad thams cad 'dus pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda' dag gis// de bzhin mdza' ba 'du zhes gsungs// zhes gsungs so// karma mA le'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal zhe sdang rdo rje chen po'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ gsal bkra'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gsal bkra 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin bye brag dang/ sgom thabs rab tu bshad par bya// gsal bkra'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gdon// de yang dang po bstan pa ni// snying po phyag rgya la sogs pa// phyag rgya bzhi dang rnam par sbyar// las kyi tshul gyi 'brang ba dang// rdo rje'i se gol brdab pa dang// thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang// glu dang sil snyan gar byed dang// sgeg la sogs pa'i nyams dga' dang// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gar byaid pas// thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyar te// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg pa la// dpa' la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje khro bo snying rje la// dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la// shAkya thub pa mi sdug pa// ngo mtshar la ni A ra li// rab tu zhi la sangs rgyas brtag/ sdug bsngal kun sel zhi ba'i phyir// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlobs// blta bas mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes bya grub pa ni// mchog tu gyur pa rab tu stsol// yid la bsam pa rdzogs pa'i phyir// mchod pa rab tu sbyar bar bya// sgeg pa dang ni dpa' ba dang// 'jigs su rung bar snang ba ni// dgod dang gshe dang rngam pa dang// ngo mtshar snying rje zhi

ba'i sku// dbang phyug chen po chags pas sgeg/ de btul dpal ldan khrag 'thung sgeg/ lha min ba su ka ra dpal// btul bas sangs rgyas dpa' bo yin// khyab 'jug phag gdong seng ge 'jigs// 'jigs par byed pas 'jigs su rung// gzhon nu smin drug rnga gad dgod// thul phyir bde gshegs bzhad par grags// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po gshe// brtul bas bcom ldan gshe ba'i tshul// sgra gcan nyi zla khar 'jug rngams// longs spyod chen po rngams pa'i sku// klu chen po shas sa g.yos mtshar// yan lag brgyad ldan ngo mtshar nyid// brgya byin lha rnams snying rjes skyong// de btul snying rje'i nyams dang ldan/ 'di nas tshig rkang kha shas chad/ de bcom bskal pa'i med dpung bzhugs// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis// rgol ba bdag dang gar byas te// da nas rgol ba ci rigs par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// sgeg pas 'gro ba shes rab skyes// dpa' bas mdzad spyod nyam nga med// gdug rtsub rgyan kyi brgyan pas 'jigs// rgod pas rmad byung chos 'khor 'chad// gshe bas log lta tshar yang gcod// rngams pas smon lam phyi bshol med// snying rjes yal bar mi dor 'dul// nyon mongs sgrub pa'i rgyur mdzad mtshar// khro drag dbyings las ma g.yos shing// de nas slar yang rgol ba la// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur// rgol bas de nas tshul bzhin du// pad+ma gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur// de nas slar du rgol ba yang// rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur// de nas phyir yang rgol pa ni// rdo rje rta mchog 'byung bar bya// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang// bdag nyid 'byung bas rab tu 'grub// de ltar rab tu gar byas te// de las gang zhig pham 'gyur pa// tshogs la de ni tshogs kyi zas// yon dang bcas par dbul bar bya// mchod pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// rtog pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin rtag par bsrung bar 'gyur// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang// mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams dang// bdud dang sems can dmyal ba rnams// 'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub yon tan phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang// phyag rgya'i mchog rnams bsgrub par 'gyur// de yang phyag rgya dang/ nye ba'i phyag rgya dang/ 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang/ lag gi phyag rgya dang/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ lan du brgal bar bya'o/ gar dgu'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// de nas ting nge 'dzin bstan te// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor pa// ji lta'i dbyings dang

gzugs su ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la bzhugs par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// chags pa med cing ma chags med// dbu+u ma yang ni dmigs su med// bud med kun gyi rgyu sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa theg pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pa mi gos te// rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes pas yongs mi gos// ji ltar pad+ma tshon bsgyur kyang// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos te// de ni gnas kyi nyes pa yis// 'gro la phan phyir mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag la// nor chen bde ba chen po ste// khams gsum dbang po thob pas ni// sems can don rnams bstan par bya// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag pa ma lus pas// thams cad rgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa'ang ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bsgyur ba shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing// bde ba myong ba rab sbyor ba// mdzes par blta ba'i gar byed pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang// thal bar gyur kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam par bsgyur// rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ mdzes par blta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byed bslangs nas ni// zos na slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bas blta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa yang dag bsgrub// gsal bar blta ba la gnas pa// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa shin tu kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// sgeg la sogs

pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing// rim gro bar ni bcas pa'i mchog/ sgeg pa'i blta bas gar byed pa// mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rjes tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khro las 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar blta zhing legs par gnas// drag po dbang po nyed dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rjes tshangs bcas pa'i// rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags myos pa'i g.yen spyo ba// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs blta// g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/ rab tu dga' bar blta zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang thar bar byed// spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba// rta mgo ljang ser kha dog gsal// so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan nas// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan nas// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dga' bar byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yen spyo ba'i// sgeg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// bde ba rgya cheraston pas 'dzum// dgyes pas ma mchu mnan pa ni// rin chen 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya yis// khams gsum 'dod pa ster bar byed// sha chen gyi ni ro myang zhing// ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun gyi ro myang zhing// ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// bde ba myong ba las sbyor ba// zam zim blta ba rnam bsgyur bas// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par blta ba'i gar byas pas// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor

bas// blta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas// blta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas// blta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur// blta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas pas 'dzum// blta ba gsal la bde bar gnas// blta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sgeg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan// sgeg bcas blta ba'i gar byed pas// blta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ blta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// na maHstu sarba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par thams cad 'grub// ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sarba Ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// su b+ha gA staM ma hA na de bi hi ri/ mi ri/ ri ti/ ni ri shri ye swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// trAM b+ha pa TA TA// tra Ta tra Ta/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// oM shrI badzra pad+ma b+haD+Da b+ha mu kha/ yau gI shwa ri hi hi hi hi/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// byang chub rdo rje lcam dral gyi// phyag rgya gtso yis lce la sgrol// 'khor gyi chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gtso bo rang gi rigs shes so// de nas rigs can ma lus pa// dpa' bo dpa' mo brda' yis sprad// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying pa'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// sri zhur bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa'i las byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon pa bteg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas bgad na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// khams gsum dag kyang phyag byed 'gyur// thal mo pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin// sbyor ldan rang gi snying gar bcing// mthe bong mthe chung 'dab ma bzhin// rgyas pa 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus kyi yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba// snying ga kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying

pa'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas na// khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na// mthu bsnyems gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas mnyes pa'i brda yin pas// phyag 'tshal phyag rgya shes pa'o// dpa' bo khro rgyal byang chub sems// dpa' mo khro mo sems ma'i tshogs// brda' dag bya ba 'di ltar bshad// chos rnams brda' ltar med rig bya// brda tsam len pas sgra dpes mtshon// brda' yi gsang bas gsang bsgrub phyir// 'grub rnams don 'di shin tu bcas// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod chags sras yin te// gti mug 'dod pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang pa yis// rang gi nu ma rab bstan nas// mgo bo rab tu bsdu byas na// phyag byed bde ba br-is pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa dkur brten na// phyag lan de ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa 'og tu bzhag pa ni// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no// g.yon pa'i smin ma bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yi// g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan byas// g.yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnyes byas te// de ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de ni mtshan mar shes par bya/ g.yon gyi khro mo bsgrengs nas ni// nam zhig so ltar bstan byas na// lus chen de ni khros 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yis rtags shes bya// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'gying pa yis// lag pa snying gar brkyang byas te// dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan nas// de skyes mdza' ba rab tu brtag/ chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod par mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang// rdo rje pad+mor brtsan par bya// sbom po nam zhig mthong ston na// de tshe ston mo sbyin par byed// gal te shin tu mthong ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lcags kyu drangs byas te// de tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na// de tshe nges par 'ong byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung// de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyi ni nam bstan na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul nas// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// gzhan yang rab tu rgyas bshad bya// brda yi dam tshig ston pa ni// spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa// phyag 'tshal bar n-i ston pa yi// dpral bar reg par byed pa ni// phyag lan yin par shes par bya// smin ma bsgyur ba gang yin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda'// g.yas pa nam mkhar 'gro ba

'grub// g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o// rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda'// g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin de// g.yas pa legs par blangs pa yis// g.yon pa legs par smra ba'o// sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda'// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong// g.yon pa bdag la dr-i slong ba'o// lce ni ldag pa ltar byed pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin// mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// dam du ma mchu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg na bde// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin du// brda' yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// rtog pa thams cad smra ba'i mchog/ snying gar gyen du 'dren pa ni// rang byung phyag rgya'i brda' 'grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste// 'khor ba shin tu sdud pa'o// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// brda' yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yis// chos kyis 'khor lo chen po dkyil// rang gi dbang po bsgreng ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda' yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brda' yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa slar du btang ba'o// dpung pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// bdag la 'khyud pa'-i phyag rgya yi// g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshur bcangs nas dgrol ba dag/ g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams thong shig pa'o// brla gnyis rab tu bsdam pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson// g.yas pa chos la brtson pa'o// pus mo'i lha nga'i brda dag ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa rab tu 'dud pa'o// pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ brda' yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bcing pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dgrol// rkang pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa thams cad gnon pa'o// g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms// a ti pu zhes bya ba'i brda'// de ni phyag 'tshal zhes ston pa'o// pra ti oM d+hi b+hu zhes pa ni// phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o// dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// rang don las rnams

gang bsgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// brda' yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// de ru dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgoms nas ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir lham pa la// bshang gci cho ga bzhin byugs nas// yid 'ong slob mas thig bzung la// ngos bzhi dang ni gru bzhi dang// sgo bzhi par yang gdab par bya// dbus ni rab tu zlum po la// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu// phyogs bzhi dang ni dbus lnga la// rigs lnga yab yum bkod pa dang// mtshams su nang gi sems dpa' ste// gru chad byams pa la sogs pa// yab dang yum du bcas pa dang// bar khyams kun bzang yab yum dang// thub drug sems dpa' bcu drug sogs// sgo bzhir sgo ba yab yum brgyad// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// le tshe dgu par mkhas pas brtag/ bar khyams gnyis dang ldan par bya// phur bu srad bu mtshon cha'i chas// thabs dang ldan pas bsgom zhing brgyan// kham phor pad+ma mtshan ldan pas// dpal dang ldan pa'i yi ge bri// ye shes gsal ba'i 'od kyang dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsgom// A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' yi yang kha yi nang du 'dud par bya// de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams// yi ge thams cad dgod par bya// gug bskyed dag gis lcug mar bya// yi ge ra ni myu gur bya// klad kor zla ba kham pa dang// tsheg gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dpal gyi ngo bor bshad// oM AHhU~M swA hA// oM ni bde gshegs kun gyi sku// AHni chos 'dzin rnams kyi gsung// hUM ni sangs rgyas thugs rnams 'dus// swA yis yon tan yid bzhin 'phel// hA ni las rnams thogs pa med// regs lngar chos dbyings sangs rgyas 'dus// yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar byed// bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor zhes// rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na// sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// chags chen grol ba dpal zhes pa'i// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar byed// grol ba kun la rab tu gnas// snying rje dri med khro dpal zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dngos grub kyi ni mchog tu 'gyur// pad+ma chags pa dpal dag ces// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dag pa thams cad rnam par dag/ rdo rje nyi ma dpal mdangs shes// bstod dang bcas pa'i

mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// longs spyod can la rab tu gnas// rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub// bris na bsod nams che bar 'gyur// brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams dag/ ma lus par ni rab tu 'grub// 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra dang// srid pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra dang// brjod pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra dang// de 'dra'i 'khor lo'i mchog gi mdzes// lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ slob dpon gang dang gang dag gis/ de dang de yi mtshan dag ni/ dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod// de nas las kyi phyag rgya 'di// dam tshig dam pas bshad par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dam par bcing// mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su bya// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de nas bcing bar rab tu bshad// g.yon pa rdo rje mdzub mo bzung// g.yas pa nang du bsgreng par bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste// sangs rgyas byangachub snying byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yi sa la rig pa'o// rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za yi mi 'jigs mchog/ denas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems rnams ni// rdo rje las rnams byed pa'o// bgyis byas gsod par gnyis ka yin// lcags kyu 'dzin par gnas pa dang// mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni// legs so zhes bya snying gar bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya// g.yon pa la gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yi ni g.yon par dbye// snying gar g.yon par ral gri mdung// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yin// rdo rje gnyis pa kha nas dbyings// rdo rje gar bskor sgrol ba dang// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba'o/ rin chen myu gu ral gri 'dzin// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin// klu shing chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin// rin chen nyi ma ut+pal 'dzin// khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje 'gyings pa'i tshul gyi ni// bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya// phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung// rdo rje gar gyis bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin gzhan// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yin// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyu+u bcings pa ni// mthe chung las te lcags kyu che// mkhrig ma mdud nas mdzub gnyis mdud// rgyab gnyis dang ni brkyang ste mnan// de nas 'di rnams bsgrub par bshad// rdo rje las byed mnyam

pa'o// rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni// rang gi snying la goms par bya'o// lha mo bzhi yi las kyi rgya// de nas brtul zhugs bsam bya ba// sgeg la sogs pa'i ro ldan pas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i mchog 'di yis// bdag nyid la ni mchod par bsam// rdo rje'i thal mo mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje bcing ba bsdam par bya// de la dga' byed dbang bskyed pa'i// mda' yi tshul du gzung bar bya// snying gar 'bigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// de yi las rnams thams cad byed// bde gshegs myang ngan 'das kyang rung// bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed// bcing ba de nyid bcings byas te// rnal 'byor stong de gzung bar bya// chung ngu shin tu brkyang byas te// de bzhin sbom po brkyang bar bya// de dag las kyi phyag rgya ste// g.yon du 'gyings pas gar rnams bya// rdo rje khu tshur mchan khung gnyis// g.yon du 'gyings pas gzhag par bya// de dag las kyi phyag rgya ste// las rnams phyag rgya shes pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad gzhug/ rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya ni// thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdam phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las byung ba'o// de dag bsdams pa rdo rje ni// bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// gung mo myu gu ltang mnyam bsgreng// gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad// gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang// gung mo pad+ma 'dra bar dgug/ de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o// sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yis// dam tshig 'dzin dang phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub las rnams yang dag bshad// zla ba lta bu lag gnyis kyi// gung mo sor mo rab sbyar te// tha ma'i sor mo ngaus mi sprad// rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'o/ mdzub mo lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyar// legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yin// dngos grub phyag rgya mang po'o// mthe bong gshibs la mdzub gnyis bcag/ rtse sprad rin chen rdo rje yin/ de nyid gung mo srin lag dang// mthe chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o// de la srin lag mthe chung gnyis// mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no// de nyid las ni bskaur nas kyang// de yi kha phyogs bzhad pa'o// mthe bong gnyis kar mnyam par gzhibs// mdzub mo gnyis ga dgug pa dang// gung mo bsgrengs ba'i rtse mo dgug/ de nyid rdo rje ral gri'o// de nas srin lag mthe chung gzhibs// 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin// bsnams pa'i mthe bong gnyis bkrol la// bkan te kha sbyor bzhag pa'o// mthe

bong mthe chung rtse sprad de// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// de la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pa// snying gar brkyangs te bzhag pa'o// mdzub mo rtse bkug mche ba ltar// mthe chung bar ni mi 'byar bya'o// mthe chung gnyis bar mthe bong gnyis// mdzub mo snying gar bcings pa'o// snying gar mthe bong mnyam ste bzhag/ rab tu brkyang na phreng ba'o// thal sbyar rtse mo kha nas dbyings// gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje bcings pa thur du btang// thal mo sbyar ba gyen du gtor// mthe bong mnyam ste rab tu bsdams// rab tu brkyang na byug pa'o// mtheb mdzub bkug la gung gnyis sbyor// sbom po mthe chung sbyar gsum bsgreng// lag gnyis sor mo pad+ma bya// gung gnyis rtse sprad rtse lngar bya// g.yas pa bsgrengs pa klu shing 'dra// thal sbyar 'khor lo bya ba dang// lag gnyis pad+ma kha bye 'dra// ut+pal gyen la kha gdengs bya// mdzub mo gcig po bkug pa dang// mthe bong gnyis ni mdud par 'dor// mthe bong gnyis po mdud par bcings// rdo rje bcings pa mdzub mo bsdams// yang na lha rnams so so'i tshul// bcings shing mkha' la dgrol bar bya// las dang thun mong nyid du bshad// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// sor bsnol bsdams pa dam tshig ste// sems kyi shes pa ldan pa las// gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin// nang gi lha mo'i phyag rgya rnams// gar gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa dang// las dang dam tshig mtshams mtshams bya// sgo bzhi so so'i las dang ni// dam tshig phyag rgya la sogs pa// lha rnams spyan drang dus na bya// dam tshig phyag rgya shes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje gsal bkra'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gdon pa 'di/ 'gro ba'i ched du brjod de sku gsung thugs las byung ngo// ci 'dod khrus byas sna tshogs gos gyon nas// tshom bu'i gral bshams log 'dren mtshams bcad dang// brda' sgo dbye dang rgyan chas mnga' gsol dang// rgyu 'jug phrin gdags lan stsal ting 'dzin bsgom// spyan drang las la bzhugs gsol dam tshig bstan// phyag rgya lha mo gar tshogs gsod pa dang// rnam pa bcu drug rtsis mgor shes byas nas// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor phan phyir gsal bshad na// de nas ci 'dod khrus byas te// dri zhim rgyan gyis bklubs pa yi// sna tshogs gos ni bgo bya ste// dri zhim phreng ba gdags par bya// a mr-i ta lngas khrus byas nas// las bzhi'i rgyan dang cha lugs gos// thams cad mdzes par snang ba'o// dge skos gral rnams bsham par bya// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas par bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs ni sku

gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yis// tshom bu gsum pa'i lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// dam pa'i mchog ni dam pa yi// thig le stong pa tshom bu brgya// rnam pa kun dang ldan pa yi// mchog rnams kyi ni dgod par bya// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang// pho nya bka' nyan phyag brnyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyi// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// dkyil 'khor spros pa bsgom par bya// grub pa sngags kyi yi ge las// tshom bu spros pa bsgom par bya// khams kyi bdud rtsi chen po las// phyag rgya spros pa bsgom par bya// snying po rlung gi dbye ba las// rnam grangs spros pa bsgom par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo grub pa rnams// rigs dang sbyar nas gral rnams bshams// log 'dren mtshams bcad rnam pa brgyad// bcol dang bsrung dang phyag mtshan nam// tsham rngams 'gros dang chos nyid rang bzhin mtshams// ting 'dzin mtshams dang rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan// bcol ba'i mtshams ni khyed la rab bshad de// de yi phyag rgya bang rim 'khor ba yi// dpal dang ldan pa'i maN+Dal bcu bzhi la// zab cing rgya che gzi 'phags phyogs skyong bzhi// thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dkyil chen bcu// lha yi bkod pa rim bzhin spyan drangs te// thugs ka nas ni mchod pa rim bzhin gsol// de yi gtor ma'i bye brag bstan pa ni// bza' ba ci 'byor bu ram can// swa ti ka dang u lo pa'i// lag pan rtsa ba 'bras bu dang// 'o thug dang ni 'dod pa ste// de ni thams cad 'dod ces bya// de rnams nyid la ci mnyes pa// kha dog sna tshogs zhes bya'o// gang gzhan cung zad lhag pa ni// kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su// dngos po de dag nyid la ni// sna re las kyang mar byas la// gzhan dag las kyang ci rnyed pa// bstan pa gtor ma rgya chen yin// 'bras bu la ka li ka dang// sran chal til gyi pri ta ka/ lag pan rtsa ba 'bras bu las// cung zad bdun las cung zad dang// me tog 'bras bu chur bcas pa// 'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma de// phyi rol 'byung po thams cad la// de ni 'byung po kun gyi'o// mchod pa sna lnga 'dir bshad pa// nya sha chang dang bu+u ram chang// bza' dang sran ma'i khu ba dang// dri dang me tog la sogs ldan// gtor ma 'di ni phyi ru bshad// de nyid rnam grol phung po lnga nyid du// mchod pa sna lnga tshul bzhin dbul bar bya// ting 'dzin mthur ldan rnam grol gzi byin can// shes rig grags pa tshul khrims 'khor gyis bskor// mya ngan 'das pa

bdud rtsi ro yi bcud// ye shes gong nas gong du khyad par 'phags// lhan cig g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar bsngo// bde ba'i stan la lag na rdo rje yi// bdag nyid bcu po tshul du phyung nas ni// phyogs kyi lha rnams so so'i gnas gnas su// dbang ldan phyogs nas gtor ma tshul bzhin 'bul// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi gtso// dbang bdag gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon tshogs bcas pa la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// me ste bsreg bya len pa'i lha// 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar lho me lha'i tshogs bcas la/ mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i tshogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ bden bral phyogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// yang dag bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs klu yi gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung lha 'khor gyi gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na dbyug to thogs// nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi lha ste sa yi klu// sa 'dzin dang ni lag chen dang// dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha mang thams cad dang// nyi ma zla ba gdon gyi gtso// gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la// mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// zab cing rgya che gzi 'phags pau// chos skyong rgyal po rnam thos sras// btsun mo sras dang blon porabacas// mngags pa'i pho nya ji snyed rnams// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// gzhan yang de yi tshul mchog tu// chos skyong rgyal po yul 'khor srung// chos skyong rgyal po 'phags skyes po// chos skyong rgyal po spyan mi bzang// oM i/ oM i/ oM a/ oM ya/ oM ra/ oM ba/ oM yaM/ oM ku/ oM bra/ oM A/ oM bai/ oM d+h+r-i/ oM bi/ oM k+Sha/ sgra dang ldan pa'i snying po brjod// yul 'khor srung ba'i zhags pa'i rgya// mthe'u chung gnyis ni zhags pa'i mig/ 'phags skyes po yi be con rgya// lag gshibs mtheb bsgreng mthe'u chung zhags// mig mi bzang ni rdo rje'i rgya// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mor bya// rnam thos sras ni dbyug to'i rgya// 'the (15)

bong gnyis ni gshibs te bsgreng// brgya byin gyi ni rdo rje gdengs// g.yas kyi rtse gsum phyag rgya gdengs// me lha'i phyag rgya zhags thabs yin// g.yas kyang mdzub bkug gung tshigs gsum la btang// smra 'dod dang ni me 'bar lta bur bya// gshin rje'i be con phyag rgya te// lag bsnol srin lag gshibs te bsgreng// bden bral ral gri'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa khu tshur gung mdzub ral gri'i rgya// g.yon pas sta zur shubs su bzung// chu lha zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste// lag g.yas mthe'u chung zhags pa'i mig/ rlung lha'i ba dan phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa gung bsgreng mdzub mo dgug/ ku be ra yi dbyug to ni// bcings la nang bzlog mthe chung brkyang// srin lag gnyis brkyang rgyab tu bzhag/ dbang ldan rtse gsum phyag rgya ste// mthe bong srin lag mig tu bya// mthe'u chung mig 'bras so sor drang// gung mo rtse sprad mdzub mo rtse gsum gdengs// 'og gi pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste// lag gnyis pad+ma lta bur bya// steng gi me tog phyag rgya ste// khong stong mtheb gshibs spyi bor bsgreng// lcags kyu drangs nas slar bskyod pa// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba ni// A gats+tsha dang A gats+tsha'o// rgyal chen phyogs skyong so so'i 'khor bzlog cing// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad bsrung ba dang// dam bcas zhal ches khas blangs lha dag ste// brtan par brjod la tshul bzhin bsrung du gsol// bstod dang phyag rgya drag tu bstan pas gtugs// phyag rgya lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas la// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa shud+ho\u0f85 haM/ zhes brjod do// chos kyi dbyings su bsgom zhing spyod// rig sngags rgyal po stobs bzang nam mkha'i mdzod 'di bzlas// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yeHsarba thA khaM ud+ga te/ s+pha ra i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ lag pas spyi bor spyar nas pad+ma kha bye ba// ji ltar thogs med bsam pa bzhin du byung ste spel// gzhan yang 'phags pa rgyal chen shugs ldan 'od kyi na// sngags kyi mdo 'dis kyang byin gyis brlab par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bsgreng ba ste// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ zhes brjod pas ni tha na chung na yi dwags yan chad la/ yul chen ma ga d+ha'i bre chen brgya brgya la// pham rgyal med par tshul bzhin spyod pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thal sbyor sngags 'dis byin brlabs te// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'us mnan byas te// sor mo lhag ma rnams ni rtse gsum brkyang byas nas// oM a mr-i ta hUM zhes brjod thob pas yid bzhin 'byung zhing dag par 'gyur bar bsam// gzhan yang ye shes skar mda'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis gtugs te// lag pa g.yon

pa'i thal mos gtor mar rab gtugs la// oM dz+nyA na a wa lo ki te/ na ma \u0f7fsa man+ta s+pha ra Na rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza la ni hUM// 'dis kyang so sor thob par bya ste brnan par bya'o// phyag rgya rnam bzhir bstan pa gtor ma spyi'i cho ga'o// des ni gtor ma thams cad gtang zhing mtshams su 'gyur// de nas bsrung ba'i mtshams ni gcad par bya// rtsibs bcu rim pa bcu ser ba'i// khro bo bcu dag phyung nas ni// hUM las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i steng// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor phyogs rnams su// rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// de btab nas kyang phyogs bcu yi// phur pa'i phyogs nas char chen 'bebs// 'jigs su rung ba'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// dri za'i phyogs nas glo bur ba// mtshams kyi snang ba nam nangs bzhin// raka sha'i phyogs nas 'ongs pa ni// 'chi bdag gzugs can 'jigs 'jigs ltar// ral gri thogs shing sgra chen 'byin// sna chen mo la mi thod du// mi yi khrag ni 'thung byed pa// mgo skra gyen du brjes shing 'bar// skyin thang char bzhin 'bab pa yis// sgrub pa'i las rnams 'jigs par byed// 'bar bya phyogs nas sems can ma// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can tha dad pa'o// pa ni'i phyogs nas lto 'phye'i bdag/ sprin dang bcas pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// srog 'dzin phyogs nas 'chub ma 'byung// yak+Sha pho mos byang phyogs nas// dbang ldan phyogs nas tshogs kyi gzugs// steng nas mthu chen lha rnams 'byung// 'og nas sa 'gas g.yo bar byed// sgrub pa chen po sgrub chen la// 'di la sogs pa bgegs rnams ni// nam gyi phyed na 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad bla sa 'og/ khro bo'i rgyal pos bdud rjes 'joms// ya mtshan che la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs 'byung po thabs kyis 'dul// lho phyogs gshin rje zhabs kyis gnon// nub phyogs klu yi gdon rnams 'joms// byang phyogs gnod sbyin kun gyi bla// mtshams kyi khro bo chen po yis// mtshams kyi bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod// khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rje 'joms// ya mtshan che la phyag 'tshal te// bdud dgra thams cad yongs bcom nas// bgegs rnams thams cad zhi bar mdzod// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tan phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nya pa ya te/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ khro bo so so'i ming nas phyung zhing gdab// de yang don gsum ldan par gdab pa ste// mi dge bcu yi bgegs rnams mnan pa dang// phyogs skyong 'jigs rten thugs rjes bzung ba dang// mkha' dbyings ldan pa'i sprul pas don bya'i phyir// de ltar rtogs ldan nyes pa gting nas med// de nas lta ba'i

mtshams ni rab bshad bya// zhi gnas lhag mthong nyi zla'i spyan las ni// khro 'gros nyi gdugs zer 'phro mtshan ma sregs// 'byon tshul zla ba'i bsil bas kun zhi nas// blta ba gnyis kyi phyag rgyas 'gros gnyis bzlog/ tsham rngams kyi ni mtshams bya ba// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms nas// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// yan lag snying po rtse gcig dang// rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu+u gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod pas ni// pad+ma chags med re re 'byung// rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor nas// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bskyod byas na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rigs 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs pas// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang// bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnan// chos nyid mtshams ni don dam ste// rnam par rtog pa bgegs yin te// bgegs kyang rang gi sems las byung// sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas dag shes na// gzhan na bgegs zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// rang bzhin kun rdzob mtshams gcad de// rdo rje phung po yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing// sangs rgyas ma yin bgegs med do// gsal la mi 'gyur ting 'dzin mtshams// de la gzhan gyis 'jig pa med// de la bgegs kyis mi tshugs so// 'jig las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// bstan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo// de phyir khyad 'phags ting 'dzin bsgom// phyag mtshan mtshams ni 'di dag gsungs// steng yang rdo rje'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi'o// bar mtshams med par rdo rjes gtams// rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang 'khor lo'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang 'khor lo'i sa gzhi'o// bar mtshams med par 'khor los gtams// 'khor lo'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang ral gri'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang ral gri'i sa gzhi'o// bar mtshams med par ral gri'i gtams// ral gri'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang rdo rje'i tho ba ste// 'og kyang rdo rje'i tho ba'o// bar mtshams med par tho bas

gtams// tho ba'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng yang rgya gram bla bre ste// 'og kyang rdo rje rgya gram mo// bar mtshams med par rgya gram gtams// rgya gram mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ steng brag rdo rje'i bla bre ste// 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi brag/ bar mtshams med par rdo rje'i brag/ brag gi mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ oM badzra larka phaT// badzra dz+nyA na tsak+k+ra phaT// badzra tik+Sh+Na phaT// badzra mung+ga ra phaT/ badzra karma sarbA phaT/ badzra she la phaT// lag pa gnyis bsnol khu tshur bcing// gung mo rtse sbyar mtha' gnyis bsgreng// phyag rgya 'di ni mchog yin te// rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje yin par bshad// g.yon pa lag pa sbub pa dang// g.yas pa bkan nas thog tu bzhag/ sor mo phan tshun gcus te bsnol// mtheb gnyis log sprad 'khor lo'au// g.yon pa shubs byas dku la brten// g.yas kyi mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan// lhag ma gsum po ral gri'i tshul// glog gi tshul du bskor bar bya// lag pa khu tshur gcig tu bcing// tho ba'i tshul du g.yas su bsgreng// brdeg pa'i tshul du bskor nas mnan// 'di ni be con phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi thal mo ni// rdo rje'i brag gis btams par bya// brdeg pa'i tshul du rab tu brdeg/ log 'dren bgegs rnams gzhom pa'o// lag pa phan tshun bsnol ba las// gung mo tshigs bcag nang du brgyang// tha ma rtse mo can du bya// rgya gram phyag rgya dam po'o// lnga pos mtshams ni mi g.yel brtson 'grus bsgom/ gnyis kyi rtogs pa'i ye shes 'phang bcad la// gcig ni sran gyi mthu dang ldan par bya// de nas bar chad thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya 'di dag 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so// thabs kyi phyogs su ltung ba'i rnal 'byor la// mtshan bcas smon pas 'jug pas ltung ba dang// mtshan nyid sna tshogs nyams kyis ltung ba'o// gang zag de la dus bzhir bar chad bzhi// lam 'jug 'jig rten chos kyis bar chad byed// gnyen dus 'brel ba'i bar chad byung ba na// dad pa brtan po'i sbyin pa phra mo bsrung// bla ma mched lcam grogs kyi bar chad ni// zang zing sbyin pas brtse sems 'phreng bas bsrung// lam zhugs phyir log bdud kyi bar chad byed// rdzas kyis bsrung ba bla ma grogs gzhan la// rkyen la ltos pa'i sngags mdud rab tu gdags// ting 'dzin bsrung ba dra ba ra ba ni// spyi bo sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra ba las// rkang mthil rdo rje chen po'i sa gzhi dang// rtsib ma rdo rje'i ra bar gnas pa dang// pags pa rdo rje'i gur du phub nas ni// ba spu mda' yi dra ba chen po ste// sen mo me ri rab tu 'bar ba'o// sngags kyis bsrung pa gnod mdzes nga rgyal byed// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na g+h+r-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+Na pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya hoH/ b+ha ga wAn bid+ya rA dzA

ya hUM phaT/ sems bstan bdud stobs 'phel ba'i bar chad la// bar du gcad pa'i bdag dang bar gcod bdud// bar chad gsum ka sems dang sgyu mar shes// rang bzhin med par shes pas bsrung ba yin// sems brtan ting 'dzin ma shes bar chad bdud// lte lgog k+Sha yig gnad du bsnun byas la// srin po rU tra mi 'chams bar chad 'byung// ting 'dzin ngo shes bsam gtan gegs kyang sel// bar chad ngo shes bdud dang skyon nyid yon tan shar// de nas brda' sgo dbye ba ni// kun gyis sangs rgyas mar me mdzad// brkyang phyag byas la 'di skad gsungs// ye nas rnam pa kun ldan pa// lha dang slob dpon rdo rje'i mched// phyogs mtshams kun nas 'khyil pa'i dpal// gsal la brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ma bu'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// brda' dang gar gyis mtshon nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi 'khor lo na// rnal 'byor spyod mchog phyag bgyid do// de ltar brda' yis sgo phye nas// phyin chad mi tshig smra bcad nas// brda' tshig smra bar bya ba'o// las rnams brda' yis kun mtshon bya'o// de nas rgyan chas gsol ba ni// slob ma kun gyis me tog gtor la brjod// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po 'dir 'dus kun// dbang rnams rim pa bzhin du rdzogs pa dang// so so nyid kyis mkhyen pa'i khyad par las// bla mar rtsi ba rnams la mnga' gsol phyir// gus pa'i sri zhus me tog mngon gtor na// de bzhin mkhyen pa mdzod cig dgongs su gsol// rdo rje rgyal po dgyes shing bzhugs su gsol// rang bzhin mtshan mo'i dus ni 'di nyid du// rdo rje tshogs mchog dgyes par bsgrub 'tshal gyis// rdo rje rgyal po chen por mnga' gsol bas// mkhyen pa gsal zhing byin rlabs bskyed pa dang// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gzung du gsol// yum chen kun tu bzang mor mnga' gsol gyis// gtso bo yab dang dgongs pa bstun pa dang// 'gro ba mi shes ma rig mun pa la// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa bstan du gsol// dkyil 'khor skong ba'i bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// legs nyes tshar gcod mkhon gcugs sbyang ba dang// 'gro ba mi shes ma rig mun pa la// lha dang mi yi chos rnams bshad du gsol// ston pa 'chad pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// dam chos gsung rab bdud rtsi mang po dag/ ljags kyi dbang po'i steng du bkram nas ni// legs par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ 'dzin ging skyes bu chen por mnga' gsol gyis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can nyon mongs rnams// byams pa mchog gi thugs rjes bzung nas ni// ma nor 'dus pa'i tshogs su khrid la spyon// ging chen dpa' bo chen por mnga' gsol

gyis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can nyon mongs de// thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// 'og min gnas mchog dam par bsgral du gsol// rdzu 'phrul spyan gyi bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// rnal 'byor spyi bgegs sgos bgegs gang lags pa// ye shes spyan gyis thams cad gzigs nas kyang// ma nor mngon sum gtan la dbab tu gsol// phyi ging stobs pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol gyis// phud la dam zhing gtsang sbra legs pa dang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i mched la stobs pa dang// khams gsum yongs kyi tho ngan mdzad du gsol// pho nya rkang mgyogs chen por mnga' gsol gyis// nyid kyi dgos ched dang du mi blang zhing// bla ma rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyi ba dang// mched lcam yongs kyi dgos ched bsgrub tu gsol// mched dang lcam dral gsan cing dgongs su gsol// dza gad gnyis kyi dbang du mi gtang zhing// lha dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom pa dang// 'dzab bsnyen zur ma chag par 'dren du gsol// me tog bor la mnga' gsol te// slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad gsungs// nga ni za byed chen po rnam par 'jigs pa'o// bla ma'i bla ma chen po he ru ka/ khams gsum za byed nga yin pas/ khams gsum lus yongs bsgral la// dug gsum zad par rab byas te// srid gsum dbang du bsdus nas ni// chos nyid dam tshigs las mi nyams// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnan par bya// brjod nas gdan la 'dug par bya// de nas rgyud 'jug phrin gdags pa// ka chos mthun pa'i byang chub chang dang sbyar// gsol ka bas drangs 'phrin yang 'di skad gsol// ho phyogs bcu mtha' klas sangs rgyas zhing khams na// rab 'byams rgya mtsho kun nas 'dus byon pa'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por lhun grub pa'i// mched dang lcam dral rgyal ba rgya mtshor bcas// thogs med mkhyen cing sgrib pa mi mnga' gzigs// thugs rje chen po'i ngang can nyid gyur cing// 'gro mgon skyabs chen rtse gcig sta gon gnas// dam tshig mchog gi gsang sgor zhal 'ches la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ru 'dus pa las// mi rtog ma lus thams cad gsan dgongs gsol// do nub dus chen byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir// chos nyid nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gzhal yas khang// rgyu 'byung smin byed dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dga' ldan lha yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa na// bdag cag skal ldan mi yi tshogs rnams kyis// 'byor ldan tshogs kyi yo byad 'byor pa dang// 'os dang rigs pa rjes mthun rnams bzhi yis// dus bzhin 'byung ba'i zhal zas zla rdzogs su// rgyu med dad pa mos pas 'byor tshad bsags// bdog

tshod drod sbyar srid pa'i longs spyod rnams// rgyal chos mnga' thang khungs phyung lha yi lugs// 'jig rten khor yug bcas nas srid brin bkod// gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po 'di// mnga' thang mchod pa'i rkyen du grangs mang bsngos// mchod pa dngos su sbyar ba zho nam srang// grangs 'di tsam zhig nam mkha'i skar ltar bkram// sa gzhi rtsi shing bzhin ni skye zhing 'dod// rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs ltar ni khyab cing 'khrug/ nam mkha'i sprin gtibs bu rlangs char pa 'bab// chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab pa'i mchod pa rnams// dngos su 'byor dang sna tshogs yid kyis sprul// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod pa dang// dus gsum 'phags pa'i thugs dam skul ba dang// mtha' yas 'gro ba'i sems can bsgral ba dang// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam bskang bya zhing// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po ches// bdag gzhan don rnams mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// rgyu mchog rab zhi'i tshul du 'bul zhing mchi// thugs rje chen pos dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// de la skabs dbye gnang ba'i lan 'di stsal/ tshogs kyi zhal zas rgyu sbyor yon bdag gis// dga' ldan lha yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa la// skal ldan mi yi tshogs pa rnams kyi ni// 'byor ldan yo byad tshogs kyi rdzas rnams kyang// rgyu med bka' yang dad pas rab bsogs nas// mos pa'i 'byor ba'i tshad kyis phul ba rnams// phyogs bcu+u dus gsum sangs rgyas bde gshegs dang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi spyan du bshams// dad pa'i shugs dang ldan par 'bul lags na// thugs rje dgongs nas thugs dam bzhes par gnang// oM AHhUM a la la ho// de nas ting 'dzin bsgom pa rnam gnyis ni// sngon du dam rdzas byin gyis brlab pa dang// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin rang lus brlab// rdzas ni dza gad dam rdzas rnam pa gnyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu mi gzhug skyon// dngos grub mi thob skyon yod nan tan bya// dkyil 'khor 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams bsal ba'i phyir// dang por dza gad byin gyis brlab par bya// bum pa bzang ngan gnas pa yis// de yi dbus su bsam bya ba// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yi// hUM gi 'od zer reg pas ni// dri ma spangs shing rnam dag pa'i// rdzas ni hUM gi rang bzhin du// sbyor ba spos ni gdab par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du yang// kha dog dkar po mi bskyod pa// sa gnon phyag rgya gnas par bsgom// der ni dbang po rdo rje yi// phyag rgya bcings nas bstan par bya// der ni phyag rgya bcings pa las// bcom ldan ma ni dkar sham mdog/ sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan cing// rdo rje

phyag bsnams 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyor te// rjes su chags pa'i chags med kyis// gnyis ka zhi bar gyur nas su// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du// gyur nas bum bzang yongs bkang ba// de yis 'bar ba lta bur mthong// de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba'i// mAM ni 'od bcas rnam par bsam// de las 'od zer rtse rnams su// bcom ldan ma ni sngo bsangs mdog/ yid du 'ong ba mdzes pa'i zhal// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba yi// zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// mi bskyod cod pan gnas byas la// phyag drug rdo rje 'khor lo dang// ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsnams// g.yon pa 'gying bas dril bu dang// rin chen ral gris rnam par mdzes// rgyal mo rnam par byung nas ni// phyogs bcu'i chu khams byin gyis brlab// 'bar ma de ni slar gshegs nas// yi ge sa bon bcas par ni// byang chub sems bzhin zhur bar 'gyur/ mA ma kI ni rnam par bsgom// mA ma kI ni de nyid kyang// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du// shes rab brtul zhugs can gyis ma? chod// de nas sbom po dbang gi dbul// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// der ni mchod bcas dang dmigs nas// bdag gi lce rtser hUM bsgom bya// de yi sngags ni'adi yin no// oM mA ma ki baM ki ri ki ri/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de ni byin gyis rlob pa dang// btung ba gnyis ka'i sngags shes bya'o// de la dam rdzas byin brlab pa// de yi thabs ni 'di ltar bya// ban d+ha bcud yangs bzang ba la// 'khor yug snod bcud 'jig rten 'di// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa'i phyir// thams cad mchod pa'i rkyen du bzhes// mchod pa'i rgyu rkyen 'di la rten bcas nas// 'jig rten khams mang thams cad na// srid pa'i longs spyod 'byung lnga yi// dngos can thams cad khams gsum gyi// mchod pa'i rdzas su byin brlab po// de yang mchod pa'i mtshan nyid lnga// byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs gsum gyis// de bza' rgyan lngar snang bar bya// mchod pa'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid sa nyid gnas// gzugs su 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin// mchod pa'i 'bras bu go 'byed pa// 'byung ba chos nyid nam mkha' nyid// mchod pa gsal bar stob pa yis// 'bar ba rdzu 'phrul lhag mthong ba// mchod pa kun tu dgyes pa'i shugs// khyab par byed pa bskyod pa'i rlung// mchod pa thams cad ma lus par// rgyud thim tshims pa zhi gnas rlan// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bzed byad snod ni yul lnga'i mkha'// gtor snod chen po nang du ni// bcud kyi 'jig rten mchod rdzas dang// gzugs kyi phung po'i lha bshos ni// spyan gzigs sman

lngas bsdus pa'i rkyen// tshor ba bde sdug gnyis ka min// nyams su myang ba bdug spos dri// 'du byed sna tshogs yan lag rnams// 'dod sred byin len me tog yin/ 'du shes gsal bar byed pa ni// mchod pa'i mar me kha drug 'bar// rnam shes lung du ma bstan pa// rkyen nye bar bskul ba'i bag chags ni// so sor 'grub pa'i dri chu lnga'o// de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// sbyangs pa hU~M dang ldan pa ni// rtogs par bya phyir AHbsgoms te// 'bar ba oM zhes bsgoms byas la// yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku dang gsung// 'phro 'du'i rim pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan ma ma byung bar du bsgom// de la phyag rgya gnyis bstan te// gtso gzungs lnga ni grub par dmigs// de la bdud rtsi kun 'byung ba// mu tig dri med khu 'phang bzhin// de steng ha las rgya gram bskyed// khro ba'i sa bon hrIH dang ldan// de yis 'od 'bar sngags pas blta// ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzla bar bya'o// lag pa bkra shis gsang mtshan pas// pad+ma'i snod de gnan par bya// oM AHhUM/ badzra a mr-i ta hUM tha a/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya// pad+ma phyag mtshan rgyal po'o// sbom po dang ni dbang gnyis kyi// bsil 'od sa bon gnas pa las// dbus su drangs nas bza' ba dang/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ba gsum// kA ya waka tsit+ta oM AHhUM/ dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes bya'i phyir// dga' ba'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de// bcud kyis len pa'i gter gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhon// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// de la mtshan mo zhugs gyur nas// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// rnal 'byor bde mchog rnam pa yis// mchod pa'i dam rdzas thams cad la// sna tshogs bsam zer 'gram pa'i kha rgyan dang// kun tu khyab pa chu yi rgyan// khebs par gtibs pa bar snang rgyan// rtag par 'bab pa rlung gi rgyan// skye zhing thon pas gzhi yi rgyan// snang ba lnga po 'di nyid ni// mtshan nyid lnga yis mchod par bya// rnga sgra cang te'u pi wang dang// gling bu dung dang kar ko ta// gaN+Di chosarnams sna tshogs dang// glu dang de'u tshigs dang bcas// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyis// snyan gyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ gar dang phyag rgya stangs stabs dang// gzugs dang dbyings dang gnas pa'i rten// gdugs dang mdzes pa'i ying 'ong zhing// kha dog gsal ba sna tshogs kyis// spyan gyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// rgyal ba rgyal mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// dri dang spos dang bdug pa dang// bsregs dang bcos dang sbyar ba dang// rlangs dang du ba sna tshogs kyis// shangs

kyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bza' dang bca' dang btung ba dang// bshos dang zhal zas sna tshogs pa// kha dang mngar dang skyur ba dang// tsha dang rtsub dang lan tshwa'i ro// ljags kyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// sras bcas 'khor gyi thugs dam bskang// lha dang mi yi na bza' dang// gos dang rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang// rin chen mchod pa'i dbu rgyan dang// dpung rgyan do shal se mo do// dar dpyangs pi ta'i sham bu dang// snyan cha mgur chu bla med do// sku yi mchod par bzhes su gsol// dga' ldan lha yi longs spyod dang// 'byor ldan mi yi longs spyod dang// 'byor ldan 'phrul gyi yo byad rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// 'phags pa'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ 'bru tshig don dang man ngag dang// gsal dang go 'byed snying po'i rgyud// dbang po'i tshims byed rgyal ba'i bka'// phyag rgya chen po gsung ldan pa// chos kyi mchod par bzhes su gsol// ma lus thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin rnam pa bzhi// ting 'dzin snod bcud bdag gzhan sras// dang por stong pa byang chub sems// gnyis pa snying rje'i rnam pa dang// gsum pa rgyu las byung ba ni// snod kyi gzhal yas bcud kyi lha// bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pas// bdag gi sras su sangs rgyas rnams// rang rig bde ba'i cha dang ni// cha shas dum bu'i phyag mtshan dang// chen po lnga las sku rdzogs bya// rigs mi 'grub cing lhun grub phyir// gsol gdab dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas// dbyings las ma g.yos dbyings las sa le ba// yongs la snyoms par snying rje cir yang 'char// mkha' ltar go 'byed sprul pa 'byung ba'i rgyu// dang por stong pa byang chub sems// gnyis pa sa bon du gyur pa// gsum pa la ni gzugs sogs te// bzhi pa la ni yi ge dgod// lnga pa 'khor rnams gdon par bya// sna yi dbugs ring 'gro ba'am// snying ga'i sa bon 'bar ba dang// b+ha gar ling+ga bzhag pa'am// dbyings las ye shes chu bur ltar// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang// 'byung ba lnga dang ldan par bya// grub pa sngags rnams rtsa nang du// gsung gi yi ge yin par 'grub// lus khams bcud kyi bdud rtsi las// skur rdzogs sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom// snying po rlung nas thugs kyi dgongs// rlung gi spro dang bsdu ba yis// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yi// gnas lugs rang bzhin zhi khro dang// rang gnas phung po'i zhi khro dang// gdul bya sprul pa'i zhi khro dang// mthar phyin 'bras bu zhi khro las// dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad 'grub// rang bzhin dam tshig dkyil 'khor

bskyed// de nas spyan drangs rab tu bshad par bya// snyan gsan gsol dang spyan yang drang bar bya// snyan gsan gsol phyir se gol gnyis kyi sgras// yab yum 'phags pa thams cad sngags kyi bsdu// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa pa ri wA ra badzra sa mA dza hUM/ oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams na// rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas// bla med lha dang lha mo dang// grub pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi yab// sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// de bzhin sprul sku thub drug dang// mthu chen khro bo khro mo dang// pho nya 'jig rten skyong bar ldan// oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ dba' bo chen po'i mthu rnams dang// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzod cig/ bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// 'grub par byin gyis brlab du gsol// yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthu// nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ pho brang gzhal yas sprin gtibs bzhin// rgyan gdugs sna tshogs mdzes lhab lhub// spos mchog dam pa ngad sang sang// rin chen sna tshogs sgra sil sil// sil snyan sna tshogs phyogs bcur drangs// ta la'i skye shing gser gtso 'khril// nyi zla pad+ma dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag gzhugasakyi pho brang na// dges so bcom ldan gshegs su gsol// dbang phyug chen po yab yum dang// byang chub rdo rje lcam dral dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs chen dang// lha dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thugs dang 'thad pa'i gnas 'di ru// byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes mdzod cig/ de nas spyan drangs 'di skad gsung// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bshes gnyen te// sprul pa zhi khro mang po'i 'byung gnas gtso// 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis bshegs su gsol// thub pa chen po ye shes sgron 'bar bar// nyi zla lta bur sgrib pa sel mdzad cing// yon tan mchog gis brgyan cing bklubs pa'i mgon// mchod gnas dpal zhing dam par gshegs su gsol// rin chen dbyig ltar shin du mdzes pa'i sku// mnyam nyid ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar dag/ 'gro ba ma lus bsgral bar dam bcas la// bka' drin bsab phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// chags rab don phyir ma lus dbang du sdud// rtogs pa ye shes thar

lam 'dren pa'i dpal// chu skyes kha 'bus 'gro ba'i yid bsgyur ba// drag po'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// ye shes mtshon chen dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// nan tan ye shes sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro drug bsgral ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegasasu gsol// shes rab dbyings ma'i rigs kyi yul lnga'i ngang// chos dbyings ye shes nam mkhar gsal ba dang// gsang chen bde ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ngang// thabs kyi phyag rgyar rol cing gshegs su gsol// rtogs pa'i ye shes rigs kyi phyag rgya snang// thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// thugs rje'i spyod pas yon tan mthar phyin pa// sems dpa' chen po mchod cing gshegs su gsol// phyi nang gnyis kyi lha mo dam tshig ma// phyag rgya bzhi yi ye shes gsal ba la// gar dang phyag rgyar rol cing dges mdzad de// gtso mchog thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol// ta kr-ita khro rgyal gdug pa gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir// thugs rje'i thabs kyis phyogs skyong zhabs kyis gnon// hUM dang phaT kyi 'brug sgra ldir ba las// brjod pa'i dus thabs 'gying zhing gshegs su gsol// gzhal yas phyogs bzhi'i ye shes bzhi yi ngang// byams dang snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms tshul// thar pa'i lam ston yang dag dbyings la dgod/ sgo skyong spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegs su gsol// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i pho nya mo// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad 'tshal gyi// ye shes skar ltar 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dam tshig rjes dgongs mchod cing gshegs su gsol// de nas zhi bsdus spyan drangs pa// yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthu// nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho// rtsa sngags phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan drang ngo// phyag rgya bzhis kyang spyan drang pa// thugs rje lcags kyus thugs kyi rgyud bskul zhing// byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan drangs te// bka' yi lcags sgrog pho nyas gnas stobs la// bde gshegs bzhugs shing rnam grol dges pa bskyed// oM badzra sa ma ya A kar+Sha ya/ sarba maN+Dal/ badzra t+ya s+ya ma ti kra ma/ dzaHhUM baM hoH phyag rgya bzhis ni spyan drangs pas// gzhal yas nang du byon par bsam/ las gyi phyag rgya las la bzhugs gsol ni// rin chen seng ge'i gdan la yang dag nges bzhugs pa'i// rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes

su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas la sman slad las la bzhugs// stobs kyi glang po khri la yang dag nges bzhugs shing// rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas la sman slad las la bzhugs// rdzu 'phrul rta yi khri la yang dag nges bzhugs shing// rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas pa sman slad las la bzhugs// dbang gi rma bya'i khri la yang dag nges bzhugs shing// rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas la sman slad las la bzhugs// thogs med mkha' lding khri la yang dag nges bzhugs shing// rang gi lha mo dag dang g.yog dang 'khor du bcas// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rjes su dgongs mdzad de// 'jig rten lha mir bcas la sman slad las la bzhugs// lag gi 'du byed phyag rgya yis// stangs tshul bya zhing rigs lnga yi// yab yum bzhugs su gsol ba ni// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge// rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge// lnga gnyis zung du 'phros pa yis// sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM badzra any+dza li/ hUM dang mUM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po'i sbyin pa'i rgya// oM su ra ta ban+d+ha hUM/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing/ 'khril ba'i tshul du chos la brten// oM dzi na dzika/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// lAM bsgreng rtser mor dril gsil zhing// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud te 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// hUM badzra d+h+r-ika/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mUM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil zhing// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzin pa'i mdangs kyis blta// mUM d+hU twI shwa ri/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// swA bsgreng rtse mor rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// swA rat+na d+h+rika/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta// mAM mo ha ra ti/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi

blta// aM A ro lika/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pyAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// pyAM rA ga ra ti/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hA bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// hA pradz+nyA d+h+rika/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mo dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// tAM badzra ra ti/ kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum gyur mnyan rdzogs dpa' mo'i dkyil// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// hUM hUM hUM/ badzra tsit+ta hUM/ a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ pi wang sdeb pa ltar byed pa// lha yi thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ni kriM swA hA/ go cha 'dzin pa ltar byed pa// lha min thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne hUM trUM swA hA/ gseg par 'dzin par ltar byed pa// mi yi thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne sruM swA hA// pu ti chos 'chad phyag rgya ni// byol song thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne braM swA hA/ rin chen sgrom bu kha 'byed ni// yi dwags thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ me 'bar chu blug lag gnyis ni// dmyal ba'i thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// oM mu ne ye swA hA/ sa snying r-in chen myu gu 'bar// gzugs ni sgeg mo me long 'dzin// k+Shi hi rA dza ya/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ nam mkha'i snying por ral gri 'dzin// dri ni rin chen phreng ba ma// trAM A gar+b+hA ya/ trAM ma l+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma dkar// ro ni pi wang glu len ma// hrIHpad+ma pa dam/ hrIHgI t-i rA go\u0f85 haM/ phyag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// sgra ni phyag na gar byed ma// dziM ku ru ban+na hrIH/ a nr-i ti rA ga ya mi/ byams pa phyag na klu shing 'dzin// 'das pa dpyid ni spos me ma// mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ dza d+hU pa pra be pa// sgrib sel chos kyi 'khor lo dang// da lta dbyangs ni me tog ma// th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+ha ya swA hA/ hUM puSh+pa A be sha/ kun bzang rin chen snye ma 'dzin// 'byung ba ston te mar me ma// hUM sa rA dzA ya/ baM dI ba su gI ri/ 'jam dpal phyag na ut+pa la// ma 'ongs dgun ni dri chab ma// muM shrIHaM rA gA ya/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta ho// gshin rje mi mgo'i dbyug pa 'phyar// 'gugs byed lcags kyu phyag na 'dzin// hUM ya mAn ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje gnon// 'ching mdzad phyag na zhags pa bsnams// hUM big+h+nAM ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+h-I shwa ra dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ rta mgrin phyag na thod sbrul gnon// sdom byed phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams// hUM pad+man+ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/

bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rgya gram bsnams// dgyes mdzad ma ni dril bu 'khrol/ oM pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ phyag rgya'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ rgyal sras mchod pas mnyes gyur nas// mthar phyin dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM be ro tsa na oM// oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+yaHhUM/ oM rat+na saM b+ha wa trAM/ oM a mi tA b+ha hrIH/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ rdo rje khu tshur bcang pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ mi g.yo ba yi rgya bcings pas// yid ni g.yo ba med par gnas// rin chen 'byung ba'i rgya bcings pas// gzhan la phan pa byed par 'gyur// dam chos phyag rgya myur ba ni// chos kyi dbyings 'khor rab tu bskor// mi 'jigs mchog gi phyag rgya ni// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// las kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// ji ltar 'dod par rnam sprul nas// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de nas sems dpa' bcu drug gi/ las kyi phyag rgya las rnams bzhugs/ badzra sa twa hUM/ badzra rA dza hUM/ badzra rA ga hUM/ badzra sA d+hu hUM/ shin tu 'bigs pas rdo rje'o// mchog tu sbyor bas lcags kyu'o// phra mor 'bigs pas mda' yin te// mgu bas dges par byed pa'o// oM badzra rat+na trAM/ oM badzra sUr+ya trAM/ badzra ke tu trAM/ badzra ha sa ha/ sgrub pa rin po cher bshad de// nyi ma gzi brjid ces su brjod// bsgreng bas rgyal mtshan cher bstan te// bzhad pa bzhad pas bzhes su grags// oM badzra d+harma hrIH/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na hrIH badzra tsakra hrI/ badzra b+hA Sha hrIH/ 'dod chags dag pas pad+mo ste// nyon mongs dgra gcod ral gri'o// dkyil 'khor chol du 'khor lo ste// tshig tu brjod pas smra zhes bya'o// oM badzra karma hA/ badzra rak+Sha hA/ badzra yak+Sha hA/ badzra san b+hi hA/ sna tshogs thams cad rdo rje'i phyir// mi tshugs bsrung bas cho ga'o// 'jigs par sbyor bas mche ba ste// bcings pa'i tshul gyis khu tshur ro// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis// dngos grub ma thob bar du ni// las ma grub gyi bar dag tu/ brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni// bde chen dbyings nas rgyal ba'i skur bzhengs shing// thugs brtser ldan pa'i ye shes gdung ba yis// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang// ma bsgribs spyan gyis bdag la gzigs su gsol// rtse gcig 'dud pa'i rdo rje lcam dral la// kun nas byin gyis rlob cing skyob pa dang// mi gnyis don kun dngos grub mchog rnams kun// bdag la stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM AHhUM swA hAHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya hUM/ tiSh+Tha badzra/ bsdus nas mnyam sbyar gzhug pa ni// ye shes 'khor lo sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyar (16)

ba'i// phyag rgya chen po bdag sbyor cig/ oM tsakra sa ma ya oM// gsung thugs yon tan phrin las bzhi// 'khor lo'i tshul mchog bzhin du sbyar// lha rnams kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rang gi snying gar brtan par bzhag/ las dang dam tshig phyag rgya yis// 'khor tshogs yan chad ma rdzogs na// gtso bo rigs lnga dag la 'dus// de nas phyag gi phyag rgya yis// rigs lnga so sor phyag rgyar gsungs// ma skyes rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes ni// dmigs med shes rab yum gyi ngang du gsal// thugs rje'i bye brag sna tshogs cir yang ston// rdo rje sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med kyang// gzugs sku 'ja' tshon bzhin du so sor gsal// thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i// rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo// mdzes ma'i sku mchog 'gro ba sgrol la mkhas// ngo mtshar pho brang bde bar gshegs pa'i yum// shes rab thabs kyi gtso la mnyes mdzad ma// rigs kyi yum mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mkhas thugs rjes ye shes sprul pa'i sku// rang rgyud rnal 'byor dag pas grub pa'i sa brnyes ma// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// sems dpa' sems ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms kyis// nyon mongs log par lta ba'i dgra rnams 'joms// gshin rje gshed po la sogs khro bo bzhi// sgo ba yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra tIts+tsha ho// a la la ho// de nas rigs lnga bsdus phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal ni// mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings kyi mtshon chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal ni// rnam parasnang mdzad dag chen po// rdo rje zhi ba dges pa che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ rdo rje'i ston la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen 'byung ldan phyag 'tshal ni// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// dngos gnyis dag pas dri ma med// gsang ba gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal ni// rgyal chen rdo rje snang mtha' yas// rnam par mi rtog rdo rje'i mkha'// 'dod chags pha rol phyin brnyes pa'i// rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// las kyi rigs la phyag 'tshal ni// rdo rje don grub rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung// rdo rje sems

la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub mchog dang sa gnon dang// sbyin gtong mnyam gzhag mchog sbyin gyi// phyag rgya lnga ni rab bcas nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags tshig ldan// a ti pu ho// ta thA ban+da nang+ka ro ya mi/ ma hA yA+o gi pa ti a la la ho// de nas lha mor gar tshogs ni// stangs tshul gar sngags tshigs bcad sbyar// oM su ra ta ma hA ang+ku sha su khe dzaH/ oM su ra ta ma hA pA sha su khe hUM/ oM su ra ta ma hA s+pho Ta su khe baM/ oM su ra ta ma hA g+haN+DA su khe hoH/ rdo rje lcags kyu mkha' dbyings skul byed thugs rje'i ngang// byams pa'i zhags pas 'gro don las la gzhug/ dga' ba'i lcags sgrog 'khor bar ji srid brtan// so sor chos ston btang snyoms dril bu'i ngang// oM su ra ta badzra ma not+p+na wa ho/ oM su ra ta badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM su ra ta badzra mai tri hri/ oM su ra badzra gar+b+he hUM/ yul med sems rtogs mos byed dam tshig ma// bdag ltar ma skyes gsod byed phyag rgya'i sku// sgrib gnyis rmongs byed chos kyi phyag rgya ma// byed pa gar tshul sprul pa myong byed las// hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hrIH gI tI rwa go\u0f85 haM/ aM nirti rA ga yA mi// shin tu sgeg pas gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// dzaHd+hu pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ paM dI pa su gi ri/ ho gan d+he tsit+ta/ kun tu tshims byed bro bsrung tshims// blta mdzes rin chen phung por 'phro// 'od gsal 'phros pas kun tu gsal// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// de nas bstod pa'i mchod pa ni// glu yi ye shes rgyan 'dis mchod// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang// dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen// gang du dang po rnam par snang mdzad ni// dri med blo yis oM du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyi phreng bas bskor ba ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs brnyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yis// spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// me gsung lha mo dam bcas 'dul mdzad pa// rdzu sgyu 'phrul tshul yang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis kyang 'duga'aphrul tshul mang dga' ldan dga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa// na chung dag dang lhan cig rjes chags zhugs// g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas kyang// g.yon gyi phyag gis dril bu'i sgra snyan 'khrol// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yis// dam tshig rnams kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig gi lag pas kun la 'jus pa ste// gnyis pa rjes su chags shing bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi zad rin chen phreng bas chor// bzhi pa bde ba'i mtha' yis 'phen pa de// gang zhig glu ni len par byed pa dag/ rdo rje bde ba

can dang mnyam par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi drod nyul bas// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin bsgom mi bsgom// nyul bas gsal zhing bkra bar bya// mi ldan zhes pas bsam yas mchod// rgyud kyi rgyal po kar ma mA le las// gsal bkra'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag pos thim pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de yang mchod dang smon lam gnyis// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams 'bul ba ni// yon tan lha mo'i mchod pa dang// yan lag kun 'byung ting nge 'dzin// gzhal med rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs// sprin bkod yongs su bsngo ba dang// 'khor los sgyur rgyal rgyal srid dang// sku gsung thugs yon phyag rgya bzhi// nyon mongs lnga yi mchod pa dang// phyag rgya drug las 'dod yon lnga// nan tan sbyor ba'i mchod pa dang// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba dang// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang// phung po lnga yi mchod pa dang// lus la sman lnga'i mchod pa dang// dbang po reg bya'i mchod pa dang// kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa dang// bstod pa glu yi mchod pa dang// rnam par mi rtog don gyi mchod// bcu bdun phyir bsdus dbul ba ni// phyag rgya bzhi ni shes par bya// yon tan lha mo'i mchod pa ni// spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa mo// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bdug pas 'gengs// byams pa'i thabs dang shes rab la// badzra d+hU pe mchod par rol// hUM badzra d+hU pe d+hU/ ut+pal mthing ga me tog 'thor// zla gam rin chen 'phro 'dur gsal// snying rje'i thabs dang shes rab la// badzra puSh+pe mchod par rol// oM puSh+pe pu/ dbang gi phyag na sgron me bsnams// chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'bar ba 'dzin// dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab la// badzra A lo ke mchod par rol// oM badzra A lo ke hrIH/ tsan+dan bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig ler dben/ btang snyoms thabs dang shes rab la// badzra gan+d+he'i mchod par rol// badzra gan+d+he gan// phyi yi mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// tshad med bzhi dang rnam par sbyor// stabs dang gar byed glu dbyangs len// dkyil 'khor kun la mchod par 'bul// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sdug pa sgeg mo rdo rje'i spyan// sems dpa' sngon mo'i ye shes 'bebs// me long lta bu'i ye shes la// badzra lA s+ye mchod par rol// oM badzra lA s+ye hUM/ yid bzhin rin chen gtsugs phreng ma// 'jam dpal rnon po'i dngos grub 'dzin// badzra mA le mchod par rol// oM badzra mA le trAM// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan rma bya'i mgrin// spyan ras gzigs dbang dngos grub 'dzin// so sor rtog

pa'i ye shes la// badzra gI tI'i mchod par rol// oM badzra gI tI hrIH/ gar mkhan 'gying ba gzi ldan ma// las kyi 'khor lo rnam par 'joms// bya ba nan tan ye shes la// badzra nIrti mchod par rol// badzra nIrti a/ nang gi mchod pa dam pa ni// ye shes bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// rkang stabs lag gar glu dbyangs len// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod par 'bul// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta lA s+ye gI tI nirti pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ yan lag kun 'byung bdud rtsi ni// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang// kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// trAM/ dbyibs legs rdzing bu ro mchog bsil// khaM/ b+h+rUM rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang// rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal// hrIH/ glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// trAM/ bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// a/ bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang// rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis// bro gar glu tshigs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par 'bul// ma b+h+rUM trAr+ShaM hriH a/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te badzra sA ra pra marda ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzre badzre/ ma hA' badzre/ ma hA te dza badzre/ ma hA bid+yA badzre/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/ ma hA bo d+hi maN+Do pa saM kra ma Na badzre/ sarba karmaA ba ra na bi sho d+ha ni badzre swA hA// gzhal med rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs// ku rtsi dang ni gsan 'gag dang// dar dir dar ni sil snyan dang// yo byad dang ni ting 'dzin dang// lag stongs phyag rgya mthun par bya// lag gnyis sil snyan brdung ba dang// dung dang gling bu 'bud pa dang/ lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yab// bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang// khu tshur gnyis ni rgyal mtshan bya// 'byon tshul bskyod pas ba dan phyar// tshon 'gye tshe na lcug phran ltar// bskyod cing mtshon phye phreng ba 'gyed// lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas pa// g.yas pa yi ni lha bshos dbul// lag pa bla 'og gnyis bzhag ste// khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs gnas bya// gos kyi tshul gyi gos rnams dang// gdu bu do shal dpung rgyan dang// rna cha khams lnga rnams su bzhag/ de dag gdugs kyi tshul byas la// lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzug/ bsam gtan tshul gyi lag pa dag/ nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor zhing// sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs byung// sor mo gar gyi phreng ba las// bskyod

pas rin chen 'phan rnams gdags// gar gyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis// grwar ni pad+ma'i phreng ba bri// lag pa dril bu'i tshul byas la// dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas brgyan// gsang sngags 'di yi cho ga bzhin// rdo rje dril bu gsil ba dang// sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya/ oM badzra g+haN+De ra Ni ta/ pra ra Ni ta/ saM pra ra Ni ta/ sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li ni/ pra dz+nyA pa rA mi tA nA da sam+b+ha we/ badzra d+harma hr-i da ya/ san+to Sha ni hUM/ de la sgo 'phar dbye ba'i bya// phyag rgya mdzub mos mdud pa dgrol// de nas mchod pa kun 'byung gi/ phyag rgya bca' ba 'di lta ste// g.yon gyi mtheb mdzub kho rang gi/ g.yas kyi sbom po gzhug par bya// bdag nyid byang chub sems bsgoms la// kun 'byung mchod pa sngags 'di 'bul// oM a nut+ta ra sarba pU dza me g+ha/ ung+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na hUM swA hA// mchod pa sprin gyi phyag rgya ni// rang gi lag pa bla sa 'og/ sprin ltar btang ngo mchod par bya// sprin bkod yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba yi// rgyal srid dag gi mchod pa ni// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs bskangs la// dngos grub 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// traM rat+na pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ brjod pas 'khor lo rin po che// rta mchog glang po btsun mo dang// blon po nor bu grangs med pas// bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur rgyal bsgom// rgyal srid phangs pa med par dbul// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga yi mchod pa ni// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dge dang sdig pa'i las spyad pas// thams cad sangs rgyas mdzad spyod de// las kyi mchod
