par bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma pU dza hUM/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// gzugs la sogs pa 'dod rnams dang// chags las gyur pa'i bde ba de// sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur nas// rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga ta pU dza hUM/ nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten na// snang zhing srid pa'i gzugs rnams kun// phyag rgya sna tshogs dkyil 'khor la// sku mchog phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA yA pU dza hUM// nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten na// sgrar grags pa ni ji snyed rnams// thams cad ma lus sngags kyi tshig/ gsung mchog chos kyi mchod par bzhes// oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka pU dza hUM/ nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten na// sems can rnams kyi sems rtog rnams// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag sna tshogs la// dmigs pas dam tshig mchod par bzhes// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma d+hI pU dza hU~M/ phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam sbyor na// las dang rin chen gcig tu bsdu// nyon

mongs lnga yi mchod pa ni// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// 'dod chags spyod pa'i las rnams kun// thams cad yab yum gnyis med sbyor// sbyor ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// zhe sdang spyod pa'i las rnams kun// rdo rje rigs kyi mdzad spyod de// sprol ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// gti mug spyod pa'i las rnams kun// bde gshegs rigs kyi mdzad spyod de// rtog med mchod par bzhes su gsol// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// nga rgyal spyod pa'i las rnams kun// rin chen rigs kyi mdzad spyod de// ting 'dzin mchod par bzhes su gsol// srid gsum semasacan thams cad kyi// phrag dog spyod pa'i las rnams kun// las kyi rigs kyi mdzad spyod de// dam tshig mchod par bzhes su gsol// oM mu nu ha la pany+tsa pU dza swA hA/ de nas phyag rgya drug las ni// 'dod yon lnga rnams dbul bar bya// mdo dang rgyas dang bsdus par ni// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// ting 'dzin bdug pa rnam grol me tog 'phro// shes rab mar me dri chu tshul khrims dang// bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das mchog ro yi bcud// oM d+hU pa puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he nai wid+yA hUM/ chos nyid rang bzhin dag par ni// dri ma'i mtshan ma mi mnga' yang// 'jig rten sri zhu'i tshul gyis su// phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzad nas// rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// oM badzra A ha ra pU dza me g+ha sa ma ye hUM/ de nas ar+g+haM bzhugs su gsol// de nas bdug spos dbul ba ni// ting 'dzin mchog gi rang bzhin las// dri yi 'dug pa'i lha rdzas 'di// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe pU dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas me tog dbul ba ni// byang chub yan lag mchog gi rgyan// kha dog dbyibs legs me tog 'di// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te grub mchog stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra puSh+pe pu dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mar me dbul ba ni// shes rab mchog gi rang bzhin las/ snang zhing gsal ba'i zhun mar 'di// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te grub mchog stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra A lo ke pU dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas dri chab dbul ba ni// rnam dag tshul khrims rang bzhin las// khrus kyi yon mchog dri 'di dag/ bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra gan+d+he pU dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas lha bshos dbul ba ni// mya ngan las mchog rang bzhin la// bcud len bro

mchog zhal zas 'di// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te grub mchog stsal du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra nai wi d+ya pU dza ya s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod pa byed pas mnyes par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad zhi// oM badzra rU pa AHhUM/ dri la rnam gsum shes bya ste// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// oM badzra d+hU pa AHhUM/ sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// oM badzra shab+da AHhUM/ ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin// oM badzra bI Ni AHhUM/ reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// bdag gis rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes so// oM badzra spar+She AHhUM// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni sbyang bar bya// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom// gzhan yang rgyas par rab bya ste// mchod pa dbul bar bya ba ni// lag pa gnyis ni bsnol byas nas// gung mo gnyis ni nang du bkug/ rgyab sbyar mthe bong ngo sbyar te// mthe'u chung rtse sprad gung mo ni// spyi bor btsugs la dbyangs kyis dbul// 'byung ba kun la nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga po ste// nam mkha' la ni 'dod pa 'byung// 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ga ga na pU dza badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ bdag gi lus dang srid pa yi// zhal zas rdul phran bzhin lhags te// 'dod yon lnga ru gyur par bsam// de nas sor mo gzhan bsnol te// mdzub mo mthe bong rtse sprod de// gdong gi thad kar lan gsum bskor// hUM gzugs ni lag gnyis me long 'dzin// gzugs mdzes spyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// gzugs kyi lha mo spyan la thim// oM mo ha ra ti oM// rang gzugs dam tshig dag gis mchod// de 'og sor mo gzhan bsnol la// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad la// tshigs pa dang po nang du bcag/ mthe bong gnyis gzhibs tshogs mar bkan// dpral ba'i thad kar bsnol nas bca'o// sgra yi lag gnyis pi wang ste// bde ba'i sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// dbyangs ldan yid 'ong gzi ldan 'bar// sgra yi lha mo snyan la thim// oM rat+na ra ti trAM/ rang sgra'i dam tshig mchod par bsam// de 'og sor mo gzhan bsnol la// mdzub mo gnyis ni so sor bsgreng// bar ma'i tshigs

gnyis yid tsam bkug/ mthe bong gnyis gzhibs rab tu bsgreng// dri ni lag gnyis spos bsnams te// spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa mo// kun tu tshims byed dri bsung thim// dri yi lha mo shangs la thim// oM ra ti badzra AH/ rang dri dam tshig mchod par bsam// de nas lag pa gnyis bsnol te// mdzub mo gnyis ni so sor bsnol// tshigs bkug pad+mo 'dra bar bya// mthe bong gnyis bsnol mdzub mo gnyis// drung du btsugs te kha thad bskor// ro ni lag gnyis snod bsnams te// bcud lan bro mchog lnga brgyar 'phro// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// ro yi lha mo ljags la thim// oM Ar+ya da ra hri/ rang ro dam tshig mchod par bsam// de 'og sor mo gzhan bsnol la// gung gnyis gzhibs bsgreng snying gar bskor// reg ni rdo rje yongs 'khyud ma// mnyen 'jam reg bde 'khril khyab sbyor// kun tu sbyor ba'i bde ba de// reg gi lha mo sku la thim// oM dwe Sha ra ti hUM/ rang reg dam tshig mchod par bsam// 'dod pa'i yon tan drug rnams kyis// mchod na sangs rgyas sras bcas mnyes// de nas nan tan sbyor sgral ba'i// mchod pa dam pa dbul bar bya// rigs lnga so so'i bsnyen pa ni// phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul bskor zhing// cho ga rnam gsum tshul tshogs nas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa bde bzhir rol// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems kun yum gyi mkha' la bsdu// yab yum byang sems dbang bskur nas// kun tu 'od kyi sar bkod de// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bsgral nas// srid pa'i 'khor ba kun stongs pas// srid pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag sras sangs rgyas rigs lngar bskyed// sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'di skad 'bul// thabs dang shes rab mnyam pa'i ngang nyid las// byang chub sems sprin sgrol mar 'phros pa las// sangs rgyas byang chub nyan thos rang rgyal dang// bdud dang mu stegs 'gro ba mtha' dag ni// bsdus nas mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// sku gsum sa la bkod pa mnyes pa'i mchod pa yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra sa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM bde chen yum gyi b+ha ga ru// khams gsum sems can ma lus pa// 'dod khams 'gro drug yi ger thim// gzugs khams bsam gtan oM la thim// gzugs med shes rab a la thim// sku gsum 'bru gsum nyid la thim// 'khor 'das bde ba chen po'i zhing// mnyes pa'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dzA ya pU dzA ya hUM/ bdag gi lus las byung ba yi// phyir ldang oM las 'dod yon mchod// nang 'jug hUM gi dngos grub len// khong gnas a yis chos skur rtogs// 'bru gsum sku

gsung thugs su bsgral// sgrol ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// ta na ba d+hi ti pU dzA ya pU dzA ya hUM/ las dang mchod pa lan re re// sgrol sbyor mchod pa lnga zhes bya// rdzogs nas 'khor gyi lha mo dang// sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin bsnyen// de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi// gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya// thams cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i bka' bsgo nas// las dang mchod pa'i dus su ni// las dang mchod pa'i dus 'grub phyir// lce thog rdo rje rgya gram bsgom// dkyil du yi ge ha bkod la// mthar ni sngags char yig 'bru ni// na mo bud+d+ha sarba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ bkod nas bsgom par bya ba ste// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par thams cad 'grub// thabs kyi rdo rje chen po dang// shes rab pad+mar rab sbyar bas// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// bde ba'i bsnyen pa mchog bde nye// bde bral sgrub dang lhan skyes che// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba yi// mchod pa dam pa dbul ba ni// thabs kyi snying rje chen po yis// sems can ma lus don du dbul// shes rab stong pa chen po yis// chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs par 'bul// sangs rgyas mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ oM sarba pU dza me g+ha pU dzA ya pU dzA ya hUM/ de nas bdud rtsi sman gyi ni// mchod pa dam pa dbul bar bya// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems ni bdud rtsi che// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// ga pur shel gyi spos por dri// gtsang dme med pa'i dri med chu// rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs// ma lus bsdus pa'i thig le ste// gcig tu dpa' bo'i ro rnams dang// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyor ba// 'chi med bdud rtsi ra sA yan// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi gsos// ji srid sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// thugs dam dbyings nyid skul ba'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di// bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags ni// bzhes te kun tu dges mdzod la// phul bas dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ar+g+hAM pra tIts+tsha ho// shI pany+tsa khA hi khA hi// rnam snang mi bskyod rin chen mtha' yas grub// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba yab rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod dbul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// bzang mo spyan dang ma ma gos dkar sgrol// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba yum rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas

mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// chos rnam rnam dag ye nas lhun grub pa'i// bya ba byed dang yid chos rnam dag la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// bde gshegs yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog sems dpa' bcu drug la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas gnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// sems dpa'i thugs rjes rol pa'i dbyings phyug ma// shes rab sku mchog sems ma bcu drug la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// 'gro ba'i dpal du gyur pa'i byang chub sems// sa snying la sogs sems dpa' brgyad rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar la sogs// mdzes pa'i sku mchog sems ma brgyad rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// thabs mkhas thugs rjes cir 'dul der ston pa'i// thub drug la sogs sprul sku thams cad la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// 'jigs byed khro bo chen po bzhi rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgong dbang dang dngos grub stsol// khro bo'i sku la gnyis med lhun sbyor ba'i// ye shes gzhal yas sgo ma bzhi rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// sdom pa gnas shing rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs// lha dang lha mo phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// dug gsum rtsad gcod khams gsum 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso bo la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// tshe rabs sngon nas las kyi 'phro mthun pa'i// rgyal thebs kar ging rdo rje mched lcam la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar mi 'bral ba'i// dam tshig gzungs kyis zin pa'i mched lcam sgrub zla la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes

mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// g.yo med khrel brtson dam tshig lhur len pa'i// snying dang 'dra ba'i slob ma lcam dral la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// phyis 'byung kun la ngas lung bstan// bsdus nas mtshan brjod 'di ltar 'bul// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dang// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan gnyis la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul pa'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang// yum chen kun tu bzang mo la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan dang// yum chen rat+na mA ma ki// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang// yum chen na bza' dkar mo la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// bcom ldan don yod grub pa dang// yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul ba'i dngos grub dag la stsol// de bzhin yid chos thub drug dang// sems dpa' sems ma bcu drug dang// sgo ba yab yum la sogs la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// phul pa'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// dbyings nas bskul bas thugs rje'i sprul pa 'phro// rigs kyi 'dul pa'i phrin las so sor mdzad// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub don du skong// de ni rin chen gsang ba'i dngos grub yin// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor las byung ngo// de nas rdzas kyi dngos grub blang ba ni// ye shes rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ lce yi dam tshig rdo rje la// rdo rje can gyis hUM bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga ru sbyar ba 'di// zos na byang chub thob par 'gyur// oM kA ya sid+d+hi oM// AHbAka sid+d+hi AH hUM tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas phung po rnam lnga yi// mchod pa dam pa 'bul ba ni// de nas yang dag rab gsal ba// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang// gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad gsal bar mdzad du gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po dag par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad nyams su bstar bar mdzod// oM hUM/ lha mo'i phyag rgya'i gar stabs

kyis// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bsod nams can du de bdag 'gyur// byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabs nas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// spos ni ting 'dzin phung po'i mchod par 'bul// me tog rnam grol phung po'i mchod par 'bul// mar me shes rab phung po'i mchod par 'bul// dri chu tshul khrims phung po'i mchod par 'bul// lha bshos rnam grol ye shes phung po'i mchod par 'bul// de dag bdag gi lus las byung// sman ni rnam lngas 'phags pa mchod// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs la bdag gi lus// bla ma bshang dang gci bas mchod// ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi// de nas lha rnams lus la btsud// reg pa'i mchod pa dam pa de// 'phags pa rnams la dbul bar bya// bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag la// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bdag nyid du// reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// badzra min+ta su ra s+t+waM/ pU dza badzra zhes dbul/ lus sman dug gsum mchod par bya// sha dang khrag dang rus pa gsum// rnal 'byor pa yis lag brims la// dus gsum mchod par dbul ba ni// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med// 'dod chags mchod pa 'di bzhes la// gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma hA rak+ta keM ni ri ti/ 'byung po'i ris pa mar bas zhim// zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med// zhe sdang mchod pa 'di bzhes la// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma hA rak+ta keng ni ri ti dz+wa la maN+Dal kha raM khA hi/ 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// gti mug mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma hA tik+Sh+Na kha raM khA hi/ dpal chen 'khor bcas khrag la spyon// dpal chen 'khor bcas rus la spyon// dpal chen 'khor bcas sha la spyon// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'byung po'i rus pa mar bas zhim// 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med// zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// srid gsum sems can thams cad ni// 'dod chags mchod par bzhes su gsol// zhe sdang mchod par bzhes su gsol// gti mug mchod par bzhes su gsol// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi rgyud rnams mnyes gyur cig/ thugs kyi rgyud rnams mnyes gyur cig/ sku yi rgyud rnams mnyes gyur cig/ dus gsum rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// gsung gi dam tshig bskang gyur cig/ thugs kyi dam tshig bskang gyur cig/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags

che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs dgra chen bzlog tu gsol// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// dang po gsum la lan gsum nyid/ bdun la nyi shu rtsa gcig la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bgrang ba'o// gong ma'i don yang 'di ltar shes// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gsum// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bur shes// dug gsum re re dag la yang// dgu phrug dag tu dbul bar bya// thams cad zad par bya phyir zhal du gsol// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnam gsum bstab pa ni// srid gsum dug gsum dag pas rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor sku gsung dam tshig skong// 'gro ba yun ring dug gsum bsgral ba'i phyir// tha ma'i bskul ba gsum de nyi shu gcig/ rtsa gcig lnga ru bgrangs na brgya rtsa brgyad// de nas dug gsum smon lam gdab pa ni// dug gsum mchod par dbul ba yis// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dug gsum bag chags dag gyur cig/ dug gsum rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// rgyud rnams ma lus mnyes gyur cig/ phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob gyur cig/ de nas dug gsum rang bzhin legs shes bya// rgyu ni gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang gsum nyid la// ma rtogs khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'bras bur snang// gti mug ma rtogs 'dod chags zhe sdang gsal// rnal 'byor lam mchog rgyud pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob// de nas dbang po reg bya'i mchod pa ni// dkyil 'khor lha rnams dgug pa ni// gzhug dang dbang du bya zhing mnyes par bya// oM badzra aM ku sha sarba maN+Da la dzaH/ oM badzra pA sha sarba maN+Dal hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta sarba maN+Da la baM/ oM badzra g+haN+Da sarba maN+Da la hoH// nyams kyis lcogs na mngon sum gyi// 'gyur ba'i bar du dkyil 'khor rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi dang sbyar// lha rnams lus la gzung ba'i phyir// reg bya'i mchod pa dam pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// bo la ka ko mnyam sbyar zhing// skad cig ma ni dang po la// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed par bya// de nas skad cig gnyis par ni// mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes so// thig le 'bar ba'i drod kyang 'char// de nas skad cig gsum pa la// rnam rtog bral bde'i ye shes ni// thig le g.yo ba'i drod ces bya// de nas skad cig bzhi pa la// thig le brtan pa'i drod ces bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rtogs// de ni mchod pa dam pa yin// kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa ni// srid bkod yongs su sngo zhing

'bul// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes bya'i phyir// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' klas pas// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM sa man+ta b+ha dra ga ga na khaM swA hA/ bstod pa glu yi mchod pa ni// rol mo ye shes glu yis bstod// mchod pa mjug sdud rol mo ni// ye shes glu 'di blangs la dbul// dbang po'i spyod yul rang bzhin dngos po med// rnam dag bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin sdug bsngal sel// dam rdzas dag pa lnga dang zhal zas lnga// sku lnga chos lnga gsung lnga rang bzhin dbyer med bsam// de phyir dag pas dag pa nyid mchod cing// chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim par 'bul// dri med rnam dag nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// log rtog mtshan ma mang po sprin phung bzhin// ye shes nyi zer thugs rjes rab brgyan nas// dag pa'i don du rtogs nas mchod par bgyi// mnyam nyid bla na med par snyoms pa dang// bde mchog longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi rgyan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan te// dam tshig bzhin du ci bder bzhes su gsol// de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la// bstod pa mang po'i glu 'di blang// rdo rje gsor nas dril bu gsil// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya'i dril stabs bya// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs ho// oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho// oM sku gsung thugs ni rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho// oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho// oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub ho// oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho// sku gsung mchod pa thams cad ni// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhir 'dus te// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyi ni// phyag na rdo rje lha tshogs so// tshig kha shas chad dam// lus kyi 'jig rten mgon po ste// nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so// dkyil 'khor gsum du spyir shes bya// des ni mchod pa re re la// bzhi bzhi brgyad khri 'bum du bskang// sku yi phyag rgya stangs tshul sogs// bzhi bzhi so sor brtags la bsgom// mthun pa'i ting 'dzin phyag bzhi

dang// bsnyen pa dus bzhi rdzogs par bya// brgyad khri 'bum du bskangs te 'bul// de dag shes nas dkyil 'khor gyi// lha la mchod pa glu 'dis bstod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad smin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam nyid dam pa'i mchog chen po// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam nyid dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang// tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu yongs rdzogs pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang// khams gsum kun la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur// e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// mchod pa rnams bzhir shes bya ste// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar ba dang// de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang// me tog bdug pa 'jig rten pa'i// sor mo las byung me tog rnams// skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya// yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni// bcings nas byang chub sems bsgom ste// so sor mgon po thams cad la// de yi sras rnams thams cad la// de yi sras rnams nan tan bya// mthe bong srin lag sbyar ba ni// bkra shis ba zhes brjod pa ste// de yi rdzas rnams kun slangs te// dpral ba snying ga lte ba nas// mgon po sras rnams rim bzhin dbul// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas ni// brjid pas mtha' nas gar bya zhing// mnyes par grol ba'i thal mo yis// pad+ma'i phreng bas dbul bar bya// skabs su bab na khu tshur yang// rung zhes lha la mchod byed dus// rjes su yi rang thal mo sbyar// las la gzhug pa'i tshe na ni// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// byams pa snying rje bsgom par bya// de nas bstod pa'i glu 'di blang// rdo rje che mchog log 'dren mang po 'joms// phan dang bde mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i gtso// rmad byung phrin las sna tshogs mnga' ba'i lha// rang byung khyod kyis grub mchog stsal du (17)

gsol// stobs bcus pha rol dpung rnams 'joms pa po// dpal chen log pa'i dgra rnams rnam par 'joms// rngam chen gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ba// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// 'phags pa'i rjes 'brang zhi khro mang po'i tshogs// 'gro la phan mdzad bde gshegs bsgom pa la// gnod byed bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhom pa dang// mthu rtsal byin rlabs dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ ma skyes rdo rje rang bzhin chos kyi sku// 'phags mchog khyed dang dbyer med tshul gcig ste// dngos grub stsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang// sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje che mnga' bar// log rtog sgyu ma'i tshul gyis gsol 'debs na// dus la mi 'da' rdo rje'i dam tshig can// ye shes lha khyod bdag la byin gyis rlobs// ma rig bdag gi lus dang ngag sems kyis// bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te// rgyal ba 'khor bcas thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thogs med thugs rje can la bzod par gsol// de nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i// don gyi mchod pa 'bul ba ni// rang lus rnam par mi rtog par// bshigs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom// de lta bu yi chos nyid kyi// mchod pa 'phags pa rnams la 'bul// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid sangs rgyas par// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun las 'das pa yi// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa rnam par rol// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rjes mchod pa thams cad don yod par bya ba'i smon lam 'di gsungs so// smon lam rgyas dang bsdus pa yang// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi khog 'dir ltos// mkhyen par gsol dang mchod 'bul gnyis// mi mthun par ni gnas kyis bcos// phyi rabs sgo bzhi rtsis 'go lngas// ngas ni khyed la gsal bar bstan// mkhyen par gsol dang mchod 'bul gshegs// las bcol smon lam gdab dang lnga// phyag rgya yak+Sha'i mche ba ni// gtor ma la gtug sngags 'di brjod// oM e sha hUM/ pe sha hUM/ sa ma ya b+hak+Sha hUM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM pra tIts+tsha ho// ho ye nas spros pa med pa'i dbyings// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa na// dus gsum gshegs shing bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa thams cad kun mkhyen pa'i// ye shes bye brag kun ldan pa// 'gro ba ma lus 'dul thabs su// bcom ldan rdo rje sems sogs te/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa dang// rigs mchog gzungs kyi yum dang bcas// rgyal sras 'khor du sems dpa' tshogs// sems ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// ye shes chen po'i dbang

phyug can// thabs mkhas pa yi bdag nyid kyis// mkha' 'gro rang bzhin rnal 'byor can// ngo bo nyid sku ma lus rnams// so so'i pho brang bzhugs gnas nas// gzhal med khang nas sku bskyod gshegs// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas nas// rab 'byams ma lus kun 'dus shing// 'byor ba'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// grub pa'i mched lcam rgya mtshor bcas// thogs pa med par rab mkhyen cing// sgrib pa mi mnga' don gzigs pa// thugs rje chen po'i ngang gyur cing// 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs sta gon gnas// dam tshig mchog gi gsang sgo 'dir// zhal gyis 'ches pa'i thugs dam gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gtogs pa yi// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor bcas pa// khyed rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol// ho rnal 'byor mchod pa sku gsung thugs// rdo rje las byung rin chen 'dra// byin gyis brlabs shing mchod 'bul bas// ye shes rgya mtsho'i spyan ldan rnams// dus gsum bzhugs la mchod par 'bul// de dus byin gyis brlabs pa dang// mchod cing nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang// rgyu 'byung smin byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// dga' ldan lha yi dkyil 'khor bkod// bdag cag skal ldan mi tshogs rnams// 'byor ldan yo byad tshogs bshams pa// 'byor 'os rigs pa rjes mthun rnams// rnam bzhi'i sgo nas dus bzhir 'byung// zhal zas zla tshigs rgyu med pa'i// dad pas bsogs te mos pa yis// 'byor tshad bdog drod sbyar ba 'di// srid pa'i longs spyod rgyal chos kyi// mnga' thang byung khungs lha yi lus// 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'di// srid bkod gtan pa med pa yi// mchod sbyin mnga' thang mchod pa'i rkyen// dbul na phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba rgya mtshor bcas rnams kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang// kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa 'dis// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga yi// lha mo phrin las rgya mtsho rnams// gar gyi sprin phung bzhin gyur te// nam mkha'i gza' skar bzhin du bkram// sa gzhi'i rtsi shing bzhin du thon// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar 'phyo zhing khyab// sprin bzhin gtibs nas char bzhin 'bab// chu bo'i rgyun bzhin dus gsum 'byung// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho yi// zhal du drangs nas bdag longs spyad// mnyes mchod phog nas dges longs spyod// 'dod yon lnga yi mchod phul bas// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// dug lnga rgyud gnas bag chags byang// rgyud lnga'i sems can rnams ni sgrol// gnas lnga'i 'bras bu thob gyur nas// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i thugs dam bskang// 'bras bu bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i// sems can ma lus thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang

yon tan las// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi// 'bras bu thob par mchod par 'bul// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// mthol bshags bzod par gsol ba ni// bdag cag tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dus shing tshogs pa'i skal ldan rnams// dang po gsang bsgos khas 'ches te// dam tshig gnyan po mngon par mnos// chag nyams zhig ral gyur pa dang// rtsa dang yan lag dam mnos nas// bka' bzhin bsrung ba rngo ma thogs// bsrung ba'i dam tshig mnos pa las// gti mug ma tshor dbang gis ni// bde dang sdug bsngal rkyen ma bzod// sgo gsum nyes skyon me shor bas// bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud bsreg pas// skyon bral mtshan mar ma phyin te// bsrung ba'i dam tshig nyams pa bshags// spyad par bya ba'i dam mnos nas// phyir mi ldog pa'i sran chung bas// rang sems ma dad dbang gis ni// gang zag spyod pa dman pa yis// ya gas 'jigs pa'i rkyen ma bzod// dpa' los sgyu sogs phyi tshul gyur// las rtsal tshad mar ma phyin pas// spyad pa'i dam tshig nyams pa bshags// dang blang dam tshig mnos pa las// bka' yi gzhung bzhin ma gyur te// rtogs pa zhan pa'i dbang gis na// the tshom ngan spyod rkyen ma bzod// sgrub rdzas mthun rkyen dang ma lon// spyod pa mi mthun bsrung ma 'phangs// 'jug rtsal tshad mar ma phyin pas// dang blang dam tshig nyams pa bshags// shes par bya ba'i dam mnos nas// bden yid ma ches nga bral bas// mnyan sems yun bsring rkyen ma bzod// gti mug shes pa rang rgyud pas// shes bya tshad mar ma phyin pas// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig nyams pa bshags// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig mnos pa las// dpa' brtul brtul zhugs bsgrub la 'jug chung bas// bsgrub pa dus las yol ba'i dbang gis ni// na tsha'i sdug bsngal rkyen gyis ma bzod de// bsgrub pa'i lha babs pa las 'phang gyur te// khyad par drod rtsal tshad mar ma phyin te// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// mi spang pa yi dam tshig mnos pa las// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dbyings gcig par// ma rtogs dbang gis gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i blo// kha brag gyur te bzang ngan rkyen ma bzod// nyan thos lta bur gnyis su 'byed rtogs pas// gnyis su med rtsal tshad mar ma phyin te// mi spang dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// mi smad pa yi dam tshig mnos pa las// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal dregs pa yis// gzhan du rtog pa'i phrag dog dbang gis ni// 'jig rten 'dod chags bstod smad rkyen ma bzod// rang bstod gzhan la smod pa'i las bgyis pas// gnyan par blta ba'i rtsal tshad ma phyin par// mi smad dam tshig nyams

par gyur na bshags// mchod par bya ba'i dam tshig mnos pa las// rgyang phan chos kyis bsdus pa'i dbang gi ni// mkhyen gsal gang ma mnyes par ma bsams pas// bdag nyid dman par ma mthong rkyen ma bzod// mchod sbyin thams cad dbang du ma chud pas// mnyes bya'i mchod pa rtsal tshad ma phyin te// mchod pa'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// bdag gi ma yin pa yi grogs bsten dang// rgyud mi gcig pa'i bsod nams 'dres pa dang// le lo dang ni snyoms las dbang gyur nas// gza' gtad bcas nas gzung 'dzin ma bshigs pas// sgrol dang sbyor gnas byin gyis ma brlabs par// ting 'dzin yun thung thugs rje'i gnas ma gyur// ye shes babs pa'i lha srung ma 'phangs 'gyur// gnas sbyong man ngag tshad mar ma thos pa// rnam par shes rgyud tshad mar ma phyin te// nyams pa brgyad po 'di mnong sems yid bkur// lus sems 'gyod pa chen pos mthol bshags na// bzod pa chen pos gsol lo tshangs par mdzod// de nas phrin las bcol ba ni// bdag cag sgrub pa 'dir 'dus rnams// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa la// bar chad byed pa'i sdang dgra dang// sbyor ba rku dang gnod bgegs gsum// zhi dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// mnan dang bzlog dang spor zhing spar// 'dul skal phrin las gang gyur bzhes// tshar gcad grub par mdzad du gsol// dngos grub gsol ba'i phrin las ni// yid la brnag pa'i 'bras bu rnams// ji ltar 'grub cing gsol byang la// dris bzhin 'bras bu thob gyur cig/ de nas smon lam gdab pa ni// bshags sbyong 'di rnams brjod tsam gyis// tshor ba dang ni ma tshor ba'i// nyams pa thams cad byang gyur cig/ tshor dang ma tshor nyams pa rnams// phyin chad byed par ma gyur cig/ gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas// slan chad phyir la mi ldog pa'i// sems dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ shes rab rno zhing dbang po gsal// ye shes ngang gyur sems can don// ma lus byed pa'i mthu thob nas// skyes pa'i tshe rabs thams cad du// slob dpon bka' drin lan ldon zhing// pha ma'i drin lan rjes su bsgrub// man ngag snod dang ldan gyur cig/ tshe 'di dang ni tshe rabs gzhan// skyon brjod thams cad dang bral nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi// yon tan tshad bzhin thob gyur cig/ dus kyis mnar ba'i sems can rnams// lnga brgya tha ma'i dus bab nas// bden pa'i tshig dang bral ba rnams// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon can dang// lhan cig skyes skyon dra bas 'brel// dam nyams nyes pa tshe 'di dang// gzhan du ma smin bral gyur cig/ sngon chad bsgral cing spyad do 'tshal// ye shes chen po'i

ngang gis bsgral// thugs rje gdung pa'i shugs gis bsgral// rgyud byang gnas kyang stobs gyur cig/ snga rabs dus tsher 'das pa rnams// thugs dam nyams pa kun bskangs te// ye shes bla ma'i sa non nas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gral thob ste// rig 'dzin rtsal 'chang khyad par la// ye shes gom pa 'dor byed cing// sa bcu zil gyis rab mnan te// sngon gyi thugs dam 'brel ba yi// 'grol cing brtse gdung shugs kyis ni// bdag gi stong dang grogs gyur cig/ sku gsung thugs ni mi zad pa// rgyan gyi 'khor lo thob gyur cig/ ces ni zhe sdang rdo rje yis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor blo sbyar gsungs// mngon shes mkhyen pa'i thugs mnga' bas// phyis 'byung blo mthun dgongs nas gsungs// karma mA le'i rgyud 'dir ni// mchod pa'i phud nyul chen mos ni// lha mo brgyad sogs 'dod pa yis// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// ting 'dzin ldan pas mchod pa mchod// nyul les 'byongs dang ma 'byongs blta// de phyir mkhas pas sbyang par bya// mkhas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa// kun gyi bya ba'i las ma yin// zhes gsungs so// karma mA le'i rgyud las/ thim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag chen pos/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtsor mdzad pa'i phyir/ rnon po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di// 'gro ba'i ched du dgongs nas gsungs so// don rnams gsal phyir bco lngar gsungs// snying rje 'byung dang sngon gyi gleng gzhi dang// bskyed dang bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang// dbang bskur gnas bsrung gshog bskyed rdzogs pa gdon// ma trang mnan dang spyan drangs bstim pa dang// las dang brtan bzhugs bya zhing gdan la dbab// de la snying rje chen po 'byung ba ni// sbom po gnyis ni thur du bstan// mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu mdud// gung gnyis rtse sprad srin mtheb brkyang// sa 'og sa bla bar snang nas// he ru ka dang mkha' 'gro bsdu// srid pa spyi bcings dpral bar bzhag/ thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a shang si ta sarba sa twA na/ sarba ta thA ga ta tiSh+Tha ma ma sba b+hA wa shud+ho\u0f85 haM/ de nas gleng gzhi 'di gsungs so// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ni// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ste// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur// shin tu khro zhing gdug pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bos de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro ba'i tshul can khros pas kyang// 'jig rten gsum

dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pas ni// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// khams gsum 'di dag smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgya gsal// de nas bskyed par bya ba yang// hUM bzhi 'phros dang 'dus pa las// yi ge hUM dang klong gyur te// hUM nyid bdag la rab thim pas// hUM shrI he ru ka hUM a brjod pas dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdag nyid gyur par rab tu bsgom// klong de yum la rab thim pas// klong kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya de bi ta na sho d+ha ya/ brjod pas rang gi yum nyid du// kro d+hI shwa ri ma ru gyur// he ru ka ni lnga sogs pa// hUM dang ha he phaT ces pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis khros par bzlas// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par// b+h+rUM dang tsa las 'khor lor gyur// gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// sna tshogs khro 'byung 'od 'phro 'bar// srid gsum bsreg pa'i me yin te// yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar// 'od 'phro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen pa// hUM ral pa mun dza'i cod pan 'bar// phyogs bcur khengs pa'i gshog pa gdengs// nyi ma thod sbrul mang po'i gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// phaT raM dz+wa la hUM brjod cing// 'phros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// khros pa'i rdo rje me chen po// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs pa 'bar// tsakra phaT raM hUM raM 'bar// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// so sor rang sngags khri 'bum zlos// sgra skad nga ro drag por ldan// hUM hUM ha ha phaT b+h+yo las// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas// nr-i yi tsit+ta za zhing rgyug/ ti ra rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'debs// rang gi stan dang lag char ni// rdo rje gtams pa'i brag ri dang// ti ra gsar snying bum ril 'phen// so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su// rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can dang// ma rungs gdug pa thams cad kun// dzaHhUM baM hos bkug nas ni// lan gnyis lan gsum zhal du bstim// de nas bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni// cho 'phrul bzhi yi sngags brjod do// hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM bi shwa kro d+ha maN+Da la ha la ha la phaT phaT phaT/ rigs lnga'i zhal nas sngags brjod pas// bdud bgegs ma lus rab tu 'gyel// he ma hA ru dra/ k+Sha truM karma badzra/ ma hA de ba/ ma ru dra/ hUM dz+dza dz+dza/ zhes pas zhabs kyi 'og tu gzhug/ gnyis pa dbang chen thog ser 'bebs// tsakra hUM b+h+rUM/ dbang chen rdo rje thog ser 'bebs// badzra hUM b+h+rUM yod dam// dbang chen 'khor lo'i thog gser 'bebs// tsakra oM b+h+rUM/ dbang chen rin chen thog ser 'bebs// rat+na yin nam tsakra trAM b+h+rUM/ dbang chen pad+ma'i thog ser

'bebs/ pad+ma yin nam tsakra hrI b+h+rUM/ dbang chen ral gri'i thog ser 'bebs// karma tsakra hA b+h+rUM/ zhes pas lus de gshags dral byas// rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo 'bar// rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul// dpa' bo khro bo 'jigs bcas pas// rig sngags don la yang dag sbyor// khrag gi rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs chi li li// rus pa'i tshogs kyi phung po khra la la// rdo rje zhing chen dri ngad bsungs se bsung// mthong thos rngam pa mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang rol// rak+ta dza mun+ta dz+wa la maN+Dal hU~M/ keM ni ri ti dz+wa la maN+Da la hU~M/ ma hA tiSh+Tha t-ik+Sh+NA yang dz+wa la maN+Da la hUM/ kha kha la sha ta a la la ho// 'chi ba med par srog gdon pa// rdo rje'i srog ni rlung lta bu// yang dag bsgral ba rdo rje che// skye shi med pa'i sa la 'god// badzra rA dza/ rat+na rA dza/ pad+ma rA dza/ karma rA dza ta thA ga ta rA dza/ de nas rang dbang rang la rdzogs// bum pa cod pan ming dang ni// rdo rje dril bu rgyu nas blang// lam bsgom 'bras bu gyur pa yi// brda' rnams ston pa'i dbang yang bskur// gsang dbang shes rab ye shes dang// bde chen sku gsung thugs byin brlab// dbang bskur ba yi sngags 'di yin// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya be k+She Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tI dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA kr-i t+yASh+Tha nA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas gnas ni bsrung ba yang// rtsa ni dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang// lus khams bdud rtsi lha yi chu// sngags kyi yi ge gsung yin te// thugs ni snying po rlung du gnas// gnas bsrung ba yi dam pa'o// de nas gshog pa bskyed pa ni// rdo rje lta bu'i nam 'phang gcod// rin chen gshog pas mchod sbyin gtong// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// de nas rdzogs par gdon pa ni// phyag rgya bcas te sna bug nas// yungs kar gzhi las thams cad rdzogs// srog dang rtsol ba las byung ngo/ sngags sor bzhag/ dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka a gad ta ya a gad ta ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ badzra DAk+ki ni nan/ shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra b+hany+tsa ka hUM phaT/ de nas ma trang mnan pa ni// ma trang rnam pa gsum yod de// chos la bdag tu 'dzin pas yin// gang zag bdag 'dzin kha T+wAM ga/ rgyu 'bras chad blta A kar+sha/ dus gsum rgyur gyur lus ngag yid// khams gsum ngang gnas 'khor ba yin// don gyi

gzhom dang thabs kyi gzhom// he ni gzung ba'i yul med chos kyi sku// he he ka/ ru naM 'dzin pa'i sems med ye shes yin// ru ru ka/ ka ni rten 'brel rgyu 'bras cho 'phrul ston// ka karma/ dug gsum rnam par dag pas khams gsum dbang du sdud// sku gsum lhun gyis grub cing mtshan ma gsum dang bral// sku gsum sa gsum ting 'dzin ye shes gsum// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes la// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje gsor nas 'di skad gsungs// shar phyogs 'jig rten lam sgo nas// 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// khyod ni sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs// yang dag shes rab ye shes kyi// khungs btsal rtsad bcad rang las byung// bdag 'dzin bdag gir rtog pa ni// bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzhom// bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon byed// de nyid bdag rtog yin pas na// bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis gzhom// At+ma ni ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA pa ka ra he ta pa pi ma traM ru dra hUM phaT/ sarba pa pa ka ra he te pa tri kha T+wAM ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pa pa ka ra he ta pa pi ta A kar+sha ru dra hUM phaT/ chos chen gyi ni go bgos te// dpal chen stobs kyang che ba bdag/ stong pa'i mtshon cha rnon po yis// gdab pa dag kyang de dag 'debs// chos kun rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong// rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig/ srid pa ji bzhin ye nas stong pa yin// nyi tshe stong nyid mu stegs can rnams kyis// de bas yang ni 'di skad gsungs// 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ rdo rje rnon po 'jam dpal gyi// thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang// thabs mkhas pa yi byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad bsrung bar mdzad// 'gro ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog/ gson po bde bar bar gcod pa// bdag dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsod pa'i gshed po ni// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi dngos grub mchog/ srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa des// kha T+wAM thod dbyug mi bzad pas// gshin rje bcom nas gsad par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrIHhe ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya mu dra pra b+hany+tsa kra ha na hUM phaT/ bdag po gdol pa drag po yi// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// lag pa g.yas g.yon mkhrig ma ni// khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod gnyis// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar thug pa med// de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o// thal ba'i mdog la skra 'grengs pa// khong pa nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang// yan lag rin chen dur khrod rten// shes rab dgra s+t+was gshag

par bya// dgra s+t+wa'i phyag rgya ha ha zhes// khong pa gshags nas de nang du// b+h+rUM rat+na kha ta li byi hU~M/ zhes pas khang pa gzhal yas khang// gnyis su med par bsam par bya// de nas de nang 'jug pa ni// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba ni// yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye// hUM phaT ma traM ru dra phaT// de nas lcags kyi phyag rgyas btab// rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni// 'khor bcas khang par 'jug par bya// to tsa pyang to sor bzhagatsa pyang/ ma nu da ra/ ud ma da ra/ shrI kA la la ye to tsa pyAng/ pad+ma rak+ta da raM/ ud+ma da raM/ badzra da raM/ badzra ma hA mAM sa da raM/ zhes pa'i sngags de brjod nas ni// ha ha haM zhes brjod pa yi/ sngags des sgo gnyis gcad par bya'o// de nas spyan yang drang pa ni// ye shes spyan gyi spyod yul nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs// gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ru lu ru lu/ dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM shrI he ru ka/ oM e badzra A ra li/ hriM hriM hriM/ de nas bstim pa 'di skad gsungs// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las kyang// gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra be sha phaT/ A be sha a/ shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra ban tsak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nas las la gzhug pa ni// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang// 'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a pa staM ba ka hUM phaT/ de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis// brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing// ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang// mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog rnams kun// bdag la stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya hi/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta/ tiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ de nas lha ni gnad la dbab pa yi// cho ga yang ni 'di skad gsungs// dam tshig pa la bzhugs pa yi// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang

bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o// oM badzra gu h+ye shI he ru ka sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya phaT// sku gsum phyag rgya rab bshad bya// lag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar// mthe'u chung gung mo rtse sprad nas// srin lag gnyis ni rab tu bsnol// mdzub mo gnyis ni zlum por bkug/ thod pa skam po'i phyag rgya'o// snga ma bzhin du gnas pa la// srin lag mdzub mo'i nang du gzhug/ thod pa rlan pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis snyim pa ltar byas la// thod pa tshal bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa mdzub mo zlum por bya// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo de la gtad// g.yas kyi mtho bong g.yon pa yis// mthe bong rgyab tshigs dang por gtad// gzhan rnams thal sbyar rtse sprad pa// phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya'i las 'di bca' ba yang// dmigs pa yod pas shes par bya'o// de nas phyag kyang bya ba ni// he ru ka lnga la phyag 'tshal ba/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin gshegs mdzad pa/ shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas rgud stongs// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug 'khor lo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bud+d+ha he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lu na maH/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po 'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// badzra he ru ka ru lu ru lu na maH/ rin chen dbyings ltar re 'dod kun bskang zhing// bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rat+na he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lu na maH/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing// lhag mthong me chen bskal pas thams cad bsreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags pad+ma khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lu na maH// phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// shes rab thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog ral gri khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// karma he ru ka ha ha ru lu ru lu na maH/ bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing// byams dang snying rje dgra zun mi mnga' yang// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mi gnas mi dmigs chos skur dag pa las// bdud 'dul khro bo mchog gi skur ston pa// thugs rje'i gzi ldan gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid ngang

gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo dbang phyug sku la nyer gnas shing// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ma/ gdug pa 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med rgyu// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma sring byams ma'i tshul gyi grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ban+da naM ka ro yA mi hUM/ a ti pu ho// pra ti dza ho a la la ho// de nas khro rgyal che rnams kyi// thim pa'i dkyil 'khor rab bshad bya// mchod pa 'bul dang smon lam gdab// mchod pa bcu gcig dbul bar bya// phra men gang gyi mchod pa dang// sman gyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang// dngos grub bskul dang dngos grub blang// thugs dam bskang zhing bka' log bskal// za stobs sgag gzil gtor ma bstod// phra men gar gyi mchod pa ni// phra men nyu le'i ljon tshul stabs// srid gsum 'joms mdzad dbyug thogs gau ri ma// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tsau ri ma// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed phra mo hA// ma lus thal byed rde'u thogs be tA lI// bde chen dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka sI// dkrugs nas zhal du gsol mdzad g+hasma rI// 'bar bas stong gsum stor byed tsaN+Da lI// thugs rjes 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha nI// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gsod byed sid+ha ma// 'chi bdag bdud kyi sde 'joms byA g+h+ri ma// dur khrod bgegs kyi tshogs 'joms sriM ga lA/ 'gro ba'i don grub las byed shwa na ma// mgyogs ma snyogs pa'i las byed gr-i D+ha ma// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog kaM ka ma// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA ka ma// 'gro ba'i don grub khrag 'thung u lU ma// badzra gau rI ha/ badzra tsau rI ha/ badzra pa mo hA ha/ badzra be ta lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha/ badzra sing+ha mu khI he/ badzra byA g+h+rI mu khI he/ badzra sr-iM ga la mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/ badzra kaM ka mu khI he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra u lU mu khI he/ nyon mongs gnas nas 'dren mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'ching mdzad phag gdong zhags pa ma// gnyis med dbyings su brtan par gzhug mdzad 'jig rten lcags sgrog ma// ma lus rdul du rlog mdzad thal byed dril bu ma// badzra Ar+ya te dza tang dza/ badzrA mu khe hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra b+hasmi pa la ya ba tu he/ de nas sman mchod dbul bar bya// bla med dam rdzas rnam pa lnga// ye nas drug pa'i bdud rtsi ste// gnyis med dbyings su lhun gyis rdzogs// 'chi med bdud

rtsi'i rang bzhin te// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// rtsa ba 'bum phrag bsam yas pa// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud drug sems can kun sgrol pa// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor che// sha chen mchod pa rin po che// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog/ ga pur shel gyi spos phor dri// rin chen sgron ltar 'bab pa yi// gnyis med rol pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bzhes te byin gyis brlab tu gsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa khA hi khA hi// dpal chen badzra he ru ka/ yum chen kro d+hi shwa rI dang// dpal chen bud+d+ha he ru dang// yum chen bud+d+ha kro d+hI dang// dpal chen rat+na he ru dang// rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI dang// dpal chen pad+ma he ru dang// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI dang// dpal chen bi shwa he ru dang// bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// dpal chen mi pham rdo rje dang// ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen// khro bo chen po bcu rnams dang// khro mo chen mo bcu rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// gau rI la sogs bzhi rnams dang// puk+ka la sogs bzhi rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// sid+ha la sogs bzhi rnams dang// gr-i D+ha la sogs bzhi rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mchod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// rta gdong la sogs bzhi rnams dang// dus gsum rdo rje slob dpon dang// mched dang lcam dral sngar 'das la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dges mdzod la// phul ba'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha ho// yang ni phyi rabs blo la dgangs// 'di skad yang ni bskyar te gsungs// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal chen he ru ka/ 'bar ba'i rgyal po khrag 'thung lnga rnams dang// dpal chen sku la gnyis med lhun sbyor ba'i// kro d+hI shwa rI 'bar ba'i yum rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje ches dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa khA hi/ mthing ga'i mchog rnams rdo rje gsang

ba'i yum// zhing bcu gtan nas 'byin pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// ke'u ri la sogs ma mo brgyad rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje ches dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pan+tsa khA hi/ za byed mgo brnyan rdo rje mche gshog can// dam log bgegs kyi snying la 'dren mdzad ma// sid+ha la sogs phra men brgyad rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje ches dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa khA hi/ ti ra'i snying 'dren 'ching sdom dbang sdud ma// rta gdong la sogs sgo ma bzhi rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje ches dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa khA hi/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// 'jigs byed chen po khro bo'i tshogs rnams la// dam tshig bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje ches dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa khA hi/ khro rgyal sku la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum// snyems ma la sogs khro mo'i tshogs rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa kha raM khA hi/ dpal gyi 'khor tshogs badzra A ra li// mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro ma sring rgya mtsho la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa kha raM khA hi/ thugs rje shugs kyi 'dren pa'i las mdzad ma// pho nya rgya mtsho ci bgyi bka' nyan la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtse dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa kha raM khA hi/ sdom la gnas dang rig 'dzin sgrub pa po// lha dang lhan cig phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa kha raM khA hi/ dug gsum zad mdzad dus gsum 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso bo la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa kha raM khA hi// brtse gdung mthun pa'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud// 'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar mi 'bral ba'i// dam tshig gzungs kyis 'brel ba'i mched lcam la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes

mchod 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha shrI pany+tsa kha raM khA hi// stong gi 'jig rten rab 'byams ma lus na// rdo rje slob dpon ji snyed bzhugs so 'tshal// mched dang lcam dral ji snyed mchis so 'tshal// snga rabs 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa dang// slad kyis 'byon pa'i thugs dam gtsang ba dang// g.yar dam gtsang ma ma lus ji snyed la// dri med rnam dag dam pa'i mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes cher dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// shrIHpany+tsa khA hi/ de nas bdud rtsi'i dam blangs te// dngos grub blang bar rab tu gsungs// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rjes khros pas rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// lce yi dam tshig rdo rje la// rdo rje can gyis hUM bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga ru sbyar ba ni// zos na byang chub gsum thob 'gyur/ kA ya sid+d+ha oM// bAka sid+d+ha AM/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas thugs dam bskang ba ni// hUM mdzad hUM gi thugs dam bskang ba ni// lcang lor bcas pa'i pad+ma ban+d+ha la// tshe 'dzin srog dang dmar chen dam pas bkang// pad+ma zil tig dri dang raka kha kha// rdo rje las kyi chu dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta// sha chen mkha' lding shel sgang gzugs kyi mchog/ sman chen lnga dang tshe dang byi lang se// sgrol dang sbyor gyi bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyis// ha ru ma bdun phra men tshogs bcas dang// rdo rje slob dpon lha tshogs gtso mchog rnams// mched dang lcam dral sgrol ba'i ging ka ra// mchod par bzhes la mnyes nas dam tshig skongs// grub mchog 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje mche ba'i rgya bcings te// gtor ma la gtugs thod rtsal bya// ban+d+ha bcud yangs zab pa dang// 'khor yug gtogs pa'i snod bcud 'di// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed bka' bzlog rol cing dgyes// srid gsum rtse 'joms tri shU la// khams gsum rab tu dkrugs nas ni// za byed chen po'i zhal du yang// thugs rjes 'gro don yud la bstab// 'gro dang mi 'gro snod bcud kyis// 'jig rten khyad lngas kun za na// dngos por gyur pa'i gnas 'di kun// ngas bstab khyed kyis yud la gsol// kha khA le le sha ta pa ga ta/ a la la ho// ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi/ zhes pas ma hA de ba dang// bka' zlog ma yi mchod pa bya// rgyud lnga'i sems can dug lngar 'bar// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas// mi rtag mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// khros pa'i za byed bzhi yis bshig/ laM raM yaM khaM chen po yis// za byed khros pa bzhis bshigs nas// bag chags ma lus rnam sbyang phyir// nam mkha' khro bo za

byed che'i// zhal gyi dbyings su stong khams bstim// ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ nga ni za byed chen po ste// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang// khams gsum ma lus za bar bya// nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// dmar chen khrag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor ba'i khrag zhag 'thung bar byed// ma lus 'dod la ma chags shing// dam tshig la sdang bsgral bar bya// ma hA tik+Sh+Na dz+wa la kha raM/ ma hA rak+ta mun+ta dz+wa la kha raM/ ma hA keM ni ri ti dz+wa la kha raM/ he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// khrag 'thung yab yum spyan drangs pa// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgya mtshor dkyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs mchod dang// ma lus bsnams nas bzhes su gsol// kha kha khA hi khA hi/ kha raM khA hi/ sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang// dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs te// sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur nas ni// rnal 'byor longs spyod mchog 'di bzhes su gsol// zla ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga// mAM sa la sogs re mchog dpa' bo gsal// ma ca me tsa rak+ta ru ti ra// nye ba'i snying po ma lus bsgrub 'tshal gyi// dri med gzi ldan mchod mchog sbyor ba 'di// ye shes lha tshogs rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// rnam dag sgrib spangs srid gsum skyon bral ba'i// ston ka'i zla gsal dri med zhal mnga' ba// bcom ldan bde gshegs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor can// khro bo'i tshogs chen ma lus thams cad la// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// shes rab lha mo'i rigs kyi yum la sogs// rnal 'byor grub dang rig 'dzin thams cad la// 'gro ba'i don phyir phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nam mkha' mnyam pa dang// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis rab brgyan pa// yid bzhin sku mchog yon tan mtha' yas gter// shes rab dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad dang// phyag brnyan 'du 'phro rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig mnga' 'o 'tshal// dgyes pas rol pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes shig/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi khA hi/ de nas glu drug bstod par bya// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che ho// hUM/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// tug chom ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad// a la ha la'i gad rgyangs che// skyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig (18)

le che ho// hUM khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'babs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i thig le che ho// hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdag po ste// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che ho// de nas smon lam gdab par bya// chos nyid spros pa med pa'i dbyings// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ldan// thun mong ma yin rnam par grol// ye shes chen po'i rol pa las// rmad du byung ba'i drag shul can// rigs lnga'i bde gshegs he ru ka/ rigs dang bcas pa'i yum rnams dang// gau ri'i tshogs dang sing ha'i 'khor// phyi nang rnal 'byor grub pa mo// ye shes sngags zhing las skyes rnams// mkhyen ldan byin brlab mdzad du gsol// rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma// pho nya pho dang pho nya mo// ci bgyi'i bka' nyan thams cad dang// phyogs bcu'i gdung sob bde gshegs rnams// rdo rje'i slob dpon mched lcam bcas// dgongs don thugs dam rtse gcig tu// bka' gzhung bzhin du mdzad pa rnams// mkhyen pas byin brlab mdzad du gsol// rnal 'byor phud kyi mchod pa 'di// chos nyid las ni chos nyid 'byung// kun rdzob tsam la brten byas nas// sprul par rol cing rnal 'byor gyi// mchod pa longs spyod sbyar ba 'di// bdag nyid chen po 'khor bcas rnams// dbang gi 'tshal ma'i slad du ni// phud dang gtsang mar rab spags nas// dga' dang gus pa'i sems kyis ni// lha dang lha mo gar gyis blangs// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhal med khang// chos dbyings mthar klas bkang nas dbul// gnyis med bde chen ngang nyid du// dgyes pa chen pos lhun dgongs nas// ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang du ral// sku gsung thugs gter gzhes su gsol// mthol bshags dag tu gsol ba ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'dus rnams// gsang sngags gsang sgor khas blangs nas// dam tshig gnyen po mchos pa las// rtsa ba yan lag zhig ral rnams// shin tu gnong 'gyod mthol zhing bshags// bzod pa chen pos ngang bzhes la// tshangs pa yid bzhin stsal du gsol// dngos grub thob par gsol ba ni// thogs pa med pa'i shes rab dang// mi brjed gzungs dang mngon shes drug/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin rdo rje'i sku// g.yung drung tshe dang sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni// dus 'dir 'thob par stsal du gsol// tshe

'dir mchog dang thun mong stsol// phrin las gsol bar zhu ba ni// yas kyi bdud dang mas kyi sri// pha khu rgan sri ma bu'i byur// bu tsha'i chung sri dri ngan can// rnal 'byor dam sri lo zla'i keg/ zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po dang// mnan zlog las kyis 'dul ba dang// rdul phran bzhin du bcom byas nas// ming yang med par mdzad du gsol// sgrub pa'i bar chad med par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje drag po bsgral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnam pa bcu yis rab tu bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang spyan drang bstim mchod bstod// zhing bcu dgug sbyang bsgral mchod gnas su 'phang// rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed bya ba// yi ge hUM las yongs su gyur pa ni// hUM rak+sha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rdo rje srin po dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad// zhabs brgyad dur khrod chas dang ldan par bskyed// e ka dza Ti badzra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ gtso dang mdog mthun sku la 'khril ba'i yum// yab yum gnyis med mkha' gsang byin brlabs nas// de nas khro bo sngags kyis bskyed pa ni// hUM tsa/ hUM ta/ hUM klong/ hUM rang/ hUM hri/ hUM krong/ hUM a/ hUM b+h+rUM/ hUM k+Sha/ hUM hUM/ yig 'bru bsgril ba de rnams las// 'od 'phros khro bo yab yum bskyed// ru lu lnga dang ma ma lnga// b+h+yo b+h+yo lnga dang d+ha la lnga// nyi shu las ni pha bcu dang// ma bcu'i sras ni lcam dral bskyed// de nas spyan yang drang bar bya// lus brda' dam tshig phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpral bar bcings// skra bshig gcer bur mchong zhing rgyug/ rdo rje dbyug pa blangs nas su// g.yab mo lngas kyang g.yab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhug par brtag/ gzhug pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya ni// las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig rgya// sgra brda' dam tshig phyag rgyas bstim// mchod pa dam tshig phyag rgya ni// rol pa gar gyi tsham rngams phyag/ b+han d+ha'i phyag rgya rab bcas bya// kha kha khA l+ya sha ta pa ga ta/ a la la ho/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta// kha raM yo gi nI/ kha raM ta ki ni// a la la ho/ b+ha ga wAn kha kha khA/ e ma chos te e ma chos// e ma chos kyi don byung ba// chos don 'gag pa bdag med pa// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// rdo rje rgyal por phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// dpal chen ye shes khyad par sa bcur bzhugs// dbang phyug mnga' mdzad stobs bcus zil gyis gnon// dge bcus dregs byed nga rgyal spyi nas 'joms// stobs bcus brjid gnon phyogs bcur rol pa mdzad// srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro

mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho/ pra tits+tsha ho/ a la la ho// de nas bstod par bya ba ni// sngags dang tshig tu bstod pa yin// ta ke ma/ ta ke ma/ ta ke ma/ go te ma/ keM keM/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i klong dkyil na// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa// sku ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs// dbu skra kham nag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil bas srid rtser 'bar// mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni// log par blta ba 'dul ba'i mchan// mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa ni// skye bzhi'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul// thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar gtibs// byams pa'i 'od zer glog ltar 'gyu// sprul pa thog thog char bzhin 'bebs// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// tsham rngams chen po bdud la ston// kyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad// dam tshig can la dngos grub stsol// 'khyil zhing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la/ sems kyi yang/ sems can chos pas sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags// de nas sgrol ba'i las bgyid na// mok+Sha mdun du bkug byas la// de nas 'dzin ging 'di skad gsungs// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can 'di// bstan pas 'dul ba'i snod ma yin// ma chags pas ni sdig re che// gsad pa kho nar bya ba'i 'os// lus kyi 'byung ba lnga po ni// khrag 'thung lnga yi zhal du bstab// sems kyi bag chags midage bcu// khro bo chen po bcu la 'bul// yan lag phye ba'i dngos po rnams// ma mo dur khrod brgyad la 'bul// sha dang khrag dang rus pa gsum// sder mo can dang mchu can dang// mche ba can gyi tshogs la bstab// rnam rol lus ngag yid gsum ni// bde chen sku gsung thugs su grub// ngo bo nyid kyis yin pa la// gtor ma bdag pos ngos bzung 'dra// 'di la sogs te sems can khams// dur khrod bdag pos bsgral ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gang ba'i he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dbu gsum ral gsum srid gsum mgon// spyan dgus sa dgu cis 'dul mkhyen// shangs gsum sku gsum sprul pa 'gyed// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum shar// mche bzhis skye bzhi rtsad nas gcod// phyag drug rgyud drug gting nas 'don// zhabs bzhis phrin las rnam bzhis sgrol// thugs dam nyid kyis sgrol ba la// ma byas bskul bya ci zhig 'tshal// bsgral ba'i 'dul skal lags pas bzhes// gnyis su med pa'i zhing du sbyor// oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha

ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri sarba duSh+tan hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM \u0f84hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri bid+ma hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM hrIHshru ta sa ma ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Nan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT// sngags kyis sku bskyed gsal bar bya// zhes pas zhing de bstab pa dang// de la 'di skad lan du stsal// rdo rje'i pho brang dkyil 'khor du// bdag 'dzin rnam rtog zad byas la// thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// sems kyi rtog pa bsgral bar gnang// pad+ma'i pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// chags pa'i bag chags zad byas la// gsung gi dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// pad+ma'i dbyings su sbyor bar gnang// rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// nga rgyal rnam rtog zad byas la// yon tan dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// che ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par gnang// rgya gram pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// phrag dog rnam rtog zad byas la// phrin las dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// las rnams rgya mtshos sgrol bar gnang// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// rmongs pa'i bag chags zad byas la// sku yi dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// chos sku'i dkyil 'khor rtogs par gnang// zhes pas gnang ba sbyin/ de nas ging gis mok+Sha bteg/ mtshams med las kyis dmyal bar 'gro// dam nyams rdo rje dmyal bar gnas// thar lam 'di las gzhan med pas// bde ba grol ba'i lam du shog/ ces pas bstab par bya'o// de nas sbyang bar bya ba yang// mo k+Sha'i lus ni bsreg sbyang bya// lhag mthong me 'bar 'od 'phros dug gsum bsreg hUM raM/ mtshan ma'i me bus brtson 'grus rlung gis gtor// chags rlan sdug bsngal zhi gnas chu yis bkrus// hUM khaM/ de nas lus la dgong pa ni// a nr-i su tri pre du/ mUM mAM lAM pAM tAM/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ spyi bo dpral ba mgrin pa snying// lte ba dang ni rkang mthil du'o// mUM las 'od 'phros a yi rnam rtog bsreg/ mUM raM a phaT/ hUM las 'od 'phros su yi rnam rtog bsreg/ hUM raM su phaT/ AM las 'od 'phros nr-i yi rnam rtog bsreg/ AM raM nr-i phaT/ oM las 'od 'phros tri yi rnam rtog bsreg/ oM raM tri phaT/ trAM las 'od 'phros pre yi rnam rtog bsreg/ trAM raM pre phaT/ hA las 'od 'phros du yi rnam rtog bsreg/ hA raM du phaT/ de ltar rgyun gcod sgo dgag pa// a drug 'od 'phros zla steng du// ha las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgyas gtug/ oM shrI kri smri ti bi dza ya sma ra sma ra hUM/ brjod pas phyag mtshan drug gi gzungs// skyes

dbugs lus gnas drug nas 'byung// sgo gcod rigs drug phyag mtshan 'bar// rgyud drug 'khor gnas mi gtong bar// rigs drug dkyil 'khor bde dbyings bsdu// nyams dang gar sngags mthong snang rmi// sems lus ngag yul bag chags rnams// gnas sbyongs sum cu tham par sbyang// de nas gnas gzhom yongs bsgral ba// mUM bdag nyid bsam gtan rang bzhin pas// le lo g.yeng ba zhi bar byed// stong nyid rang bzhin rtogs bya'i phyir// lha rnams byang chub rdo rjes bsgral// hUM bdag nyid ye shes tshul mchog ste// nga dang bdag 'dzin dbyings su sbyor// me long ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// lha min zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgral// AHbdag nyid tshul khrims rang bzhin te// las dang nyon mongs dag par byed// gsung rab rgya mtsho rtogs bya'i phyir// mi rnams 'dod chags rdo rjes bsgral// oM bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// rmongs pa'i gti mug zhi bar byed// chos dbyings ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// byol song gti mug rdo rjes bsgral// trAM bdag nyid sbyin pa'i rang bzhin te// bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel// mnyam nyid ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// yi dwags nga rgyal rdo rjes bsgral// hA bdag nyid brtson 'grus rang bzhin te// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// bya ba'i don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir// dmyal khams phrag dog rdo rjes bsgral// tri bi Sha mU la ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ pa ra bit+yA khaD+ga ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ sarba durga sarba karma kle sha hUM phaT/ ma tha ma tha sarba tir+ya ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ rigs drug dag gi phyag mtshan la// sangs rgyas rigs drug phyag mtshan bzung// khro bo bcus bsgral dgod pa ni// mgo la hUM mdzad chen po ste// dpral bar rnam par rgyal ba yin// kha ru ha ya grI ba ste// khams gsum lag pa g.yas par yin// g.yon par dbyug pa sngon po ste// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa snying gar bsdu/ lte bar ya mAn+ta ka ste// rkang g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yon pa mi g.yo mgon po ste// ma hA ba la gsang bar bsdu// de nas yig 'bru bcu bkod de// bskyed cing spro bsdu byas pa yin// hUM las 'od 'phros log par g.yems pa bcom// mos pa'i dbang rdzogs rdo rje hUM kA ra// hUM rAM/ 'di skor dang gong gi sa bon gnyis ma 'grig pas dpyad hU'uM kA ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ klong las 'od 'phros ma byin len pa bsreg/ yo byad dbang stsol gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// kraM raM/ a pa ra dzi ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ raM las 'od 'phros log par lta ba bcom// skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// raM raM/ Ar+ya a tsa la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ klong las 'od 'phros srog gcod sgrib pa

bsreg tshe la dbang stsol 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed// klong raM/ ya mAn+ta ta ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ ta las 'od 'phros rdzun gyi skyon rnams bsreg/ ye shes dbang stsol dbyug pa sngon po can// ta raM nI la daN+Da a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ hri las 'od 'phros phra ma'i sgrib pa bsreg/ chos la dbang stsol ha ya grI wa dpal// hri raM/ ha ya grI wa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ tsa las 'od 'phros 'khyal ba'i sgrib pa bsreg/ sems la dbang stsol 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal// tsa raM DAk+ki rA dza a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ a las 'od 'phros ngag rtsub sgrib pa bsreg/ las la dbang stsol bdud rtsi kuN+Da li// a raM/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ k+sha las 'od 'phros gnod sems sgrib pa bcom// rdzu 'phrul dbang stsol 'jigs byed stobs po che// k+Sh+wa raM/ ma hA ba la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ bruM las 'od 'phros brnab sems nyes pa bcom// smon lam dbang stsol 'dam skyes kuN+Da li// bruM raM/ ka ma li kuN+Da li a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas phyag rgya brgyad dgod de// snying la dkar mo gau ri ma// mgo la rkun mo tsau ri ma// rkang g.yon rmongs mo pra mo hA// lag g.yon thal byed be tA lI// lag g.yas sbos mo puk+ka sI// rkang g.yas sme sha tsaN+Da lI// pho mtshan gtum mo g+hasma rI// kha la ma tshogs sma sha nI// gau las 'od 'phros ma drin bag chags bsreg/ gau rI raM/ tsau las 'od 'phros log par blta ba bcom// tsau rI raM/ pra las 'od 'phros ngag gi sgrib pa bsreg/ pra mo ha raM/ be las 'od 'phros log par len pa bcom/ be tA li raM/ phu las 'od 'phros log pa'i las rnams bsreg/ puk+ka sI raM/ ri las 'od 'phros log par 'chi ba bcom/ g+hasma rI raM// li las 'od 'phros log par rtsol ba bcom// tsaN+Da lI raM/ ni las 'od 'phros 'khrul rtog rtse gcig bcom// sma sha nI raM/ dur khrod gnas kyi ma brgyad kyis// log par blta ba brgyad bcom mo// de nas 'od kyi gong bu de// spyi bor bsdus te 'di skad gsungs// gad mchog thams cad stobs kyi so'u ma// rnam rtog bag chags sregs shig a mr-i ta// dam tshig las kyis sgrol cig karma dza// bde chen dbyings su sdoms shig mu tig baM// a tsan+da maN+Da la/ ma sUr+Ya maN+Da la/ sa ma ya d+ha ra karma badzra/ badzra mu ti baM// zhes pas don rnams ma lus pa/ lha mo bzhi la las bcol lo// de nas bsgral bar bya ba yang// de dang 'dra bar bya ba ni// srid pa yongs bsgral ting 'dzin yang// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag bya// lhag mthong me chen bskal pa'i bag chags bsreg/ rat+na he ru ka raM/ brtson 'grus rlung gi bskal pas mtshan ma gtor// karma he ru ka yaM/ zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas dbyings su bkrus/ pad+ma he ru ka khaM/ chos dbyings nam mkha'i bskal pas dbyings su bstim// bud+d+ha he ru ka ga ga na e/ gzung 'dzin

sa yi bskal pas phyag rgyar bsgrubs// badzra he ru ka laM/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta hUM/ badzra sa twa rA dza/ rat+na rA dza/ pad+ma rA dza/ ta thA ga ta rA dza/ drag po'i las kyis bsgral ba rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo bcad de// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus nas ni// 'og min bla med gnas mchog na// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang// khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phangs// khams gsum yongs bsgral de dus na// yongs la sbyar ba shes par bya// bde ba bzhis ni kun khyab po// de nas ging la 'di skad gsungs// khyod ni pho nya ging ka ra// ka tar sngon po 'di long la// a phyi ra dza gnas bstod de// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang skur cig/ 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// pradz+nyA tIk+Sh+Na hUM/ raM gyis bsregs shing dbyings su bsdus// hUM raM/ zla dkyil bzhag ste ho yis g.yeng/ a ho yi/ phaT kyis 'phangs te dbyings su bstim// s+pha ra na phaT/ bde ba chen po'i gnas su bkod// ma hA su kha b+h+rUM/ de nas ging gis 'di skad gsungs// mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// gzugs snang rtog pas rnam par bsgribs// bag chags ma lus kun sbyang phyir// khams gsum thams cad bsgral bar bya// nga ni za byed chen po ste// sems can thams cad gsad par bya// ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya// ma grub phyir yang gtub pa'i rdzas// ma rungs 'dod la rab chags shing// dam tshig la sdang dgra bgegs rnams// snying rje byang sems ldan pa yis// ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya// pra be sha phaT/ sngags kyis brjod nas tsit+ta bzung// de rnams nyi shu dgu dang ldan// bde gshegs gsang ba'i sgo phye nas// rig pa'i me tog lha la 'phen// gtso bo bsgrub pa'i lhar babs na// lha yi dngos grub don du skong// don dam chos sku'i ye shes gzhug/ mtha' bral chos nyid snying po rtogs// rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin ljags la bstar// de yang rnam pa gcig tu yang// ye shes dbyings su gzhug pas gzung ba stong// snying po ljags la bstar bas 'dzin pa spong// gzung 'dzin gnyis med don dam thugs su chud// rtogs nas sprul pa'i 'gro don phyogs bcur mdzad// de nas 'di skad kyang gsungs pa// khro gtum tshad med byams par snang// gsod chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid ste// bsgral zhing bstab pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// nga rgyal dregs sems kun bsgralalha bdud bcom// gzugs ni bshig dral phung po'i rnam rtog bcom// sha za khrag 'thung rus 'cha' nyon mongs bcom// de nyid ma skyes ma byung skye shi med// de nas ging gi tsham rngams 'jug/ phyag rgya 'byung ba'i tsham rngams chas// lha rnams

skur gsal phyag rgya bya// oM shrI he ru ka hUM/ a a a/ phyag rgya de dang 'dra ba ni// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse dgu dang// bcu gcig phyag rgya bcings byas te// so so'i rang sngags 'di bzlas so// oM
