badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badza kro d+hA ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gr-I ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badza kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta tiSh+tha tiSh+tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng// rkang pa mthil sbyar thur du gzug/ tshigs chen bzhi yang bcag par bya// mgo dang mtshan ma snying por brtag/ rdo rje rtse gcig rtse dgu dang// bcu gcig tu ni rnam brtags te// 'di ni khrag 'thung chen po yi// phyag rgya yin par rgyal pos bshad// lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng// rkang pa phral nas brkyang bskum bzhin// gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed cing// 'di ni hUM gi phyag rgya yin// rkang pa'i mthil ni mnan pa'i stabs// lag pa phral nas gar byed cing// mnan mchongs stabs su byed pa ni// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas la 'khyud// lag pa gar stabs bskor nas ni// thal mo drag por brdeb pa ni// rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis// mthe'u chung sen mo mthil du mnan// gdengs pa'i stabs su bsgreng ba ni// dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// brdeg pa'i stabs su gdengs pa dang// g.yon pa dku la brten pa ni// gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo yis// gdab pa'i stabs su gdengs pa dang// g.yon pas 'dzin pa ltar byed pa// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal mo sbyar nas kyang// gung mo nang du bsnol bar bya// mthe bong gnyis kyang phral te bsgreng// spyi bor bzhag ste rta yi rgya// rkang pa g.yas pa thur du gzug/ lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgyer dgyer yang// g.yon gyi rkang lag phyag rgya ni// gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon dkur brten te// rkang pa bshibs te mchongs pa ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang// rkang pa brkyang bskum byed pa na/ khams gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar ni// mgon po dpa' bos yang dag bshad// lag pa g.yas g.yon sprug pa dang// lus kyang drag tu gsig pa ni// rdo rje phra men ma rnams kyi// phyag rgya yin zhes 'dren pas bshad// de ltar tsham rngams byas pa las// yig

'bru bcu las 'od 'phros pas// mi dge bcu rnams rnam par dag/ de nas phra men ma brgyad kyi// stabs dang phyag rgya 'byon tshul byas// log par blta ba brgyad bcom mo// de nas rtags dang ldan par bsgral// yum ni mdun du 'dug pa la// gnyis su med par sbyor bar bya// dang po bde ba bsnyen pa la// mchog tu bde ba nye bsnyen te// bral ba'i bde ba sgrub pa la// sgrub chen lhan cig skyes pa ste// mkha' dbyings lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas drangs// yab yum byang sems dbang bskur te// dang por reg pa sra ba sa// sangs rgyas spyan gyi bum dbang bskur// de nas gsher ba chu yin te// mA ma kI yi cod pan gdags// de nas dro ba me yin te// gos dkar mo yi rdo rje'i dbang// de nas g.yo ba rlung yin te// sgrol mas dril bu'i dbang yang byin// thig le nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i sar bsgral lo// srid pa'i 'khor los log pa'i lam// 'khor ba rgyun gcad mya ngan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags// gdan du 'khor los mtshan pa yin// Adz+nya tsakra hUM/ mnyam nyid rdo rje dbang phyug gis// stong nyid seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags te// bdud bzhi rab tu bcom pa'i rtags// mi 'jigs seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs// sing ha dzam ba la bi ma la sid+d+hi hUM/ mya ngan mi 'da' rdo rje'i ngang// nyon mongs mi spang dgos pa med// ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// oM badzra pad+ma sta na be sha hUM/ zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas te// 'jig rten kun dang mthun 'jug rtags// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pas na// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// oM sUr+ya hUM/ tsan+Da a/ gdan rnams de yi steng dag tu// sngags bzlas rigs lnga'i skur bskyed do// 'chi ba med par srog dran pas// rdo rje'i srog ni rlung lta bu// gang dag bsgral ba rdo rje'i tshe// skye shi med pa'i sa la bkod// de nyid sras kyi dang por ni// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyis stabs// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa'o// de nas ye shes lngas byin bsdu// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad bsgyur// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lngas kyang dbang bskur la// ma lus thams cad lhar bsgyur ro// de nas bsgyur byas yi ge yi// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dbang bskur ro// de nas stob ging dag gis ni// sha dang khrag dang rus pa gsum/ khyer nas bstab pa 'di skad gsungs// khrag ni 'dod chags bde ba che// khyod kyi zhe sdang gsal ba che// sha ni gti mug me rtog che// rgyu ni dug gsum dag nas kyang// khams gsum 'khor ba las grol nas// 'bras bu sku gsum thob par mdzod// zhal du bstab po kha raM khA hi// de nas slob dpon 'di skad gsungs// nga ni za

byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// de nas khog pa dur khrod kyi// gnas brgyad brtsigs par bya ba yang// sgrub chen la sogs gzhan mi bya// byas na zhag bdun khrag skyug 'chi// rtogs ldan sgrub gnas dur khrod mnan// shes rlom 'phral snang kun byed pa// ma bdun za lam zhag bdun 'chi// rnam shes tsit+ta na ra kan// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi dngos grub mchog/ srid gsum mthar byed rngams pa des// thod dbyug chen po mi bzad pas// gshin rje btul te bsad nas su// ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du// dur khrod chen po brgyad du brtsigs// de ltar de bzhin bdag gis ni// pha la bus ni byas pa bzhin// 'di lus dur khrod gnas su 'bul// 'di yi lus snying ma ga d+ha// dur khrod chen po bsil tshal du// ma mo chen mo go'u ri ma// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// mkhas la snying stobs che ba yi// dngos grub chen po stsal du gsol// 'di yi mgo bo lho phyogs kyi// sing+ga la yi gling phran la// ma mo chen mo tso'u ri ma// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// mthong thos rnam par 'phrul bag gi// dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol// 'di yi lag g.yas shar lho mtshams// bal yul na ni puk+ka sI// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// lhag par zas kyi dngos 'byor pa'i// dngos grub dam pa stsal du gsol// 'di yi lag g.yon lho nub mtshams// sA la'i tshal na be tA lI// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs stsol// 'di yi rkang g.yas byang shar mtshams// li yi yul na tsaN+Da lI// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// longs spyod 'khor ldan dngos grub stsol// 'di la rkang g.yon nub byang mtshams// ka ni ka mthun pra mo hA// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// bde skyid ldan pa'i dngos grub stsol// 'di yi pho mtshan byang phyogs na// u rgyan yul na g+has ma ri// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bul// grub pa myur ba'i dngos grub stsol// bzhag sha khog sha la sogs pa// thams cad lo ka'i dur khrod na// sma sha ni yi rgyan du 'bul// las rnams kun gyi dngos grub stsol// zhes pas dur khrod khang brtsig go/ de nas phung po lnga po rnams// mchod par bya ba 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// gzugs mchog glang po'i gdan khri 'bul// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa dang// stobs bcu'i dbang rnams stsal du gsol// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// gzugs mchog seng ge'i gdan khri 'bul// sku yi byin rlabs rgya mtsho dang// mi 'jigs bzhi yi dbang rnams stsol// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas la// gzugs mchog rma bya'i gdan khri 'bul// gsung

rab rgya mtsho 'chad pa dang// dbang bcu'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung gdan la// gzugs mchog rta yi gdan khri 'bul// yon tan rgya mtsho'i byin rlabs dang// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dngos grub stsol// bcom ldan don yod grub pa la// gzugs mchog mkha' lding gdan khri 'bul// phrin las rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang// thogs med las bzhi'i dngos grub stsol// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba lnga// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI// na bza' dkar dang dam tshig sgrol// kun tu bzang mo la sogs pa// rigs kyi gsang mchod 'di 'bul gyi// mi 'gyur gzugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de nas tshogs kyi zhal zas rnams// rang gis longs kyang spyad par bya'o// dang po zhal zas lha la bstab// dgyes mchog nye bar spyod pa yi// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i zhal zas 'di// pad+ma dri ma med pa ltar// rgyal ba rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// zhes pas lha la dbul bar bya'o// de nas za byed zhal hom gyi// mchod pa dag kyang bya ba ni// rnal 'byor nang pa'i zhal hom ni// khong pa rin chen gzhal yas khang// de nang dkyil 'khor lha bkod la// zhal yang hom khung bsreg khang du// ye shes che ba'i me sbar te// lce ni las su bya ba yi// lha rnams so so'i bzhugs gnas la// khong pa rin chen gzhal yas khang// dbus kyi gtso bo nas brtsams te// lha yi dkyil 'khor rim bzhin du// bsreg khang bzhugs gnas spyan drangs te// lag pa rdo rje'i hom gzar dang// 'dod pa'i lha mo'i bsreg rdzas su// bdud rtsi'i hom du bstim pa'i tshe// so ni ye shes mes bcom nas// dkan dang ljags kyi dbang por ro// spyan drangs rang bzhin gang yin bstim// mgrin pa bla med lam drangs te// khong pa rin chen gzhal yas khang// de yi nang du lha rnams mchod// ba spu'i phyogs su gzi brjid ni// me 'bar phrin las rnam pa bzhis// 'gro ba'i don yang brtsam par bya'o// dkyil 'khor lha ni re re la// ging gis bsreg rdzas gsum gsum bstab// bstab pa'i tshig dang sngags rnams ni// lha yi rim pa dag dang sbyar// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud mnyes bya// de yang ngas ni khyed rnams la// rab tu gsal ba yang bshad na// 'bar ba'i bsreg khang zhal hom du// ye shes mche ba'i me 'bar te// 'og min lha yi gzhal yas nas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams spyan drangs te// lce dbus pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// lag pa hom gzar bsreg rdzas stob// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i// zhal du kyur pa'i me bos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyi// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin// dkyil 'khor lha rim zhal hom

mchod// dbyibs kyi bzhugs tshul rigs kyi mdog/ mtshan gyi khyad par lha rnams kyi// so so'i rim bzhin bdag bsgoms te// mchod pa shes rab can gyis bya// zhal zas kham ni ran par gtub// phyag rgya lag pa rdo rje'i gar// hom gzar bskor te zhal bstab tshe// lha rnams mtshan nas brjod cing bskul// 'brim mkhan g.yas brims lha tshogs mchod// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'grangs// kun la phan pa'i sman yin te// rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yi// thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya// de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// phyi rabs kyis ni don bzhir shes// mchod pa'i gnas dang yon tan dang// ci phyir mchod dang mchod pa'i rdzas// mchod par bya ba'i rdzas dag ni// rang la rgyan cing gzabs pa ste// rgyan lnga dag tu shes par bya// nang rgyan phyi yi chas rgyan dang// mdzes pa lus la bkod pa lha// byin rlabs sprul pa'i rgyan lnga'o// bza' ba rngam pa lnga po la// ye shes dbyings la bza' ba dang// dbyings ni ye shes la bza' dang// dbyings dang ye shes bag chags bza'// thugs rjes 'khor ba'i sems can bza'// rngam zhal dus gsum bag chags bza'// rngam pa'i zhal du za ba ni// phun tshogs bzhi dang dkyil 'khor lnga// phun sum tshogs pa rnam bzhi ni// hom khung phun tshogs rnam dag zhal// ye shes phun tshogs tshems 'bar me// mchod pa phun tshogs hom gzar la// bdag nyid phun tshogs gtso bo che// dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga yod de// gsal bkra za byed thim pa gsum// las dang don grub dkyil 'khor lnga'o// longs spyod mdzad pa'i dus su yang// byi 'khur mi bca' skos la phebs// zhi ba'i smon lam la sogs te// rigs lnga he ru ka yi mtshan// brjod nas mchod pa'i dus su yang// dur khrod mchog gi rgyan du che// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho la// zhe sdang rus pa'i phung po ste// gti mug sha yi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// dug gsum bag chags byang byas nas// srid gsum sems can thams cad sgrol// sa gsum 'bras bu 'thob pa dang// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud mnyes pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skong// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// sku gsung dngos grub thob gyur cig/ 'di yi dus na ti ra'i gnas 'phrog ma// zhing bcu sgrol dang ma sgrol nyul ba ni// sngags pas bsgrims nas byas pa na// ngas ni khyed la gsal bar bshad// karma mA le'i rgyud las/ rnon po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rjes/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams la gsungs

so// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor zhi dang khro// dang po spyan drang mchod pa 'bul// gsog 'jog med par lhag ma bzhag/ ho gsang ba'i don la gtogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams// sngon gyi thugs dam ma 'da' bar// sgrub pa'i stong grogs 'dir gshegs shig/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ DA ki ni hUM dzaHe A ra li hriM hriM/ hUM rnam dag chos nyid zhi ba las// thogs med thugs rje'i sprul pa 'byung// rang rang las kyi skal gyur pas// sprul pa bsam yas mkha' la 'gro// 'ja' tshon mdog 'dzin rigs las sprul// mi ro skam po'i gdan stengs na// thugs rje'i sprul pa yang dag zhon// mthing ga mi bskyod dpa' bo'i gzugs// sum cu rtsa gnyis kun 'jig cing// mi thod khrag gis bkang ba dang// kha T+wAM tri shul gshol gri bsnams// rang rang lag cha sna tshogs ldan// dpa' bo'i gzugs can khro mig bgrad// nyi zla'i tshul du mkha' la 'gro// zas su sha dang khrag dang ni/// rkang dang tshil bu rgyu ma za// yang dag de nyid 'jig rten nyid// sprul pa'i tshul gyi gzugs kyis 'dul// gtso bo dga' bar byed pa dang// nang khrol 'dren par byed pa dang// khyo la chags par byed pa dang// rnal 'byor spro bar byed pa dang// skye 'gro gsod par byed pa dang// 'jig rten 'bar bar byed pa dang// gzugs rnams brjid par byed pa dang// gling rnams 'khor lo ltar bskor ma// mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod rnams yin// sngon tshe bcom ldan mi bskyod pa'i// ye shes dbyings la chags tshul du// dga' ma gsod dga' 'dzin dga' ma// 'dren dga' mig dmar thod pa 'dzin// myos ma ra byil gdong dmar gyis// mdun rgyab zur gnyis dbus gsum po'i// mdun la gtso mo bdun gyi 'khril// mi bskyod spyan sngar khas blangs pa// slas su bdag cag 'dun bgyid pas// mna' bor dam bcas khas blangs te// 'jig rten ma 'das bar du ni// 'jig rten bstan pa bsrung bar byas// khas blangs 'gal bar mi bya'i phyir// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ sngon tshe bcom ldan rtag pa la// chags chen ma dang chags mchog ma// chags bral ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// 'khor lo 'khor ba lnga yi 'khril// rtag pa'i slas su byas nas ni// 'jig rten ma 'das bar du ni// bstan pa bsrung ba mna' bor ba// khas blangs 'gal bar mi bya phyir// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan la// bdud rtsi chang ma bsil ma dang// be con 'dzin ma rgyu 'thung ma// rgyu 'dzin kha 'dzin lnga yis ni// mdun rgyab zur gnyis dbus la 'khril// 'byung ldan slas su byas

nas ni// 'jig rten ma 'das bar du ni// 'jig rten bstan pa bsrung bar bya// khas blangs 'gal bar mi bya'i phyir// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas la// stobs bzang ser smug kha yal ma// 'dod pa mo dang nor bu bzang// ba dan ma ni bum lto ma// lnga yis mdun zur dbus la 'khril// 'jigs dbang slas su byas nas ni// bstan pa bsrung bar mna' bor bar// da rung 'jig rten ma 'das pas// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ bcom ldan don yod grub pa la// gsod brtson gsal ba'i 'od 'chang ma// so zhag khrag 'jib bus bzang ma// dbyug sna sprul lus gser mig ma// mdun zur bzhi dang dbus gsum la// drug 'khril don grub slas su byas// bstan pa bsrung bar mna' bor bas// da rung 'jig rten ma 'das pas// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la/ rnal 'byor bcol ba'i las gyis shig/ shar nyid du ni bum sna ste// nub tu d+ha sha grI ba'o// lho ru rnam par 'joms ma ste// byang nyid du ni 'bod grogs so// mkha' la 'gro ba'i sgo ma bzhi// bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i// zhabs bzhi'i 'og na shi bzhin gnas// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du 'bar// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis pau// da dung 'jig rten ma 'das kyi// slas dang gdan du byas rnams kyis// mna' bor tshul bzhin las bya'i phyir// mchod sbyin bzang po 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ sngags sor bzhag/ oM badzra DA ki ni a A gats+tsha yin nam gad ta ya a gad ta ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba DA ki ni/ bud+d+ha DA ki ni khA hi/ badzra DA ki ni khA hi/ rat+na DA ki ni khA hi/ pad+ma DA ki ni khA hi/ karma DA ki ni khA hi/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum bsgom pa// gsal bar bcu drug rab bshad bya// mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang// spyan drangs pa dang las la gzhug/ zil gyis mnan dang phyag rgya dang// dbang du bsdu bar bya ba dang// dgos pa'i don rnams bsgrub tu gzhug/ dam tshig mna' bsgag bya ba dang// bdag gzhan bsrung du gzhug pa dang// bdag dang mi mthun khro gzhug dang// dngos grub mchog 'dod 'khor du gzhug/ he ru ka yi las la gzhug/ kha chus gdab dang rigs lngar bstab// rdo rje'i mo gdab dam yang bsre// gzhug tu mnan pa'i cho ga bya// karma mA le'i rgyud chen 'dir// 'di dag rab tu gsal bar bshad// mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor na/ srin mo'i za lam gom pa ni// bdun cu'i phyi rol dag tu ni// rdo rje dri chu'i dkyil 'khor bri// dbang phyug ma yi dkyil 'khor

bsgom// mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni// mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po chen po ni// pad+ma he ru ka ru bskyed// rdor rigs dam pa nyi shu dang// dbang mo nyi shu la sogs pa// mkha' 'gro khyo shug tshul du bskyed// de nas spyan drang 'di skad gsungs// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas 'di ru// dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgya mtshor 'khyil// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// thod rus 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus gshegs shing bsnam du gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka sngags sor bzhag/ a gad ta ya a gad ta ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ badzra DA' ki nI nAM shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ e h+ye hi/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ A na ya A na ya/ ko ta k+Sha ko ta k+Sha/ ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu A ra li ho// hriM hriM hriM/ brjod pas dbang phyug ma dang ni// rdo rje rigs dam la sogs pa// khyo shug re re dag la yang// 'khor ni sa ya phrag bco brgyad// bco brgyad sprin phung bzhin du yang// mdun gyi nam mkhar lhags pa las// so so'i rang sngags brjod pa yis// dam tshig la ni thim par bsam// ma nu rak+Sha sI b+h+yo// brah+ma NI b+h+yo// rau tri b+h+yo// kau mA rI b+h+yo// baiSh+Na be b+h+yo// in+d+ra nI b+h+yo// badzra sid+ha lI b+h+yo// a mr-i taM b+h+yo// sau mya b+h+yo// daN+Da di b+h+yo// rak+Sha sI b+h+yo// b+hak+Sha sI b+h+yo// ra ti badzra b+h+yo/ ru d+hi ra mat+ta b+h+yo// e ka tsa ti NA+e b+h+yo// ma no ha raM b+h+yo// sid+d+hi ka b+h+yo// wa ya bI b+h+yo// ma hA ma ra Na b+h+yo// ag+nI b+h+yo// wa ra hI b+h+yo// tsa muN+Di b+h+yo// su ta naM b+h+yo// wa ru NI b+h+yo// badzra ma hA kA lI b+h+yo// tsa kA lI b+h+yo// kum+b+ha kar+Na b+h+yo// lam+bo da ra b+h+yo// de nas las la gzhug pa ni// Ta ki'i phyag rgyas bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya 'di bstan pas// rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma pho mo 'dra bar byos// oM badzra DA ki nI/ A kar+ShA ya/ A kar+ShA ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba badzra DA ki nI nAM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ DA ki nI hUM dzaH/ nyer gnas zhi tshul las la gzhug/ gzhan yang las kyi phyag rgya dang// dam tshig phyag rgya las la gzhug/ dbang phyug ma yi gtso mo brgyad// de yi dam tshig las rgya ni// thun mong dag tu gar mchod bya// lag g.yon rtse gsum phyag rgya bcas// g.yas kyi g.yog mos rtse mnan pa// de ni u ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa phyag rgya oM// smad 'don ltar byed tshangs ma'o// rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa'i rgya// mnga' bdag g.yog mo rtse sprad de// (19)

lhag ma mda' sgro lta bu'am// yang na tri shul nyid du bca'// 'di gsum gang rung dga' bar byed// lag pa g.yas kyi mnga' bdag dang// g.yog gnyis g.yon gyi chang par bcangs// sil gsil ltar byas gzhon nu ma// yang na mdung gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon gyi mnga' bdag la sogs pa// brkyang nas rtse bcum 'khor lo ma// lag pa g.yas g.yon bka' nyan gnyis// khar bcug mnga' bdag gyen bsgreng phrag/ khu tshur de nyid ma bshigs par// thur du mnan pa gshin rje ma// lag pa g.yas g.yon mnga' bdag dang// g.yog dang 'bring mo gsum bcangs te// seng ge'i rna ba brgya byin na// phyag rgya de rnams byed bzhin du// gsang sngags 'di dang sbyar te bzlas/ sngags sor bzhag/ dza ya du u ma ba hi kang ka d+ha rI/ dzA ya du pra h+ma NA'i ka ma la d+ha rI/ dzA ya du ma he shwa ri shU'u la d+ha rI/ dza ya du kau mA rI shak+ti d+ha rI/ dza ya du na ra ya ni tsakra d+ha rI/ dza ya du ba ra hi daN+Da d+ha rI/ dza ya du in+d+ra ya ni/ badzra d+ha rI/ dza ya du tsa muN+DA tsit+ta d+ha rI// dgos don phra mo yan chad rnams// bsgrub tu gzhug par bya ba ni// g.yas g.yon gnyis g.yog lcags kyur bcing// dkyu zhing dkyus la 'di skad gsungs// dgongs don sems can gang yin pa// de yi mdun du khyod rnams kun// dgongs pa bsgrub phyir 'dug par byos/ khyod kyi srog ni ma rungs par// dam tshig 'dis ni 'gyur ta re// oM ba lin tod ba liM ta A kar+Sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas dngos grub mchog 'dod phyir// drung du 'khor du gzhug pa ni// g.yon pa'i g.yog g.yas bka' nyan gyis// sgra 'byin tog cing 'di skad gsungs// khro bor mnyam gzhag gang yin pa// dam tshig 'di yang bya ra byas// khyod kyis de yi mdun du ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod// oM badzra pa ta la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hUM hUM phaT/ de nas zil gyis mnan pa ni// snying gar thal ma bsnol byas la// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// phro brang dkyil 'khor ngang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka sarba duSh+tan sa ma ya da/ ma rang pra pany+tsa ka/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ he b+ha ga wAn/ bud+d+ha k+She tra stam+b+ha ya ka hUM phaT/ zhes pas de rnams zil gyis mnan no// de nas phyag dang/ bya ba ni// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing// byams dang snying rjes dgra zun mi mnga' yang// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing// 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma sring byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la

phyag 'tshal lo// oM ka ra mu ka sha ra ya ya na maH/ oM rA ga sa ma ya ya na maH/ oM kha T+wa ga pra la ya ya na maH/ oM gan+d+ha dz+wa la ya ya na maH a ti pu ho// pra ti dza ho// ta thA ban+da nang ka ro mi ma hA yo gI go ru pa te a la la ho// bdag gzhan bsrung du gzhug pa ni// khu tshur bcangs pa'i g.yog gnyis bsgreng// gang zhig la la bsgrub pa'i phyir// khro bo'i blta bas bcings nas ni// sems can gang la bsrung ba'i phyir// de yi rgyab tu 'jug par bya/ badzra ban+d+ha hUM/ bdag dang mi mthun de dag la// de la khro ru gzhug pa ni/ hUM gi phyag rgyas g.yog 'khyud de// spyi bor gtugs la 'di skad bsgo// bdag nyid chen po'i dam tshig ni// rin chen phyag rgyas bcings nas ni// khros nas gang la bltas pas ni// de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug/ oM badzra ma la aSh+ta baM/ de nas he ru ka yi ni// phyag rgya dgug pa'i las gzhug pa// 'dod pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas te// 'di dag bsgo bar gsungs pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gal te gsod par 'dod na ni// dgug par bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag par dgug/ oM shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan/ sa ma ya mu dra pra b+hany+tsa kra hUM phaT/ de nas dbang du bsdu ba ni// rta gdong rgya bcings 'di skad gsungs// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas yin te ye shes sku// ye shes sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// nga nyid yin te nga yi dbang// oM pad+ma ban+d+ha ba mu ka/ A kar+ShA ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha la/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ sarba badzra TAk+ki ni/ hr-i da yan ha ha hi hi oM// oM AHhUM/ de nas dam tshig mna' bsgag pa// mnga' bdag gnyis po bkug pa yi// gdong gis g.yog gnyis bkug pa yi// gdeng du gtugs la 'di skad brjod// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa las// gal te gang zhig 'das rgyur na// dam tshig 'dis ni khyod gsod do// oM badzra a kar pri ta sa ma ya hUM/ 'di rnams spyi dgos rnam gnyis su// phye nas rig pa dam pa las// sogs pa gang yin shes bya'o// de nas kha chu btab nas ni// rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma la bstab// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// 'byung ba chu yi char bab pas// mkha' 'gro pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// ma mo sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// oM gu ru kro d+ha ha ka/ rat+na kro d+ha ka/ sa ma ya brang sha kha la li shag sha pu ka bu tak+Sha tre bra ti stas+b+ha ka ya hUM phaT/ de nas gtor snod ban+d+ha yi// phyag rgya bcas pas phyogs bzhi nas/ bteg ste 'di skad brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// e h+ye hi i h+ye hi tshur gshegs tshur sbyon 'khor dang

bcas// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan 'dren ma lus gshegs su gsol// ka la ki la ha ha dga' ba'i bzhad mos khong// bder drongs bder drongs a ko su ka shu pa ri// tiSh+Tha shi shi slob ma tshul cig snang bar mdzod// rol cig dgongs shig 'dod pa tiSh+ta khA hi khA hi// b+h+yo sbyin no bskul lo da ra ha ra ha ra ha// ngo mtshar mchog tu bstab po kha kha la// bral ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga// mAM sa la sogs ro mchog dpa' bos gsol// ma tsa me tsa rak+ta ru ta ri// nye ba'i bsgrub pa ma lus bsgrub 'tshal gyi// dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod par sbyar ba 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams kyis bzhes su gsol/ ar+g+haM sbreng zhing dbang phyug ma'i// srog snying gzungs sngags rnams brjod do// de nas rdo rje dril bu dang// kha T+wAM ga gsor 'di skad brjod// kha T+wAM ga kha T+wAM ga/ kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten bcas// nam mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor bas// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro ba grub// dngos grub thams cad mkhas 'byin pas// mkha' la sgyu ma kun blangs te// lus pa med par der zo zhig/ rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni// gar dag byed cing rab tu za// gan+d+ha ra ho// gan+d+ha ra yi sgra yis sgrol bar mdzod// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs can 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// la lar gshin rje bzhin du rngams// la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi// 'jig rten khams ni stong dag ni// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis// ma lus lus pa med par sgrol// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin chen tshogs kun 'dus pa 'di la gzigs// sngon med khro rol 'di la rol mdzod cig/ dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'dul ba'i dbang du grub pa'i cha lugs mi bzad ma// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gzi brjid 'bar ba 'di// bde ba'i spyod pa'i gnas nas bskyod mdzad cing// thugs rje pad+ma'i dbyings nas dges par mdzod// a la la ho// ji ltar pad+ma 'dam la chags pa med pa bzhin// sdug pa'i 'ching bas mi zin rnam grol lo// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams// mnyes mdzod nyid du bde bas bzhes su gsol// de nas kun gyis thob par bya ba ni// rigs lnga'i tshom bu gtor ma so sor 'bul// oM bud d+ha DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha mA na ba liM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha mA na ba liM trAM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha mA' na ba liM hrIHphaT/ oM karma DA' ki nI pra tIts+tsha mA na ba liM hA phaT/ de nas rdo rje'i mo gdab cing// dam tshig bsre bar bya ba ni// kau rI'i ban+d+ha 'phrul zhal gyi// phyag rgyas gtor ma la gtugs la// oM ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ brjod pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi// steng du yi ge hrI:bsgoms la// rig 'dzin dngos grub

lag pa yi// phyag rgya dag gis blang bya zhing// oM AHhUM uts+tshiSh+ta badzra a mr-i ta tiSh+Tha swa maM hUM hrIHphaT/ sngags de brjod pas dam blang zhing// 'grub mi 'grub dang rnam bzhi'i las// gang bya rdo rje'i mo gdab pa// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta bas gzung// 'grub dang mi 'grub sra snyi la// mngar dang mi mdar skyur skyur po// tsha dang kha la sogs pa'i ro// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// rim pa nyid du shes par bya// dbang phyug ma dang bdag cag gnyis// thugs dam gcig tu bya ba'o// mkha' 'gro ma dang bdag cag yang// thugs dam gcig tu bya ba'o// de nas mnan pa'i cho ga bya// drag po ma lus 'dul bya zhing// mnan pa'i dus la bab pa rnams// dbang phyug ma la las bcol te// bkug la sa yi 'phar sgo dbye// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la// gtad cing sa yi 'phar sgo bcad// de nas gtor ma phyogs bcur gtor// gtor gzhong rnams ni kha sbub ste// gzhong pa yum du bsgom pa yi// steng du stangs stabs 'greng bya la// las rnams sngon du grub par bya// dngos grub rnams ni dbang du bya// dbang ni brtan par bya ba'o// de nas slar yang nang du 'jug/ smon lam mchod pas thim pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'dir yang smon lam yang// gdab cing dug gsum mchod par bya// 'di yi dus na dur khrod gnas nyul mas// phyogs nor mchod rdzas nyul bas na// lhag ma'i mchod pas tshims par bya// gtor ma yongs la khyab pa'o// legs par byed par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor la// nyul byed bar chod las grol dngos grub ster// zhes gsungs so// karma mA le'i rgyud las 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rjes spyi'i las bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// spyi yi las bsdus rnam pa bcur bshad bya// bshags sbyong dngos grub gsol dang smon lam gdab// rgyas pa'i gter bgo las ni dngos grub dang// dngos grub dbang bya dbang ni brtan par bya/ lha gshegs bkra shis brjod dang dza gad gsol// de nas bshags pa bya ba yang// tshogs pa nang du 'dus nas ni// dang la las kyi karmas bshags// de nas ging gis bshags pa bya// de nyid bshags pa bya ba ni// las kyi skol dmigs 'dir stsal las// rngo ma thogs pa'i ming byung bshags// de nas grogs po nang bshegs bya// g.yas g.yon gral tshal gnyis byas la// glu dbyangs mgrin mthun 'di skad blang// thams cad ma lus mched lcam dral// bde gshegs slob mar lung mnos la// mthun par spyod pa'i dam tshig pas// mnyam dang mi mnyam don gcig la// legs 'ong rnam par dbyer med kyang// rnam par dgapa 'i sgo tsam du// gzhung las nyams pa ci

mchis pa// rnam par dag pa'i bsam pas mthol// don gyis mi gnas tshig gis bshags// 'dzin pa med pas bzod par gsol// rang bzhin dag pas tshangs par stsol// gcig gis gcig zhabs spyi bor blang// ngag gi sri zhus bzod par gsol// tshangs par gyur cig ces kyang brjod// de nas kun gral bsres nas slob dpon la// bzod par gsol la 'di skad gsol// rdo rje slob dpon dpal dang ldan// 'phags pa'i sku dang tha mi dad// bde gshegs rnams kyi gsung rab lung// rna bar brgyud pa'i man ngag mnga'// sku gsung thugs dang rdo rjer gyur// zhal nas gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bka'// gnyis med dag gi lha dang mnyam// 'jig rten rje dang pha ma'i tshul// lus ngag yid thug gnas rab tshul// bsnyen bkur gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs// ngan sems dpya sems dag la sogs// sdom pa'i dam tshig ci nyams pa// thams cad ma lus mthol zhing bshags// lus ngag sgrib par mi 'gyur zhing// tshangs pa 'phral du stsal du gsol// ngag gi sri zhus bzod par gsol// lus ngag zhabs ni spyi bor blang// slob dpon gyis ni lan stsal pa// gnongs par dran nam 'gyod skyes na// slan chad sdom la tshangs par stsal// de nas dngos grub gsol ba ni// rdo rje dril bu gsor zhing brjod// phyag rgya rnam lnga dngos grub tu// rdo rje slob dpon brjod gsol bya// de yang 'di skad gsungs te brjod// skal ldan mi'i tshogs dkyil 'khor du// dga' ldan ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms pas// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob gyur cig/ bro gar phyag rgya 'du 'phro ni// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya ni// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya ni// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgyas ni// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes brjod de nas smon lam yang// de dang mthun par gdab pa ste// smon lam 'jug la brjod pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dus su ni// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga bsgoms pas// dngos grub thob par gyur cig brjod// de nas smon lam btab pa ni// rdo rje slob dpon mched lcam dral// lag pa lu gu rgyud sbrel nas// glu dbyangs mgrin gcig 'di skad blang// rdo rje slob dpon lcam dral mched// mthun par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dam las mi 'da'i grogs mched rnams// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lu gu rgyud// cis kyang mi phyed 'brel pas na// rnal 'byor dag gi phyag rgya 'brel// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// thugs dam gzhung bzhin mi 'bral zhing// dkyil 'khor gcig tu bla med bsgrub// 'phags pa'i go 'phang 'thob pa

dang// chos kyi chos nyid dbyings nyid du// lhan ne lhang nger 'grub par smon// zhes brjod tshe ni pha rol tu// slob dpon zhabs drung mi 'bral ba// rdo rje'i smon lam de gdab po// de nas rgyas pa'i gter bgo ba// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// rdo rje ri rab gzugs byas la// rnal 'byor lu gu rgyud tshogs nas// rgyas pa'i phur bu thogs la dril// gcig kyang stob tshul byed du gzhug/ de nas slob dpon 'di skad gsung// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams bskyod// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'phro// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus par// mchod yon yid bzhin dpal phreng gis// phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas 'bul na// yon tan nam mkha' gang ba rnams// thugs rje'i lcags kyus dbyings su bsdu// zhes pas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas// thams cad puSh+tiM ku rus drang// de nas phur thogs des 'di gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// brgya yi yon tan gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur// puSh+tiM ku ru zhes bzlas nas// de la phur pas gdab bya'o// de nas gtor bgod brjod cing gdab// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyi mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// de nas gzhan byin 'di skad gsung// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams bskyod// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yon tan nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad de// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// ces pas bro brdung rgyas par bsam// las ni gzhan ma gsum po yang// mi byar mi rung byed na yang// rtsis 'go 'di ltar shes bya'o// de nas dngos grub bya ba ni// kun langs hUM gi phyag rgya bca'// badzra TA ki'i sngags brjod nas// mchog thun dngos grub stsol bar bsam// de nas dngos grub dbang du bya ba yang// pad+ma he ru ka yi skus// grub chen brgyad dang sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo bsam// de nas dbang bstan par bya ba ni// gau rI'i ban+d+ha'i 'phrul chen gyi// phyag rgya bcas te sngags 'di brjod// ma hA krod+hI shwa rI hUM zhes pa// dbang rnams brtan par gyur cig ces// lan gsum de skad brjod par bya// de nas lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ dkyil 'khor lha rnams lus la bsdu// de nyid rig pa'i mchod pa yin// bdag gi rig pa'i ye shes kyi// khyad par dag las byung ba ni// gsang sngags nang ba'i lugs yin te// bdag nyid chen po zhes bya ste// lha rnams rang gi

lus la bsdu// las grub thugs dam gshegs pa dang// slar gshegs cho ga 'di skad gsungs// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun byas// bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// thugs rje chen po 'brel bas na// slar gshegs par yang snyan cha gsol// badzra muHyis ye shes gshegs// de nas bkra shis brjod par bya// bkra shis phyogs phyogs mi re yangs// glu dbyangs ha kar blang byas la// shar phyogs dpal be'u mgo btsugs la// byang gi nyar bkar 'di skad gsungs// 'jam dpal gdung 'tshob dpal be'u// thugs kyi gsang ba mdzad du gsol// sku mdog nyi ltar dag pa'i tshul// phyag sor zhabs sor nya la gsol// dbyangs zab chos kyi dung chen sgrogs// tshems dang rus pa'i sbubs su gsol// shes mchog bdud rtsi bum pa'i ngang// dbu skra mgur dang phyag la gsol// rnam shes ma chags pad mo'i dbyings// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor sgros su gsol// nam mkha'i mthar thug thugs rje'i skyangs// dbu yi dkyil 'khor gtsug tu gsol// mkhyen dpangs dkar po rgyal mtshan 'bar// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem sku la gsol// yid bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyag mthil zhabs mthil gnyis su gsol// rdzogs nas bkra shis lus bkod de// lan bzhi bskor mas sngar sar bkod// so sor bkra shis dbul bar bya// rtogs pa'i ye shes dbyings kyi bkra shis 'bar// thugs rje'i phrin las 'khor bar bkra shis 'bar// mtha' gnyis mi gnas dbu ma'i bkra shis 'bar// dbal be'u gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM bi ma li bi ma li kar ma ma badzra sha na/ ya na mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ dpa' brjid mnyen lcug rgyan yi bkra shis 'bar// 'khor ba'i gting 'phyo thugs rje'i bkra shis 'bar// gangs chen mkhar ba'i rang bzhin bkra shis 'bar// nya yi gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM su b+ha gi ri bra ba kri rA dza ya// yan mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ bstan pa'i chos sgrogs gsung gi bkra shis 'bar// 'khor bar mi bsnyems rgyal thabs bkra shis 'bar// rang bzhin rnam dag dge ba'i bkra shis 'bar// dung gi gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM ma ni ba ti dza ya/ ya na mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ sa bcur mnga' gsol dbang gi bkra shis 'bar// bdud rtsi bro mchog nad sel bkra shis 'bar// gsher byed bag chags sbyong ba'i bkra shis 'bar// bum pa'i gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM ma ya ma ya/ ra tsa ra tsa ka sha ka sha ye/ ma ma pa pa ka tsa ya/ yan mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ 'dam skyes pad ltar thugs rje'i bkra shis 'bar// chags pa'i skyon bral thabs mkhas bkra

shis 'bar// rang bzhin rnam dag gar skyes bkra shis 'bar// pad+ma'i gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM da ka da ka du+u na du na dz+wa la dz+wa la yan mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ 'khor bar mi gdungs skyabs kyi bkra shis 'bar// sdug bsngal zhi byed skyabs kyi bkra shis 'bar// khyab pa sbyin mdzad yon tan bkra shis 'bar// gdugs kyi gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM dza ya dza ya/ sarba sha truM s+t+wam b+ha ni a mo g+ha a pa ra dzi ta dza ya/ yan mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan mi nub bkra shis 'bar// sbyin pa'i char chen rtags kyi bkra shis 'bar// bdud sde pham mdzad rgyal ba'i bkra shis 'bar// rgyal mtshan gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM da dzi ni da dzi ni dza ya dza ya/ yan mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod phrin las bkra shis 'bar// dkyil 'khor bkod pas bzhugs gnas bkra shis 'bar// mi 'gyur 'khor lo'i chos sku'i bkra shis 'bar// 'khor lo'i gsum 'bar bkra shis slob dpon bzhes// oM dzi li dzi li/ mi li mi li/ ba tre ba tre/ dza ya mang+ga la A be sha ya swA hA/ glu dbyangs so so nas brjod cing// slob dpon la ni bkra shis dbul// de yang lus la bkod par bya'o// de nas slob mas slob dpon la// bkra shis pham phab dkar shas tsam// zhu zhing gsol ba 'di skad gsungs// slob dpon sku mchog yon tan bkra shis 'bar// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pas// bya yi dngos po bor nas gser du snang// bdag cag phyogs kyang bka' drin dges khengs nas// nyes pa'i skyon bral bkra shis mthar phyin smon// brjod nas bla mar phyag byas nas// slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad gsung// 'dir 'dus skal ldan rnal 'byor rnams// bkra shis skal shas thob gyur shog/ ces pas thams cad bkra shis so// de nas dza gad zas gsol ba// bkra shis zas brgyad a mr-i ta// sbyar nas thams cad gsol 'tshal lo// rdo rje ging gis dza gad dang// sman lnga stsal nas rab sbyar te// bkra shis bteg nas 'di skad gsung// sngon tshe shAka thub mngon par sangs rgyas tshe// zhing pa'i bu mo bkra shis lo legs mas// rdo rje'i gdan la bkra shis skyems gsol bas// bdud sde pham mdzad dge ba'i lo tog smin// de bzhin slob dpon rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs// dge ba'i lo tog bcud kyi dza gad dpa' bo 'di// bdud rtsi lngar ldan rigs lnga'i bkra shis 'bar// ho zhes phyag tu phul byas nas// s+t+waM zhes phyag tu bzhes par bya// sa ma ya ni ho zhes gsol// sa ma ya s+t+waM phyag tu bzhes// bkra shis pham phab dag kyang ni// gang gis slob ma rim par stsal// bkra shis zas dang dza gad ni// bde ba chen

po'i zas su bza'// zag pa med pa'i skom du 'thung// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rtsa la thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar// bdud rtsi khams thim sku ru gsal// yi ge thim pas sngags su sgrogs// snying rlung thim pas bcud tu 'dres// 'gros rnams thim pas gtsug tor 'khyil// rtsa rnams 'gros thim dbu ma'i nang// dbu yi gtsug tor grub pa dang// khams gyi bdud rtsir ring bsrel ni// g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung dang 'dra// sngags ni hUM gi gzugs su grub// rlung ni 'chi ba med pa'i srog/ mi 'gyur spros dang bral bar gnas// karma mA le'i rgyud las/ spyi'i las thams cad ma lus par bsdus pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor ma lus pa thams cad 'dus nas/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje la bstod pa/ sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang// nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar// khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad// khang stod med khyod sku la bstod// rgyud mchog las kyi phreng ba 'dir// dus kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsungs pas// phyi na gza' dang rgyu skar dge// nang du khams dgu 'du lugs rtogs// gsang ba yum gyi pad+ma rgyas// de nyid dbyer med chen por gnas// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// rgyu ni bsod nams tshogs rdzogs nas// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs// tshogs gnyis longs spyod chen po'i sku// gsal bkra'i dkyil 'khor zhi ba'i ngang// phung khams skye mched lhun gyis grub// rnon po'i dkyila'akhor khro rgyal tshogs// zhing bcu mngon par sangs rgyas bkod// thim pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa yis// rang bzhin ye shes lha rnams mnyes// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// bka' dang bstan pa gnyen po bsrung// rgyud chen las kyi phreng ba 'di// ji ltar gzung zhing gtad par bya// de nas zhe sdang rdo rje yis// 'khor gyi sa bcu byang sems la// legs par yang dag rab gsungs pa/ rgyud dang lung dang man ngag rnams// rgyud rgyal breng chags phun sum tshogs// lung chen bzung ste nges pa rnyed// man ngag mi bslu nges pa'i don// lung chen rgya chen bshad pa'i rgyud// las kyi phreng ba gzung bar bya// lha dang rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro la// gtad pas skal ldan mi la brgyud// de nas rim par dar bar 'gyur// phyi rab skal ldan don bshad pas// ma 'ongs blo dang 'tshams par 'gyur// zhes gsungs nas thams cad chos kyi dbyings su thim mo// karma mA le'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// lung chen bshad pa'i rgyud karma mA le rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi slob

dpon d+har+m+ma shrI pra b+ha dang/ a tsar+ya bi ma la la sogs pa'i paN+Di ta la rat+na a gras bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta bud tro pu na gu h+ya pa no shi a shwad da/ ma bi na sa ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa/ bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo/ zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa/ kun tu phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid/ dpal bde byed pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang du gyur pa/ 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzangs/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang/ dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang/ ro bro ba sna tshogs dang/ reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang/ chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa brtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so// de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang/ 'od kyi dpal dang/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang/ cho 'phrul bkod pa dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ mi bskyod rdo rje dang/ mngon par snang ba dang/ brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang/ 'brug sgra dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ rin chen phung po dang// nam mkha'i mdzod dang/ rin chen dra ba dang/ dkon mchog mtshan dang/ rin chen tog dang/ 'od zer snang ba dang/ tshe mtha' yas dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/ chags pa med pa'i 'od dang/ dga' ba'i spyan dang/ don thams cad yod pa dang/ brtson 'grus shugs can dang/ las chen 'phrul las dang/ gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang/ sna tshogs dbang phyug go/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang/ rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang/ gzi brjid bkod pa dang/ 'khor lo rnon po dang/ shes snang ba dang/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ 'od zer 'phro ba

dang/ drag shul can dang/ dri ma sems dpa' dang/ sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang/ rin chen rgyal po dang/ dra ba can dang/ lag bzangs dang/ gser 'od 'phro ba dang/ rin chen snye ma dang/ chos kyi mtho ba dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ mun pa sel ba dang/ dga' ba'i dbyangs dang/ gzhon nu rin chen dang/ rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang/ gar mkhan dang/ bro'i rgya mtsho dang/ thogs med bkod pa dang/ pad+mo dga' ba dang/ sa yi dbang phyug dang/ rin chen spungs pa dang/ sprin gyi phreng ba dang/ yid 'ong me tog dang/ ye shes sgron ma dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa dang/ kha lo sgyur ba dang/ dran pa'i dbang phyug dang/ pad+ma'i blo gros dang/ las byed pa'i stobs dang/ snying po blo gros rnams so// de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// gzhan yang pad+mo 'phro ba dang/ pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ pad+ma sgrogs pa dang/ pad+ma bskyod pa dang/ pad+ma tshim byed dang/ pad+ma 'thor ba dang/ pad+ma snang ba dang/ pad+ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi phrin las kyis bkod do// gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang/ pad grol dbang phyug dang/ grol ba'i dbang phyug dang/ sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang/ spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang/ smra ba'i dbang phyug dang/ mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang/ 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang/ ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad byung bar gyur to// de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te/ de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do// de yang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so// de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul bas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to// de'i dus na mthun par gle?ng ba ni/ kye ma ho ya mtshan sna

tshogs chos// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che// cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi// dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni// gsang gsum dam tshig spro mi mdzad// de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba// gsang pa'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod// khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras// dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba// bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag/ legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te/ phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa/ e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku// rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung// dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang// byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis// nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing// thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis// tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad// sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas// gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol// khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'// zab cing phra la rgya che bas// 'khor rnams the tshom ri bos gnon// thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod// 'di dag thams cad bstan pa'i snod// mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzad// dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste// smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so// rnam par gzigs kun tu gzigs/ de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig/ de nyid dngos po dang par gzigs nas/ gzigs pa'i mtha' dang/ dgongs pa'i mtha' dang/ mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ bkod pa dang/ rnam par bkod pa dang/ rnam par bshad pa dang/ dgongs pa dang/ rnam par dgongs pa dang/ rol pa dang/ rol pa chen po dang/ mdzad pa dang/ sna tshogs mdzad pas kun du spro bar mi byed de/ 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so// de'i dus dang sa dang sa'i khyad par dang/ dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag

kyang rnam par mi gzigs/ kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang mi 'gog go/ de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de/ tshul ban don gyi rgyal po che// 'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas// nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas// nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston// kye ma'o mgon po don kun gnas// zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa// byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam// rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur cing// zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas yang yum gzi ldan pad+mo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/ mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral// bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems// mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis// rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol// de skad ces yang bskul ba'i rjes// mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs nas// 'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de// 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad// legs so legs so rdo rje can// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas// yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na// gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la// dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis// gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod// ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams// thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de// don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis// gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzod// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa blang na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po//// de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas/ dga' ba'i bzhin bzang rgyas mdzad de/ gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin// thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs// de nas gzigs ldan pad+mo can// 'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de// 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa// dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur// e ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod// thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs// phyogs ris med pas go 'byed pas// yul du gyur pa kun rgyud dgongs// mi dmigs cho 'phrul nam mkha' las// bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung

bzhin// thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos// sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de// rang gi mtshan mos rab mdzes pas// rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can// phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing// phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de// mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na// rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas// gzi ldan pad+mo chen mo dang// rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de// 'dzum mig chags pa'i gzhin dag gis// 'khor rnams slong pa'i sngags brjod do// oM AHhU~M ma hA b+hasmi sha ku ru bi na hr-i da ya a~M b+ha ba hi a la la ho// gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis// dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku// rdo rje gar gyi rol mdzad cing// dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+mo'i gnas// dkar 'tsher dag pa'i rang bzhin te// dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par// gsal khyab kun du spros pa las// dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas 'thon// zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang// byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag/ gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod// ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol// brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing// 'dzum par mdzad dang rol pa dang// kun tu 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam// smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang// rdo rje phur pas g.ya' bas slong// 'dor zhing skum dang 'jog ldeg dang// rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang// rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs sprul// nam mkha' kun tu khyab par mdzad// rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar// byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal// rol pa'i char nyid mngon babs pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas// byang chub sems tshogs rol pa la// brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las// sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang// kun du rab dgyes ye shes thig/ sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma'i 'od// yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod// de 'dus pa'i che tshogs pa'o// phyogs bcu kun nas bzhes mdzad de// thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i// byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod// rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrogs shing// dbang po tshim pa'i rol rtsed dang// gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun// stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te// bcom ldan pad+mo bde yang bde// gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod// e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus nas// thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin// 'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad

pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad// rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis// dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs// pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che// phrin las ye shes gnas kun sbyong// khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs// khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog/ mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs// de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs// de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems// sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las// sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang// sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams// dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs// rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad// kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku// byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad// rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems// bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad// kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs// thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che// rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod// kye kye rnam par dag pa'i sku// dga' ba rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas// so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag/ btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor// bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston// rang dga'i bskum pas g.yo mdzad de// phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' gnas 'jug/ kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las// nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis// rang gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed// 'di dag thugs rje'i gnas su rung// ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos// thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas// rang gi bde chen don ston mchog/ zhes gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin// sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang ba stan las langs// bde gshegs bsngags pa rjod byed cing// bskum pas dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab// kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku// ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag/ byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas// rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku// de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs// thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na// ci phyir theg chen mchog tu sngags// yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad// (20)

mgon po'i pad+ma'i sku de nyid// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing// dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i// lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bcas sdud mdzad de// gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g.yo mdzad cing// stong gsum 'di dag spyod mdzad cing// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// sku las 'od zer spro bar mdzad// des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku// gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug/ phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku// zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs// dmar gsal pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs// g.yas g.yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser// rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes// phyag na pad sdong bum pa dang// rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang// mtha' mas mda' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang// phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad// gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang// rin chen sna tshogs rta babs bcas// dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng// b+han d+ha dril bu sogs kyis spras// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor cher 'phags pa'i// pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la// pad+mo rdo rje sogs pas spras// 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs// gnas rnams kun du rin chen khri// pad+ma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan// phyi rol bar khyams 'khor ba dang// snod rnams kun du pad+ma la// thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis// nyi ma zla ba rkyang pa'o// de nas pad+mo rnam dag kun// dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de// dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus// thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad// de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems// mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na// rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku// sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de// gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// 'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa// cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya// sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul// rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang// las mdzad khro bo yab yum dang// phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas// rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mdzes// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod// de tshe mgon po bde chen po// rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas// pad+mo rnam par 'phrul pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po 'byin par mdzad// byang sems kam las rnam 'phrul pa'i// bde gshegs 'od zer snang ba'i sku// zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rgyan// gtso bo'i cha lugs ci lta bar// rang 'od yum

dang 'khril bar mdzod// bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la// rA ga pad+mo hU~M zhes pas// sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de// las kun grub par mdzad pa yin// gang gi pad+ma sha ri dang// b+hu d+ha hU~M gis bsnan byas na// zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang// grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs sog rnams// sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing// yun rings gnas pa gnas pa yin// 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la// yi ge dza yis gdags byas nas// rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor// rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes par bzhugs// thugs rje skul ba'i glu dang sngags// 'od zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod// dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus// dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan// o~M rnam dag pad+mo bde ba'i dbyings// ye shes byin las gsal ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che// mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che// byin brlabs 'dor bar mi mdzad pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku// rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin// gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te// 'od zer rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus// yi ge A nas aH'i bar// bcu drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas// 'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing// rigs mthun dkyil 'khor kun gsal 'gyur// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas pas// chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings// rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs// de bzhin kA nas k+Sha yi bar// sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal// brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas// 'od 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas sku// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas// chos mang ye shes zag pa med// slar nyid sku yi gnas zhugs pas// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs// gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang// bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras// kha~M las rnam 'phrul che mtha' yas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar mdangs// pad+ma sogs dang ral gri 'dzin// chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs// pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ga~M las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug/ dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// pad+ma'i phreng ba bum pa 'dzin// dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhugs pa'o// g+ha~M las sprul pa'i chags med 'os// zhal gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od// pad gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// nga~M las sprul pa'i spyan dag ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis btsod kyi mdog/ rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin// byang gi

dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// tsa~M las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi chu shel mdog/ rdo rje dril 'dzin 'khril pa'i tshul// dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan// tsha~M las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUr+ya// rin chen snye ma dung phor 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// dza~M las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur gum mdog/ rin chen chag shing 'gu d+he 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// nya~M las sprul pa'i dri med dpal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gad mdog/ rin chen pad srungs za ma tog/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ta~M las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril// rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs// tha~M las sprul pa'i nam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs/ rin chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la zhugs// da~M las sprul pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog/ rin chen phreng dang pad+mo 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// d+ha~M las sprul pa'i dkon mchog rgyan// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud mangs 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// na~M las sprul pa'i rin chen tog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta// dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// Ta~M las sprul pa kun du snang// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin// gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin// tha~M las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi shel gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// da~M las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdangs// 'khor lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ta~M las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bkod// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes spras// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// na~M las sprul pa'i rnam par gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ljang skya'i mdangs// ku sha'i chun po'i a mra'i mdangs// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// pa~M las sprul pa'i don yod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog/ rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril// rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin// pha~M las sprul pa'i brtson 'grus 'khyugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka/ rgya gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil

'khor gnas la bzhugs// ba~M las sprul pa'i las chen po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog/ pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// b+ha~M las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i mdangs// phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ma~M las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs// zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// bde gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang// tsakra sgyur rgyal ma lus dang// mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs rgyan// rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya// yang sprul byams pa'i dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri mdog/ rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang// tri shUl thod bcas pad+ma'i lcug/ rngam brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khril// drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo// khwa las sprul pa rtse ba'i dbang// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang// thod rnga rdo rje myu gu'o// ra~M las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal// pad+ma dang ni dril bu dang// thod sbrul ras sngon ba dan 'dzin// la~M las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog/ rdo rje rgya gram pad+mo dang// gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can// rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas// 'khor bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pas// lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru// gzhan 'jigs drag po'i las kyis 'khod// sha~M las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'od// rtse gsum b+han d+ha rin chen 'khril// mi yi thod pa'i ri mos mtshan// Sha~M las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs// rin chen rtse dgu bgrang phreng dang// pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs mdzub mdzad// sa~M las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// dbyug pa rtse gcig pad+ma dang// dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin// ha~M las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i sku// ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang// me yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin// gzhan 'joms 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog/ rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang rol// drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'gengs// pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du 'khod// ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang// zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs// yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang// kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra// rin chen pi bang phreng ba dang// rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs// ga las gzi

brjid bkod pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog/ pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang// 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang// g+ha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra dang// 'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing// rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin// tsa las shes rab snang ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs// rin chen phung po pad+ma dang// rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor// tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang// dpa' bo longs spyod pad+ma'i spyan// dza las 'od zer 'phro ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal// pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu// mu tig chun po za ma tog/ dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ 'od kyi me phung me 'od dang// ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon// ta las sprul pa'i dri ma sel// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i phreng ba gaN DI rdeg/ chos kyi tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o// tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha// seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng// rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas// las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs// ri bo pad+ma chu dri dang// gser nya 'phyo ba'i rdzing bu yin/ d+ha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog/ rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang// b+han d+ha sbrang yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun// ta las sprul pa'i lag bzangs ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ta'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar dmar mdangs// dri yi gzhong ba ku sha'i tshul// mtha' las gser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog/ glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang// rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od// Da las rin chen snye ma ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad rA ka/ pad+ma'i sdong bu dpag bsam shing// b+han d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs// d+ha las chos kyis mthong ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku// go cha ye shes sgron ma dang// dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog/ sna tshogs sprin phung ser gra bcas// mche ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin// b+ha las gzhon nu rin chen ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ rgya gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang// 'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum// sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams// rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang// yum gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// nya ma na las 'phrul pa yi// rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs// rigs kyi mtshan ma ci bzhin du// pad+ma rA' gA rak+ta mdangs// be'u gser mdog

in dra bzhin// pad+ma rdo rje rims sogs mtshan// zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril// 'og ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa yi// rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang// pad+ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod// ya wa ra las sprul pa yi// pad+ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser// dmar ljang pad+mo me long dang// rin chen phreng ba pi wang gar// mchod pa las mdzad nang gi mtshams// Sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i// pad+mo tshim byed la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs// bdug spos me tog dung dang dri// 'gying tshul tri shul las kyi tshul// mchod pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas// de dag gi gsang sngags ni// o~M d+he hi rA ga pad+ma shi ri bu ta hU~M hU~M sA hA/ o~M pad+ma ma hA d+ha ba ra bu na si ta ma hA d+ha ma hr-i da yA hU~M hU~M/ prad tang ya dza swA hA/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// o~M tsakra a lo ka na ma rak+Sha sa~M b+ha ra da na hri ti ba ya ba ti dza swA hA/ nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// o~M badzra da ra ba kr-i ta ya ni sha~M ra ti pa sha~M ni dza swA hA/ shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o// o~M rat+na ku ti du man ta b+han d+ha b+han d+ha du na du na pi dza swA hA/ lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'o// o~M bi sha tsi na d+ha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ byang gi dkyil 'khor pa'o// o~M ma ma a ba lo ka na ru ru yu ru si de b+h+yo de sa twa ma ma hU~M dza swA hA/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// o~M bi lo ka nA ma si ta na ma ku ru ku ru bo d+hi sa twa b+ha ra bu na dza hU~M dza swA hA/ rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyi'o// o~M bin d+ha bin d+ha sarba karma si de de bi ku ru bu ta sa~M bo ha hU~M o~M o~M dza swA ha/ lha mo rnams kyi'o// o~M a pa sma ra kro d+ha sni/ yak+sha hU~M hU~M hU~M bi ta~M pa ka phaT swA hA/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// gsang sngags rgyal po mi bzad pas// rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni// stong gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de// rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing// rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod// gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas// rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta ma hA bo d+hi h+ya su tra~M tri sha shu d+he so nA khya hU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags sarba bu ta ku ru rat+na ma ma ku ta/ a a bIr+ya sad ma ma ku a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ o~M pad+ma a mo ka sa ma ya shrI ha ha ha tshin d+ha ma ni a smi sha bi ma ma

ya hU~M hU~M/ sngags gsum gyi gsal bar byed pa'o// o~M bi sha tsin d+ha ma ni a ba sa~M bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa pa~M da hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rnam par spro ba'i sngags so// o~M ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma si la du tri si hU~M phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so// o~M a~M a a min du she ma la shan dun d+he ta thA ga ta b+h+yod ti pad+ma ku ru AHhU~M swA hA/ rbad pa'i sngags so// o~M pad+ma mu kha~M pad+ma pa ba sa bo ti di ra ya~M gu ru hU~M hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M da ra sha swA hA/ snying po'i sngags so// o~M na ma su tra~M b+ho ga ga na gi ma le sa~M sA ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ rig pa mchog gi sngags so// o~M ba ga ga ba sa~M bo pad+ma d+ha a h+ye h+yi ma hAM kA ru ma da a ma d+hu na dza dza/ spyan drang pa'i sngags so// o~M pad+mo sa~M ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye s+t+wa~M/ gdan gyi sngags so/ o~M a mu ka si na ma sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta pU tsa me da na da hU~M tri swA hA/ mchod pa'i sngags so// o~M pad+ma bi lo ku ma la su na~M tu tra~M swA hA pa sa~M hi hi/ dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so// de nas gsang pa'i bdag po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba rmad 'byung ba'i// sku dang gsung thugs gsang sngags che// byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog/ dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po// thabs dang shes rab rol ba'i tshul// rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las// rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs chen po// 'gro ba'i snang ba dam pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos// dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o// phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku// e ma'o chos sku mya ngan 'das// e ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku// e ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul// rgya che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che// thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// sngon dang da lta 'brel don 'byung// thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs// sa dang sa 'das don chen po// ta thA ga ta'i byin brlabs dbyings// la la sku dang gsung dang thugs// zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus// gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis// rgyud gsum rnam dag tshim gyur nas// dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan

che// gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che// dri med dag pa ya mtshan che// 'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che// byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che// 'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad// za 'og rim pa ci bzhin du// rdo rje gsang gral du 'god// de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos// chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku// sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i// 'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir// rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi dkyis 'khor gsal bar mdzod// de tshe byang chub sems chen po// 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des// dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal bar mdzod// 'du shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs// rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas// rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan// las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang// rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis// thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di gnyer ro// byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'dus pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya// o~M gu+u h+ya badzra sa ma s+t+wa~M/ a la la ho// rdo rje ro langs bsdus pa yis// gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams// rigs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas// skal bzang dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das na rlag par 'gyur// bka' yi bsgo ba'i don chen pos// 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas// dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid// dbang thob las mdzad chen po des// bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gdab// 'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod// bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid// smra bsam yul las rab 'das kyang// dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas// yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas// brjod bsam 'das pa'i ting 'dzin las// mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// stobs mchog seng ge chen po la// logs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas// rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs

byas// gsol btab blo mchog seng ge khyod// bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye// stobs mchog seng ge gsang bdag gis// gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig/ bdag la zhus shig spobs par byos// slar nyid gsol ba btab pa'i don// kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa// mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' rje btsan la// chos rnams ston pa'i gnas la gsan// bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa des// gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston cing// dgongs mdzad 'brel bas mi mdzad pa// rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa// 'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol// gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad par rigs// zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos// sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod// de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can// bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni// dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis// rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad pas// yang dag don gyi snying po nyid// rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// smra bsam las 'das brjod med pas// tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin// gnyis mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag/ tshig gi snang ba'i the tshom skyed// grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes// 'das dang ma byon thams cad dang// da ltar byung ba'i dgongs pa'i don// ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med// de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems// kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du// mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams// don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir// rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis// 'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na// bdag sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas// tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu// gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa// ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras// dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// zhus shing stobs mchog seng ge khyod// des kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mchod rdzas nas// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol// kye ma ston pa thugs chen po// phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na// ma 'ongs sgra la brten pa dag/ don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir// mtshon bya mtshon par

byas nas ni// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa// gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i// phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing// rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad// thams cad pad+mor 'gyur ba yi/ rmad 'byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs// o~M AHhU~M swA hA// bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya/ sa ma ya/ a sa/ a nu bo d+hi tsit+ta a nan ta gar b+ha/ ma hA sa twa pra ta a hU~M/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dang/ rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur nas// gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bka'// bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par// yang dag bden pa'id don bstan pa// de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de// mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi gdeng// ji srid blo yi chos dag tu// gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la// bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste// de las 'das pa don dam yin// sku gsum gnyis su med pa yi// snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa// dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas// yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul// thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid// zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni// de nyid bla med mchog dam pa// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// a la la yi sgra brjod do// stobs mchog seng ge dri ba dris// de ltar lags so bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lha la blo gnas gang// spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis// phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur// blo yi rim pa 'jug bya'am// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don// mtshan nyid rnam dag dus lags pa// bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i// dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no// legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing// rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na// 'brel ba shugs kyis sgrub byed na// lta spyod gnyis ldan bden pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor sa la legs gnas shing// bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas// yang dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur// rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shog/ ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings// bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis// yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku// kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de// med pa ma yin mtshan med de// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro// slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas// bden 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas// che chung mthu yis grub
